# copyright_long:       Tree of Life<br><br>Messianic Jewish Family Bible Project<br>A diverse community of Messianic Jewish and Christian scholars collaborated to produce The Tree of Life Messianic Family Bible-The New Covenant. Messianic rabbis, leaders, scholars, artists, professors, psalmists, linguists, writers, parents, and children came together to work on this groundbreaking version that is meant for the entire family to read and enjoy together. Wisdom is a tree of life to those who take hold of her, and happy are those who hold her fast (Proverbs 3:18). If you are a Jew who is curious about Messiah, this book will help you, with guidance from the Holy Spirit, to see how Yeshua became the Prophet, like Moses, full of glory, grace, and truth. Compare what the New Covenant says with what the Hebrew Bible says-the footnotes point the way for you. Many modern-day Christians recognize the value of rediscovering the Jewish roots of their faith, and Messianic Jews are growing in numbers and scholarship. The middle wall of partition is crumbling, and unity is being restored, teaching that diversity is strength.
40001001	The book of the genealogy of Yeshua ha-Mashiach , Ben-David , Ben-Avraham :
40001002	Abraham fathered Isaac , Isaac fathered Jacob , Jacob fathered Judah and his brothers ,
40001003	Judah fathered Perez and Zerah by Tamar , Perez fathered Hezron , Hezron fathered Ram ,
40001004	Ram fathered Amminadab , Amminadab fathered Nahshon , Nahshon fathered Salmon ,
40001005	Salmon fathered Boaz by Rahab , Boaz fathered Obed by Ruth , Obed fathered Jesse ,
40001006	and Jesse fathered David the king . David fathered Solomon by the wife of Uriah ,
40001007	Solomon fathered Rehoboam , Rehoboam fathered Abijah , Abijah fathered Asa ,
40001008	Asa fathered Jehoshaphat , Jehoshaphat fathered Joram , Joram fathered Uzziah ,
40001009	Uzziah fathered Jotham , Jotham fathered Ahaz , Ahaz fathered Hezekiah ,
40001010	Hezekiah fathered Manasseh , Manasseh fathered Amon , Amon fathered Josiah ,
40001011	and Josiah fathered Jeconiah and his brothers at the time of the exile to Babylon .
40001012	After the Babylonian exile Jeconiah fathered Shealtiel , Shealtiel fathered Zerubbabel ,
40001013	Zerubbabel fathered Abiud , Abiud fathered Eliakim , Eliakim fathered Azor ,
40001014	Azor fathered Zadok , Zadok fathered Achim , Achim fathered Eliud ,
40001015	Eliud fathered Eleazar , Eleazar fathered Matthan , Matthan fathered Jacob ,
40001016	and Jacob fathered Joseph the husband of Miriam , from whom was born Yeshua who is called the Messiah .
40001017	So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations , from David until the Babylonian exile are fourteen generations , and from the Babylonian exile until the Messiah are fourteen generations .
40001018	Now the birth of Yeshua the Messiah happened this way . When His mother Miriam was engaged to Joseph but before they came together , she was found to be pregnant through the Ruach ha-Kodesh .
40001019	And Joseph her husband , being a righteous man and not wanting to disgrace her publicly , made up his mind to dismiss her secretly .
40001020	But while he considered these things , behold , an angel of Adonai appeared to him in a dream , saying , “ Joseph son of David , do not be afraid to take Miriam as your wife , for the Child conceived in her is from the Ruach ha-Kodesh .
40001021	She will give birth to a son ; and you shall call His name Yeshua , for He will save His people from their sins . ”
40001022	Now all this took place to fulfill what was spoken by Adonai through the prophet , saying ,
40001023	“ Behold , the virgin shall conceive and give birth to a son , and they shall call His name Immanuel , ” which means “ God with us . ”
40001024	When Joseph woke up from his sleep , he did as the angel of Adonai commanded him and took Miriam as his wife .
40001025	But he did not know her intimately until she had given birth to a Son . And he called His name Yeshua .
40002001	Now after Yeshua was born in Bethlehem of Judea , in the days of King Herod , magi from the east came to Jerusalem ,
40002002	saying , “ Where is the One who has been born King of the Jews ? For we saw His star in the east and have come to worship Him . ”
40002003	When King Herod heard , he was troubled , and all Jerusalem with him .
40002004	And when he had called together all the ruling kohanim and Torah scholars , he began to inquire of them where the Messiah was to be born .
40002005	So they told him , “ In Bethlehem of Judea , for so it has been written by the prophet :
40002006	‘ And you , Bethlehem , land of Judah , are by no means least among the rulers of Judah ; For out of you shall come a ruler who will shepherd My people Israel . ’ ”
40002007	Then Herod secretly called the magi and determined from them the exact time the star had appeared .
40002008	And he sent them to Bethlehem and said , “ Go and search carefully for the Child . And when you have found Him , bring word back to me so that I may come and worship Him as well . ”
40002009	After listening to the king , they went their way . And behold , the star they had seen in the east went on before them , until it came to rest over the place where the Child was .
40002010	When they saw the star , they rejoiced exceedingly with great gladness .
40002011	And when they came into the house , they saw the Child with His mother Miriam ; and they fell down and worshiped Him . Then , opening their treasures , they presented to Him gifts of gold , frankincense , and myrrh .
40002012	And having been warned in a dream not to go back to Herod , they returned to their own country by another way .
40002013	Now when they had gone , behold , an angel of Adonai appears to Joseph in a dream , saying , “ Get up ! Take the Child and His mother and flee to Egypt . Stay there until I tell you , for Herod is about to search for the Child , to kill Him . ”
40002014	So he got up , took the Child and His mother during the night , and went to Egypt .
40002015	He stayed there until Herod’s death . This was to fulfill what was spoken by Adonai through the prophet , saying , “ Out of Egypt I called My Son . ”
40002016	Then when Herod saw that he had been tricked by the magi , he became furious . And he sent and killed all boys in Bethlehem and in all its surrounding area , from two years old and under , according to the time he had determined from the magi .
40002017	Then was fulfilled what was spoken through Jeremiah the prophet , saying ,
40002018	“ A voice is heard in Ramah , weeping and loud wailing , Rachel sobbing for her children and refusing to be comforted , because they are no more . ”
40002019	But when Herod died , behold , an angel of Adonai appears in a dream to Joseph in Egypt ,
40002020	saying , “ Get up ! Take the Child and His mother and go to the land of Israel , for those seeking the Child’s life are dead . ”
40002021	So he got up , took the Child and His mother , and went to the land of Israel .
40002022	But hearing that Archelaus was king of Judea in place of his father Herod , he became afraid to go there . Then after being warned in a dream , he withdrew to the region of the Galilee .
40002023	And he went and lived in a city called Natzeret , to fulfill what was spoken through the prophets , that Yeshua shall be called a Natzrati .
40003001	In those days , John the Immerser came proclaiming in the wilderness of Judea ,
40003002	“ Turn away from your sins , for the kingdom of heaven is near ! ”
40003003	For he is the one Isaiah the prophet spoke about , saying , “ The voice of one crying in the wilderness , ‘ Prepare the way of Adonai , and make His paths straight . ’ ”
40003004	Now John wore clothing from camel’s hair and a leather belt around his waist , and his food was locusts and wild honey .
40003005	Then Jerusalem was going out to him , and all Judea and all the region around the Jordan .
40003006	Confessing their sins , they were being immersed by him in the Jordan River .
40003007	But when he saw many Pharisees and Sadducees coming to his immersion , he said to them , “ You brood of vipers ! Who warned you to flee from the coming wrath ?
40003008	Therefore produce fruit worthy of repentance ;
40003009	and do not think that you can say to yourselves , ‘ We have Abraham as our father ’ ! For I tell you that from these stones God can raise up children for Abraham .
40003010	Already the axe is laid at the root of the trees ; therefore every tree that does not produce good fruit is cut down and thrown into the fire !
40003011	“ As for me , I immerse you in water for repentance . But the One coming after me is mightier than I am ; I am not worthy to carry His sandals . He will immerse you in the Ruach ha-Kodesh and fire .
40003012	His winnowing fork is in His hand , and He shall clear His threshing floor and gather His wheat into the barn ; but the chaff He shall burn up with inextinguishable fire . ”
40003013	Then Yeshua came from the Galilee to John , to be immersed by him in the Jordan .
40003014	But John tried to prevent Him , saying , “ I need to be immersed by You , and You are coming to me ? ”
40003015	But Yeshua responded , “ Let it happen now , for in this way it is fitting for us to fulfill all righteousness . ” So John yielded to Him .
40003016	After being immersed , Yeshua rose up out of the water ; and behold , the heavens were opened to Him , and He saw the Ruach Elohim descending like a dove and coming upon Him .
40003017	And behold , a voice from the heavens said , “ This is My Son , whom I love ; with Him I am well pleased ! ”
40004001	Then Yeshua was led by the Ruach into the wilderness to be tempted by the devil .
40004002	After He had fasted for forty days and forty nights , He was hungry .
40004003	And when the tempter came to Him , he said , “ If You are Ben-Elohim , tell these stones to become bread . ”
40004004	But He replied , “ It is written , ‘ Man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word that comes from the mouth of God . ’ ”
40004005	Then the devil took Him into the holy city and placed Him on the highest point of the Temple .
40004006	“ If You are Ben-Elohim , ” he said , “ throw Yourself down . For it is written , ‘ He shall command His angels concerning you , ’ and ‘ upon their hands they shall lift you up , so that you may not strike your foot against a stone . ’ ”
40004007	Yeshua said to him , “ Again it is written , ‘ You shall not put Adonai your God to the test . ’ ”
40004008	Again , the devil takes Him to a very high mountain and shows Him all the kingdoms of the world and their glory .
40004009	And he said to Him , “ All these things I will give You , if You fall down and worship me . ”
40004010	Then Yeshua says to him , “ Go away , satan ! For it is written , ‘ You shall worship Adonai your God , and Him only shall you serve . ’ ”
40004011	Then the devil leaves Him . And behold , angels came and began to take care of Him .
40004012	Now when Yeshua heard that John had been handed over , He withdrew to the Galilee .
40004013	Leaving Natzeret , He came and settled in Capernaum , which is by the sea in the regions of Zebulun and Naphtali .
40004014	This was to fulfill what was spoken through Isaiah the prophet , saying ,
40004015	“ Land of Zebulun and land of Naphtali , the way of the sea , beyond the Jordan , Galilee of the nations —
40004016	the people sitting in darkness have seen a great light , and those sitting in the region and shadow of death , on them a light has dawned . ”
40004017	From then on , Yeshua began to proclaim , “ Turn away from your sins , for the kingdom of heaven is near . ”
40004018	Now as Yeshua was walking by the Sea of Galilee , He saw two brothers , Simon who was called Peter and Andrew his brother . They were casting a net into the sea , for they were fishermen .
40004019	And He said to them , “ Follow Me , and I will make you fishers of men . ”
40004020	Immediately they left their nets and followed Him .
40004021	Going on from there , He saw two other brothers , Jacob the son of Zebedee and John his brother . They were in the boat with Zebedee their father , mending their nets , and He called them .
40004022	Immediately they left the boat and their father and followed Him .
40004023	Yeshua was going throughout all the Galilee , teaching in their synagogues and proclaiming the Good News of the kingdom , and healing every kind of disease and sickness among the people .
40004024	News about Him spread throughout all Syria . And they brought to Him all the sick — those tormented by various diseases and afflictions , those plagued by demons , the epileptics , the paralyzed — and He healed them .
40004025	And large crowds followed Him from the Galilee , the Decapolis , Jerusalem , Judea , and beyond the Jordan .
40005001	Now when Yeshua saw the crowds , He went up on the mountain . And after He sat down , His disciples came to Him .
40005002	And He opened His mouth and began to teach them , saying ,
40005003	“ Blessed are the poor in spirit , for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
40005004	“ Blessed are those who mourn , for they shall be comforted .
40005005	“ Blessed are the meek , for they shall inherit the earth .
40005006	“ Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for righteousness , for they shall be satisfied .
40005007	“ Blessed are the merciful , for they shall be shown mercy .
40005008	“ Blessed are the pure in heart , for they shall see God .
40005009	“ Blessed are the peacemakers , for they shall be called sons of God .
40005010	“ Blessed are those who have been persecuted for the sake of righteousness , for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
40005011	“ Blessed are you when people revile you and persecute you and say all kinds of evil against you falsely , on account of Me .
40005012	Rejoice and be glad , for your reward in heaven is great ! For in the same way they persecuted the prophets who were before you . ”
40005013	“ You are the salt of the earth ; but if the salt should lose its flavor , how shall it be made salty again ? It is no longer good for anything , except to be thrown out and trampled under foot by men .
40005014	“ You are the light of the world . A city set on a hill cannot be hidden .
40005015	Neither do people light a lamp and put it under a basket . Instead , they put it on a lampstand so it gives light to all in the house .
40005016	In the same way , let your light shine before men so they may see your good works and glorify your Father in heaven . ”
40005017	“ Do not think that I came to abolish the Torah or the Prophets ! I did not come to abolish , but to fulfill .
40005018	Amen , I tell you , until heaven and earth pass away , not the smallest letter or serif shall ever pass away from the Torah until all things come to pass .
40005019	Therefore , whoever breaks one of the least of these commandments , and teaches others the same , shall be called least in the kingdom of heaven . But whoever keeps and teaches them , this one shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
40005020	For I tell you that unless your righteousness exceeds that of the Pharisees and Torah scholars , you shall never enter the kingdom of heaven !
40005021	“ You have heard it was said to those of old , ‘ You shall not murder , and whoever commits murder shall be subject to judgment . ’
40005022	I tell you now that everyone who is angry with his brother shall be subject to judgment . And whoever says to his brother , ‘ Raca ’ shall be subject to the council ; and whoever says , ‘ You fool ! ’ shall be subject to fiery Gehenna .
40005023	“ Therefore if you are presenting your offering upon the altar , and there remember that your brother has something against you ,
40005024	leave your offering there before the altar and go . First be reconciled to your brother , and then come and present your offering .
40005025	“ Make friends quickly with your opponent while you are with him on the way . Otherwise , your opponent may hand you over to the judge , and the judge to the assistant , and you will be thrown into prison .
40005026	Amen , I tell you , you will never get out of there until you have paid back the last penny !
40005027	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ You shall not commit adultery . ’
40005028	I tell you that everyone who looks upon a woman to lust after her has already committed adultery with her in his heart .
40005029	And if your right eye causes you to stumble , gouge it out and throw it away ! It is better for you that one part of your body should be destroyed , than that your whole body be thrown into Gehenna .
40005030	And if your right hand causes you to stumble , cut it off and throw it away ! It is better for you that one part of your body should be destroyed , than that your whole body go into Gehenna .
40005031	“ It was said , ‘ Whoever sends his wife away , let him give her a certificate of divorce . ’
40005032	I say to you that everyone who divorces his wife , except for sexual immorality , makes her commit adultery ; and whoever marries a divorced woman commits adultery .
40005033	“ Again , you have heard that it was said to those of old , ‘ You shall not swear falsely , but shall carry out your oaths to Adonai . ’
40005034	I tell you , do not swear at all — not by heaven , for it is the throne of God ;
40005035	or by the earth , for it is the footstool of His feet ; or by Jerusalem , for it is the city of the Great King .
40005036	And do not swear by your head , for you cannot make a single hair white or black .
40005037	But let your word ‘ Yes’ be ‘ Yes’ and your ‘ No , ’ ‘ No’ — anything more than this is from the evil one . ”
40005038	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth . ’
40005039	I tell you , do not resist an evildoer . But whoever slaps you on your right cheek , turn to him also the other .
40005040	And the one wanting to sue you and to take your shirt , let him also have your coat .
40005041	Whoever forces you to go one mile , go with him two .
40005042	Give to the one who asks of you , and do not turn away from the one who wants to borrow from you .
40005043	“ You have heard that it was said , ‘ You shall love your neighbor and hate your enemy . ’
40005044	I tell you , love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you ,
40005045	so that you may be children of your Father in heaven . He causes His sun to rise on the evil and the good , and sends rain on the righteous and the unrighteous .
40005046	For if you love those who love you , what reward do you have ? Even the tax collectors do the same , don’t they ?
40005047	And if you greet only your brothers , what more are you doing than anyone else ? Even the pagans do that , don’t they ?
40005048	Therefore be perfect , just as your Father in heaven is perfect . ”
40006001	“ Beware of practicing your righteousness before others to be seen by them ; otherwise you have no reward from your Father in heaven .
40006002	So whenever you do tzedakah , do not sound a trumpet before you as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and on the streets , so that they may be glorified by men . Amen , I tell you , they have their reward in full !
40006003	But when you do tzedakah , do not let your left hand know what your right hand is doing ,
40006004	so that your tzedakah may be in secret ; and your Father , who sees in secret , shall reward you .
40006005	“ When you pray , do not be like the hypocrites ; for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and on the street corners , so that they may be seen by others . Amen , I tell you , they have their reward in full !
40006006	But you , when you pray , go into your inner room ; and when you have shut your door , pray to your Father who is in secret . And your Father , who sees in secret , shall reward you .
40006007	And when you are praying , do not babble on and on like the pagans ; for they think they will be heard because of their many words .
40006008	Do not be like them , for your Father knows what you need before you ask Him .
40006009	“ Therefore , pray in this way : ‘ Our Father in heaven , sanctified be Your name .
40006010	Your kingdom come , Your will be done on earth as it is in heaven .
40006011	Give us this day our daily bread .
40006012	And forgive us our debts as we also have forgiven our debtors .
40006013	And lead us not into temptation , but deliver us from the evil one . ’
40006014	“ For if you forgive others their transgressions , your heavenly Father will also forgive you .
40006015	But if you do not forgive others , neither will your Father forgive your transgressions .
40006016	“ And whenever you fast , do not become sad-faced like the hypocrites , for they neglect their faces to make their fasting evident to men . Amen , I tell you , they have their reward in full !
40006017	But when you fast , anoint your head and wash your face ,
40006018	so that your fasting won’t be evident to men , but to your Father who is in secret . And your Father , who sees in secret , will reward you .
40006019	“ Do not store up for yourselves treasures on earth , where moth and rust destroy and where thieves break in and steal .
40006020	But store up for yourselves treasures in heaven , where neither moth nor rust destroys and where thieves do not break in or steal .
40006021	For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
40006022	“ The eye is the lamp of the body . Therefore if your eye is good , your whole body will be full of light .
40006023	But if your eye is bad , your body will be full of darkness . If therefore the light that is in you is darkness , how great is the darkness !
40006024	“ No one can serve two masters ; for either he will hate the one and love the other , or he will stick by one and look down on the other . You cannot serve God and money . ”
40006025	“ So I say to you , do not worry about your life — what you will eat or drink , or about your body , what you will wear . Isn’t life more than food and the body more than clothing ?
40006026	“ Look at the birds of the air . They do not sow or reap or gather into barns ; yet your Father in heaven feeds them . Are you not of more value than they ?
40006027	And which of you by worrying can add a single hour to his life ?
40006028	And why do you worry about clothing ? Consider the lilies of the field , how they grow . They neither toil nor spin .
40006029	Yet I tell you that not even Solomon in all his glory clothed himself like one of these .
40006030	Now if in this way God clothes the grass — which is here today and thrown into the furnace tomorrow — will He not much more clothe you , O you of little faith ?
40006031	“ Therefore do not worry , saying , ‘ What will we eat ? ’ or ‘ What will we drink ? ’ or ‘ What will we wear ? ’
40006032	For the pagans eagerly pursue all these things ; yet your Father in heaven knows that you need all these .
40006033	But seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness , and all these things shall be added to you .
40006034	Therefore do not worry about tomorrow , for tomorrow will worry about itself . Each day has enough trouble of its own . ”
40007001	“ Stop judging , so that you may not be judged .
40007002	For with the judgment you judge , you will be judged ; and with the measure you use , it will be measured to you .
40007003	“ Why do you look at the speck in your brother’s eye , but do not notice the beam in your own eye ?
40007004	Or how will you say to your brother , ‘ Let me take the speck out of your eye , ’ and look , the beam is in your own eye ?
40007005	Hypocrite , first take the beam out of your own eye , and then you will see clearly to take the speck out of your brother’s eye .
40007006	“ Do not give what is holy to dogs or throw your pearls before pigs ; otherwise they will trample them under their feet , then turn and rip you to shreds .
40007007	“ Ask , and it shall be given to you . Seek , and you shall find . Knock , and it shall be opened to you .
40007008	For everyone who asks receives , and the one who seeks finds , and to the one who knocks it shall be opened .
40007009	“ For what man among you , when his son asks him for bread , will give him a stone ?
40007010	Or when he asks for a fish , will give him a snake ?
40007011	If you then , being evil , know how to give good gifts to your children , how much more will your Father in heaven give good things to those who ask Him !
40007012	So in all things , do to others what you would want them to do to you — for this is the Torah and the Prophets .
40007013	“ Enter through the narrow gate ; for the gate is wide and the way is broad that leads to destruction , and those who enter through it are many .
40007014	How narrow is the gate and difficult the way that leads to life , and those who find it are few . ”
40007015	“ Watch out for false prophets , who come to you in sheep’s clothing but inwardly are ravenous wolves .
40007016	You will recognize them by their fruit . Grapes aren’t gathered from thorn bushes or figs from thistles , are they ?
40007017	Even so , every good tree produces good fruit , but the rotten tree produces bad fruit .
40007018	A good tree cannot produce bad fruit , nor can a rotten tree produce good fruit .
40007019	Every tree that does not produce good fruit is chopped down and thrown into the fire .
40007020	So then , you will recognize them by their fruit .
40007021	“ Not everyone who says to Me , ‘ Lord , Lord ! ’ will enter the kingdom of heaven , but he who does the will of My Father in heaven .
40007022	Many will say to Me on that day , ‘ Lord , Lord , didn’t we prophesy in Your name , and drive out demons in Your name , and perform many miracles in Your name ? ’
40007023	Then I will declare to them , ‘ I never knew you . Get away from Me , you workers of lawlessness ! ’ ”
40007024	“ Therefore everyone who hears these words of Mine and does them will be like a wise man who built his house on the rock .
40007025	And the rain fell , and the floods came , and the winds blew and beat against that house ; and yet it did not fall , for its foundation had been built on the rock .
40007026	Everyone who hears these words of Mine and does not act on them will be like a foolish man who built his house on the sand .
40007027	And the rain fell , and the floods came , and the winds blew and beat against that house ; and it fell — and great was its fall . ”
40007028	Now when Yeshua had finished these words , the crowds were astounded at His teaching ,
40007029	for He was teaching them as one having authority and not as their Torah scholars .
40008001	When He came down from the mountain , large crowds followed Him .
40008002	And a man with tzara’at came to Him and bowed down before Him , saying , “ Master , if You are willing , You can make me clean . ”
40008003	Yeshua stretched out His hand and touched him , saying , “ I am willing . Be cleansed . ” Immediately his tzara’at was cleansed .
40008004	And Yeshua said to him , “ See that you tell no one ; but go show yourself to the kohen and offer the gift that Moses commanded , as a testimony to them . ”
40008005	Now when Yeshua came into Capernaum , a centurion came begging for help .
40008006	“ Master , ” he said , “ my servant is lying at home paralyzed , horribly tormented . ”
40008007	Yeshua said to him , “ I’ll come and heal him . ”
40008008	But the centurion said , “ Master , I’m not worthy to have You come under my roof . But just say the word and my servant will be healed .
40008009	For I also am a man under authority , with soldiers under me . I say to this one , ‘ Go ! ’ and he goes ; and to another , ‘ Come ! ’ and he comes ; and to my servant , ‘ Do this ! ’ and he does it . ”
40008010	Now when Yeshua heard this , He marveled and said to those who were following , “ Amen , I tell you , I have not found anyone in Israel with such great faith !
40008011	Moreover , I tell you that many will come from the east and the west , and they will recline at table with Abraham and Isaac and Jacob in the kingdom of heaven .

40008014	And when Yeshua came into Peter’s house , He saw Peter’s mother-in-law lying down , sick with a fever .
40008015	Yeshua touched her hand , and the fever left her . Then she got up and began to take care of Him .
40008016	When evening came , the people brought to Him many who were afflicted by demons . He forced out the spirits with a word and healed all who were sick .
40008017	So was fulfilled what was spoken through Isaiah the prophet , saying , “ He Himself took our sicknesses and carried away our diseases . ”
40008018	Now when Yeshua saw a crowd around Him , He gave orders to go to the other side of the sea .
40008019	Then a Torah scholar came to Him and said , “ Teacher , I will follow You wherever You go . ”
40008020	Yeshua tells him , “ Foxes have dens and birds of the air have nests , but the Son of Man has nowhere to lay His head . ”
40008021	Then another of the disciples said , “ Master , first let me go and bury my father . ”
40008022	But Yeshua tells him , “ Follow Me , and let the dead bury their own dead . ”
40008023	As He got into the boat , His disciples followed Him .
40008024	Suddenly a great storm arose on the sea , so that the boat was being covered by the waves . But Yeshua kept on sleeping .
40008025	So they came and woke Him up , saying , “ Master , save us ! We’re perishing ! ”
40008026	He said to them , “ Why are you afraid , O you of little faith ? ” Then He got up and rebuked the winds and the sea , and it became totally calm .
40008027	The men were amazed , saying , “ What kind of person is this ? Even the winds and the sea obey Him ! ”
40008028	When He came to the other side , into the region of the Gadarenes , two demon-plagued men coming from the graveyard met Him . They were so violent that no one could pass by that way .
40008029	And they screamed , “ What’s between You and us , Ben-Elohim ? Have You come here to torment us , before the appointed time ? ”
40008030	Now a large herd of pigs was feeding some distance away from them .
40008031	The demons kept begging Him , “ If You drive us out , send us into the herd of pigs . ”
40008032	And He told them , “ Go ! ” So they came out and went into the pigs , and the whole herd rushed down the cliff into the sea and drowned .
40008033	The herdsmen ran away , went into the town , and told everything , including what had happened to the demon-plagued men .
40008034	The whole town came out to meet Yeshua . And when they saw him , they begged Him to leave their region .
40009001	After getting into a boat , Yeshua crossed over and came to His own town .
40009002	Just then , some people brought to Him a paralyzed man lying on a cot . And seeing their faith , Yeshua said to the paralyzed man , “ Take courage , son ! Your sins are forgiven . ”
40009003	Then some of the Torah scholars said among themselves , “ This fellow blasphemes ! ”
40009004	And knowing their thoughts , Yeshua said , “ Why are you entertaining evil in your hearts ?
40009005	For which is easier , to say , ‘ Your sins are forgiven , ’ or to say , ‘ Get up and walk ’ ?
40009006	But so you may know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to pardon sins . . . ” Then He tells the paralyzed man , “ Get up , take your cot and go home . ”
40009007	And he got up and went home .
40009008	When the crowd saw it , they were afraid and glorified God , who had given such authority to men .
40009009	As Yeshua was passing by from there , He saw a man named Matthew sitting at the tax collector’s booth . He said to him , “ Follow Me . ” And he got up and followed Him .
40009010	Now it happened that when Yeshua was reclining at the table in the house , many tax collectors and sinners came and were reclining with Yeshua and His disciples .
40009011	When the Pharisees saw this , they said to His disciples , “ Why does this Teacher of yours eat with tax collectors and sinners ? ”
40009012	But when He heard this , Yeshua said , “ Those who are healthy have no need for a doctor , but those who are sick do .
40009013	Now go and learn what this means : ‘ Mercy I desire , and not sacrifice . ’ For I didn’t come to call the righteous , but the sinful . ”
40009014	Then John’s disciples came to Him , saying , “ Why do we and the Pharisees fast , but Your disciples do not fast ? ”
40009015	And Yeshua said to them , “ The guests of the bridegroom cannot mourn while the bridegroom is with them , can they ? But the days will come when the bridegroom is taken away from them , and then they will fast .
40009016	“ And no one puts a patch of unshrunk cloth on an old garment , for the patch pulls away from the garment and a worse tear happens .
40009017	Nor do they put new wine into old wineskins . Otherwise the skins burst , and the wine spills out and the skins are ruined . But they put new wine into fresh wineskins , and both are preserved . ”
40009018	Just as He was saying these things to them , a synagogue leader came and began to bow before Him , saying , “ My daughter has just died , but come lay Your hand on her and she will live . ”
40009019	And Yeshua got up and began to follow him , with His disciples .
40009020	Just then a woman , losing blood for twelve years , came from behind and touched the tzitzit of His garment .
40009021	For she kept saying to herself , “ If only I touch His garment , I will be healed . ”
40009022	But then Yeshua turned and saw her . “ Take heart , daughter , ” He said , “ your faith has made you well . ” That very hour the woman was healed .
40009023	When Yeshua came into the synagogue leader’s house and saw the flute players and the noisy crowd wailing ,
40009024	He said , “ Go away , for the girl isn’t dead , but sleeping . ” And they began jeering at Him .
40009025	But when the crowd had been cleared out , He went in and took her hand , and the girl got up .
40009026	And news of this spread all around that region .
40009027	As Yeshua went on from there , two blind men followed Him , crying out , “ Ben-David , have mercy on us ! ”
40009028	When He went into the house , the blind men came to Him . And Yeshua said to them , “ Do you believe that I am able to do this ? ” “ Yes , Master , ” they said to Him .
40009029	Then He touched their eyes , saying , “ According to your faith , let it be done for you . ”
40009030	And their eyes were opened . And Yeshua warned them sternly , “ See that no one knows . ”
40009031	But they went out and spread the news about Him all around that region .
40009032	As they were going out , a mute man plagued by a demon was brought to Him .
40009033	After the demon was driven out , the mute man started speaking . The crowds were astounded , saying , “ Never has anything like this been seen in Israel ! ”
40009034	But the Pharisees were saying , “ By the prince of demons He drives out demons . ”
40009035	Now Yeshua was going around all the towns and villages , teaching in their synagogues and proclaiming the Good News of the kingdom , and healing every kind of disease and sickness .
40009036	When He saw the crowds , He felt compassion for them , because they were harassed and helpless , like sheep without a shepherd .
40009037	Then He said to His disciples , “ The harvest is plentiful , but the workers are few .
40009038	Therefore pray to the Lord of the harvest that He may send out workers into His harvest field . ”
40010001	Yeshua summoned His twelve disciples and gave them authority over unclean spirits , so they could drive them out and heal every kind of disease and sickness .
40010002	Now these are the names of the twelve shlichim : first , Simon , called Peter , and his brother Andrew ; Jacob the son of Zebedee and John his brother ;
40010003	Philip and Bartholomew ; Thomas and Matthew the tax collector ; Jacob , the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus ;

40010005	Yeshua sent out these twelve and ordered them , “ Do not go to the Gentiles , and do not enter into any Samaritan town .
40010006	But go instead to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
40010007	As you go , proclaim , ‘ The kingdom of heaven has come near ! ’
40010008	Heal the sick , raise the dead , cleanse those with tzara’at , drive out demons . Freely you received , freely give .
40010009	Do not get gold or silver or copper for your money belts ,
40010010	or a bag for the journey , or two shirts , or sandals , or a walking stick ; for the worker is entitled to his food .
40010011	“ Whatever town or village you shall enter , find out who in it is worthy and stay there until you leave .
40010012	As you come into the house , greet it .
40010013	If the household is worthy , let your shalom come upon it . But if it’s not worthy , let your shalom return to you .
40010014	And whoever will not receive you or listen to your words , as you leave that house or that town , shake the dust off your feet .
40010015	Amen , I tell you , it will be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrah on the Day of Judgment than for that town .
40010016	“ Behold , I am sending you out as sheep in the midst of wolves , so be wise as serpents and innocent as doves .
40010017	But beware of men , for they will hand you over to the courts and flog you in their synagogues .
40010018	You will be brought before governors and kings because of Me , as a witness to them and to the Gentiles .
40010019	But when they hand you over , do not worry about how or what you should say , for it shall be given to you in that hour what you should say .
40010020	For it is not you speaking , but the Ruach of your Father speaking through you .
40010021	“ Brother will betray brother to death , and a father his child ; and children will rise up against their parents and have them put to death .
40010022	And you will be hated by all because of My name , but the one who endures to the end shall be saved .
40010023	Whenever they persecute you in one city , flee to the next . Amen , I tell you , you will never finish going through the cities of Israel before the Son of Man comes .
40010024	“ A disciple is not above his teacher , nor a slave above his master .
40010025	It is enough for the disciple to become like his teacher , and the slave like his master . If they have called the head of the house beelzebul , how much more the members of his household !
40010026	“ So do not fear them , for there is nothing concealed that will not be revealed and nothing hidden that will not be made known .
40010027	What I tell you in the darkness , speak in the light ; and what you hear in your ear , proclaim from the housetops !
40010028	And do not fear those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul . Instead , fear the One who is able to destroy both soul and body in Gehenna .
40010029	“ Are not two sparrows sold for a penny ? Yet not one of them shall fall to the ground apart from your Father’s consent .
40010030	But even the hairs of your head are all numbered .
40010031	So do not fear ; you are worth more than many sparrows .
40010032	“ Therefore whoever acknowledges Me before men , I will also acknowledge him before My Father who is in heaven .
40010033	But whoever denies Me before men , I will also deny him before My Father who is in heaven .
40010034	“ Do not think that I came to bring shalom on the earth ; I did not come to bring shalom , but a sword .
40010035	For I have come to set ‘ a man against his father , a daughter against her mother , and a daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law ;
40010036	and a man’s enemies will be the members of his household . ’
40010037	“ He who loves father or mother more than Me isn’t worthy of Me , and he who loves son or daughter more than Me isn’t worthy of Me .
40010038	And whoever does not take up his cross and follow after Me isn’t worthy of Me .
40010039	He who finds his life will lose it , and he who loses his life for My sake will find it .
40010040	“ He who receives you receives Me , and he who receives Me receives the One who sent Me .
40010041	He who receives a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet’s reward , and he who receives a tzaddik in the name of a tzaddik shall receive a tzaddik’s reward .
40010042	And whoever gives to one of these little ones even a cup of cold water in the name of a disciple , amen I tell you , he shall never lose his reward . ”

40012001	At that time Yeshua went through the grain fields on Shabbat . His disciples became hungry and began to pluck heads of grain and eat them .
40012002	But when the Pharisees saw this , they said to Him , “ Look , Your disciples are doing what is not permitted on Shabbat . ”
40012003	But He said to them , “ Haven’t you read what David did when he became hungry , and those with him ?
40012004	How he entered into the house of God , and they ate the showbread , which was not permitted for him to eat , nor for those with him , but only for the kohanim ?
40012005	Or haven’t you read in the Torah that on Shabbat the kohanim in the Temple break Shabbat and yet are innocent ?
40012006	But I tell you that something greater than the Temple is here .
40012007	If you had known what this means , ‘ I desire mercy , not sacrifice , ’ you wouldn’t have condemned the innocent .
40012008	For the Son of Man is Lord of Shabbat . ”
40012009	Leaving from there , He went into their synagogue .

40012011	He said to them , “ What man among you will not grab his sheep and lift it out , if it falls into a pit on Shabbat ?
40012012	How much more valuable then is a man than a sheep ! Therefore it is permitted to do good on Shabbat . ”
40012013	Then He said to the man , “ Stretch out your hand . ” And he stretched it out and it was restored , as healthy as the other .
40012014	But the Pharisees went out and plotted against Him , how they might destroy Him .

40012020	A crushed reed He will not break , and a smoldering wick he will not snuff out , until He brings forth justice to victory .

40012022	Then a demon-plagued man , who was blind and mute , was brought to Yeshua ; and He healed him , so that he spoke and saw .
40012023	All the crowds were astounded and saying , “ This can’t be Ben-David , can it ? ”
40012024	But hearing this , the Pharisees said , “ This fellow drives out demons only by beelzebul , the ruler of demons . ”
40012025	Knowing their thoughts , Yeshua said to them , “ Every kingdom divided against itself is destroyed , and every city or house divided against itself will not stand .
40012026	If satan drives out satan , he is divided against himself ; how then will his kingdom stand ?
40012027	And if I drive out demons by beelzebul , by whom do your sons drive them out ? For this reason , they will be your judges .
40012028	But if I drive out demons by the Ruach Elohim , then the kingdom of God has come upon you .
40012029	Or how can one enter a strong man’s house and carry off his property , unless he first ties up the strong man ? Then he will thoroughly plunder his house .
40012030	He who is not with Me is against Me , and he who does not gather with Me scatters .

40012033	“ Either make the tree good and its fruit good , or make the tree rotten and its fruit rotten ; for the tree is known by its fruit .
40012034	You brood of vipers ! How can you who are evil say anything good ? For from the overflow of the heart the mouth speaks .
40012035	The good man from his good treasury brings forth good , and the evil man from his evil treasury brings forth evil .
40012036	But I tell you that on the Day of Judgment , men will give account for every careless word they speak .
40012037	For by your words you will be justified , and by your words you will be condemned . ”
40012038	Then some of the Torah scholars and Pharisees answered Him , “ Teacher , we want to see a sign from You . ”

40012040	For just as Jonah was in the belly of the great fish for three days and three nights , so the Son of Man will be in the heart of the earth for three days and three nights .
40012041	The men of Nineveh will rise up at the judgment with this generation and condemn it , because they repented at the preaching of Jonah . And behold , something greater than Jonah is here .
40012042	The Queen of the South will rise up at the judgment with this generation and condemn it , for she came from the ends of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon . And behold , something greater than Solomon is here .
40012043	“ Now when an unclean spirit goes out of a man , it passes through waterless places looking for rest and doesn’t find it .
40012044	Then it says , ‘ I’ll go back home where I came from . ’ And when it comes , it finds the house vacant , swept clean , and put in order .
40012045	Then it goes and brings along seven other spirits more evil than itself , and they go in and live there . And that man’s last condition becomes worse than the first . So also will it be for this evil generation . ”
40012046	While Yeshua was still speaking to the crowds , His mother and brothers were standing outside , trying to speak to Him .

40013001	On that day after Yeshua left the house , He was sitting by the sea .
40013002	And large crowds gathered around Him ; so He got into a boat and sat down , and the whole crowd stood on the shore .
40013003	And He told them many things in parables , saying , “ Behold , a sower went out to spread some seed .
40013004	As he was scattering the seed , some seeds fell by the road ; and the birds came and ate them up .
40013005	Other seeds fell on rocky ground , where they didn’t have much soil . They sprang up immediately , because the soil wasn’t deep .
40013006	But when the sun came up , they were scorched ; and because they had no roots , they withered away .
40013007	Other seeds fell among the thorns , and the thorns grew and choked them out .
40013008	But others fell on good soil and were producing fruit . They yielded a crop — some a hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
40013009	He who has ears , let him hear . ”
40013010	Then the disciples came to Him and said , “ Why do You speak to them in parables ? ”
40013011	And He replied to them , “ To you has been given to know the secrets of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it has not been given .
40013012	For whoever has , to him more will be given and he will have plenty . But whoever does not have , even what he has will be taken away from him .
40013013	For this reason I speak to them in parables , because seeing they do not see , and hearing they do not hear nor do they understand .
40013014	” And in them the prophecy of Isaiah is being fulfilled , which says , ‘ You will keep on hearing but will never understand ; you will keep looking , but will never see .
40013015	For the heart of this people has become dull , their ears can barely hear , and they have shut their eyes . Otherwise they might see with their eyes , hear with their ears , and understand with their hearts . Then they would turn back , and I would heal them . ’

40013018	“ You then , hear the parable of the sower .
40013019	When anyone hears the word of the kingdom and doesn’t understand it , the evil one comes and snatches away what was sown in his heart . This is the one having been sown along the road .
40013020	“ The one sown on rocky ground , this is the one who hears the word and immediately receives it with joy .
40013021	Yet he has no root himself but lasts only a short while ; and when trouble or persecution comes because of the word , immediately he falls away .
40013022	“ But the one sown among the thorns , this is the one who hears the word ; and the worries of the world and the seduction of wealth choke the word , and it becomes unfruitful .
40013023	“ Now the one sown on the good soil , this is the one who hears the word and understands . He indeed bears fruit , yielding a hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty times what was sown . ”
40013024	He presented to them another parable , saying , “ The kingdom of heaven is like a man who sowed good seed in his field .
40013025	But while the men were sleeping , his enemy came and sowed weeds among the wheat and went away .
40013026	Now when the stalk sprouted and produced grain , then the weeds also appeared .
40013027	So the slaves of the landowner came and said to him , ‘ Master , didn’t you sow good seed in your field ? Then where did the weeds come from ? ’
40013028	But he replied , ‘ An enemy did this . ’ Now the slaves say to him , ‘ Do you want us , then , to go out and gather them up ? ’
40013029	But he says , ‘ No , for while you are gathering up the weeds , you may uproot the wheat with them .
40013030	Let both grow together until the harvest . At harvest time , I will tell the reapers , “ First , gather up the weeds and tie them in bundles to burn them up ; but gather the wheat into my barn . ’ ”
40013031	He presented to them another parable , saying , “ The kingdom of heaven is like a mustard seed , which a man took and planted in his field .
40013032	It’s the smallest of all seeds ; yet when it’s full grown , it’s greater than the other herbs . It becomes like a tree , so that the birds of the air come and nest in its branches . ”
40013033	He told them another parable , “ The kingdom of heaven is like hametz , which a woman took and hid in three measures of flour , until it was all leavened . ”
40013034	All these things Yeshua spoke to the crowds in parables . And apart from a parable , He wasn’t speaking to them ,
40013035	in order to fulfill what was spoken through the prophet , saying , “ I will open My mouth in parables , I will utter things hidden since the foundation of the world . ”
40013036	Then He sent the crowds away and went into the house . His disciples came to Him , saying , “ Explain to us the parable of the weeds of the field . ”
40013037	He answered , “ The one sowing the good seed is the Son of Man ,
40013038	and the field is the world . And the good seed , these are the sons of the kingdom ; and the weeds are the sons of the evil one .
40013039	The enemy who sowed them is the devil , the harvest is the end of the age , and the reapers are angels .
40013040	Therefore just as the weeds are gathered up and burned with fire , so shall it be at the end of the age .
40013041	The Son of Man will send forth His angels , and they will gather out of His kingdom all stumbling blocks and those who practice lawlessness .
40013042	They will throw them into the fiery furnace ; in that place will be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
40013043	Then the righteous will shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . He who has ears , let him hear !
40013044	“ The kingdom of heaven is like a treasure hidden in the field , which a man found and hid . And because of his joy , he goes out and sells all that he has and buys that field .
40013045	“ Again , the kingdom of heaven is like a merchant searching for fine pearls .
40013046	Upon finding a pearl of great value , he went out and sold all that he had and bought it .
40013047	“ Again , the kingdom of heaven is like a dragnet that was cast into the sea , gathering things of every kind .
40013048	When it was filled , they pulled it ashore ; and they sat down and gathered up the good into containers , but threw the bad away .
40013049	So it will be at the end of the age . The angels will come forth and separate the wicked from among the righteous
40013050	and throw them into the fiery furnace ; in that place will be weeping and gnashing of teeth .

40013052	Then He said to them , “ Therefore every Torah scholar discipled for the kingdom of heaven is like the master of a household who brings out of his treasure both new things and old . ”
40013053	Now when Yeshua had finished these parables , He left that place .

40013056	And His sisters , aren’t they all with us ? So where does He get all these things ? ”

40014001	At that time Herod the tetrarch heard the report about Yeshua .
40014002	He said to his servants , “ This is John the Immerser — he has risen from the dead ! Because of this , these powers are at work in Him . ”

40014004	because John had been telling him , “ It is not permitted for you to have her . ”

40014006	But when Herod’s birthday celebration came , the daughter of Herodias danced before them and pleased Herod ,
40014007	so much that he promised with an oath to give her whatever she might ask .
40014008	Prompted by her mother , she said , “ Give me the head of John the Immerser , here on a platter ! ”

40014013	Now when Yeshua heard this , He went away from there privately by boat to an isolated place . But when the crowds heard , they followed Him on foot from the towns .
40014014	As Yeshua came ashore , He saw a large crowd and felt compassion for them and healed their sick .
40014015	When it became evening , the disciples came to Him , saying , “ This place is isolated , and the hour is already late . Send the crowds away so they can go into the villages and buy food for themselves . ”
40014016	But Yeshua said to them , “ They don’t need to leave — you give them something to eat . ”
40014017	“ We have nothing here except five loaves and two fish , ” they said to Him .
40014018	“ Bring them here to Me , ” He said .
40014019	Ordering the crowd to recline on the grass , He took the five loaves and the two fish ; and looking up to heaven , He offered the bracha . After breaking the loaves , He gave them to the disciples , and the disciples gave them to the crowds .
40014020	They all ate and were satisfied , and the disciples picked up twelve baskets full of broken pieces left over .

40015001	Then some Pharisees and Torah scholars came to Yeshua from Jerusalem . They said ,

40021028	“ Now what do you think ? A man had two sons , and he went to the first and said , ‘ Son , go work in the vineyard today . ’

40021033	“ Listen to another parable . There was a master of a household who planted a vineyard . He put a hedge around it , dug a winepress in it , and built a tower . Then He leased it to some tenant farmers and went on a journey .
40021034	Now when fruit season drew near , he sent his servants to the tenants to collect his fruit .

40026074	Then he began to curse and to swear an oath : “ I do not know the Man ! ” Right then , a rooster crowed .
40026075	Then Peter reminded himself of the word Yeshua had said : “ Before the rooster crows , you will deny Me three times . ” And he went away and wept bitterly .
40027001	When daybreak came , the ruling kohanim and elders of the people conspired against Yeshua to put Him to death .
40027002	And they tied Him up , led Him away , and handed Him over to Pilate , the governor .
40027003	Then Judah , His betrayer , saw that Yeshua had been condemned . Feeling remorse , he brought the thirty silver pieces back to the ruling kohanim and elders ,
40027004	saying , “ I’ve sinned , betraying innocent blood ! ” But they said , “ What’s that to us ? You see to it yourself ! ”
40027005	After tossing the silver into the Temple sanctuary , he left . Then he went off and hanged himself .
40027006	But the ruling kohanim took the silver pieces and said , “ It is not permitted to put these in the treasury , since it is blood money . ”
40027007	So after they conferred , they bought with them the potter’s field , as a cemetery for strangers .

40027016	At that time they had a notorious prisoner , called Yeshua Bar-Abba .
40027017	So when they were gathered together , Pilate said to them , “ Which one do you want me to release for you ? Yeshua who is Bar-Abba , or Yeshua who is called Messiah ? ”
40027018	For he knew that they had handed Him over out of envy .

40027020	Now the ruling kohanim and elders persuaded the crowds that they should ask for Bar-Abba and destroy Yeshua .

40027023	But Pilate said , “ Why ? What evil has He done ? ” But they kept shouting all the more , saying , “ Let Him be executed ! ”

40027025	All the people answered and said , “ His blood be on us and on our children ! ”
40027026	Then he released to them Bar-Abba . And after he had Yeshua scourged , he handed Him over to be crucified .

40027028	They stripped Him and put a scarlet robe around Him .

40027030	They spat on Him , and they took the staff and beat Him over and over on the head .

40027035	And when they had crucified Him , they divided His clothing among themselves by casting lots .

40027038	Then two outlaws were executed with Him , one on the right and one on the left .
40027039	Those passing by were jeering at Him , shaking their heads
