41004015	These are the ones beside the road where the word is sown . Whenever they hear , satan comes quickly and takes away the word that has been sown in them .
41004016	“ These are the ones sown on rocky ground . When they hear the word , immediately they receive it with joy .
41004017	And they have no root in themselves but last only a short while . When trouble or persecution comes because of the word , immediately they fall away .
41004018	“ And others are the ones sown among the thorns . They have heard the word ;
41004019	but the worries of the world , the seduction of wealth , and the desires for other things enter in and choke the word , and it becomes unfruitful .
41004020	“ And those are the ones sown on the good soil . They hear the word and accept it and produce fruit , thirty , sixty , and a hundredfold . ”
41004021	He also was saying to them , “ Is a lamp put under a basket or a bed ? No , shouldn’t it be placed on a lampstand ?
41004022	For there is nothing hidden that will not be revealed , nor anything kept secret except that it would come to light .
41004023	If anyone has ears to hear , let him hear . ”
41004024	Then He continued , “ Pay attention to what you hear . With the measure you use , it will be measured to you ; and more will be added to you .
41004025	For whoever has , to him more will be given . And whoever does not have , even what he has will be taken away from him . ”
41004026	And He was saying , “ The kingdom of God is like when a man spreads seed on the soil
41004027	and falls asleep at night and gets up by day , and the seed sprouts and grows . He himself doesn’t know how .
41004028	Automatically , the earth brings forth a crop — first the blade , then the head , then the full grain in the head .
41004029	But when the grain is ready , at once he sends in the sickle , for the harvest has come . ”
41004030	Yeshua also said , “ How should we picture the kingdom of God ? Or by what story shall we present it ?
41004031	It is like a mustard seed when it’s planted in the ground . Though the smallest of all seeds in the earth , yet when planted it grows up and becomes the largest of all the herbs . It puts forth big branches , so the birds of the air can nest in its shade . ”
41004033	With many such parables He used to tell them the word , as much as they were able to hear .
41004034	But apart from a parable , He wasn’t speaking to them . Yet when they were alone , to His own disciples He would explain everything .
41004035	Now on that same day in the evening , He says to them , “ Let’s cross over to the other side . ”
41004036	After leaving the crowd , they take Him along in the boat , just as He was . And other boats were with Him .
41004037	A great windstorm arises , and the waves were rushing into the boat . The boat was beginning to fill up .
41004038	But Yeshua was in the back of the boat , sleeping on a pillow . They wake Him up and say to Him , “ Teacher , don’t you care that we are perishing ? ”
41004039	So He woke up and rebuked the wind . And He said to the sea , “ Quiet ! Be still ! ” Then the wind stopped , and it became totally calm .
41004040	And He said to them , “ Why are you afraid ? Even now you have no faith ? ”
41004041	They were struck with awe and said to one another , “ Who is this ? Even the wind and the sea obey Him ! ”
41005001	They came to the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gerasenes .
41005002	As soon as Yeshua got out of the boat , a man from the graveyard with an unclean spirit met Him .
41005003	He lived among the tombs , and no one could restrain him anymore , even with a chain .
41005004	For he had often been bound with shackles and chains , but the chains had been ripped apart by him and the shackles broken . No one was strong enough to tame him .
41005005	And through it all , night and day , at the graveyard and in the mountains , he kept screaming and gashing himself with stones .
41005006	When he saw Yeshua from a distance , he ran and bowed down before Him .
41005007	Crying out with a loud voice , he said , “ What’s between You and me , Yeshua , Ben El Elyon ? I’m warning you , in the name of God , do not torment me ! ”
41005008	For Yeshua had said to him , “ Come out of the man , you unclean spirit ! ”
41005009	Then Yeshua began questioning him , “ What is your name ? ” And he answered , “ My name is Legion , for we are many . ”
41005010	He kept begging Him not to send them out of the country .
41005011	Now a large herd of pigs was feeding on the hillside nearby .
41005012	The unclean spirits urged Him , saying , “ Send us to the pigs , so we may enter them . ”
41005013	So Yeshua gave them permission . The unclean spirits came out and entered the pigs . And the herd , about two thousand in number , rushed down the cliff and were drowned in the sea .
41005014	The herdsmen ran away and told the town and countryside , and they came to see what had happened .
41005015	Now they came to Yeshua and saw the madman who had had the legion . He was sitting there , dressed in clothes and in his right mind . The people were scared .
41005016	Those who had seen it described in detail what had happened to the man plagued by a demon , and they also told about the pigs .
41005017	And they began to beg Yeshua to leave their country .
41005018	As He was getting into the boat , the man who had been infested with demons kept begging to remain with Him .
41005019	Yeshua did not let him , but He told him , “ Go home to your friends and tell them how much Adonai has done for you , how He showed you mercy . ”
41005020	So he went away and began to proclaim in the Decapolis how much Yeshua had done for him . And all were amazed .
41005021	When Yeshua had crossed over in the boat again to the other side , a big crowd gathered around Him ; and He was by the sea .
41005022	Then one of the synagogue leaders , named Jairus , comes . Seeing Him , he falls at His feet .
41005023	He begs Him a great deal , saying , “ My little daughter is near death ! Come and lay hands on her so that she may be healed and live ! ”
41005024	So Yeshua went off with him , and a big crowd was following Him and pressing upon Him .
41005025	And there was a woman with a blood flow for twelve years ,
41005026	who had suffered much under many doctors . She had spent all that she had without benefit ; instead , she grew worse .
41005027	When she heard about Yeshua , she came through the crowd from behind and touched His garment .
41005028	For she kept saying , “ If I touch even His clothes , I shall be healed . ”
41005029	Right away the blood flow stopped , and she felt in her body that she was healed from her disease .
41005030	At once Yeshua , knowing in Himself that power had gone out from Him , turned around in the crowd and said , “ Who touched My clothes ? ”
41005031	His disciples responded , “ You see the crowd pressing upon You and you say , ‘ Who touched Me ? ’ ”
41005032	But He kept looking around to see who had done this .
41005033	But the woman , scared and shaking , knowing what had happened to her , came and fell down before Him and told Him the whole truth .
41005034	And He said to her , “ Daughter , your faith has made you well . Go in shalom and be healed from your disease . ”
41005035	While Yeshua was still speaking , messengers come from the house of the synagogue leader , saying , “ Your daughter is dead . Why do you still trouble the Teacher ? ”
41005036	But ignoring what they said , Yeshua tells the synagogue leader , “ Do not be afraid ; only believe . ”
41005037	He did not let anyone follow Him except Peter , Jacob , and John , the brother of Jacob .
41005038	They come to the house of the synagogue leader . He sees a commotion , people weeping and wailing loudly .
41005039	After entering , He said to them , “ Why make such a fuss and weep ? The child didn’t die , but is sleeping . ”
41005040	They start jeering at Him . But after sending all of them out , He takes the child’s father and mother , and those with Him , and enters where the child was .
41005041	Then , taking hold of the child’s hand , He tells her , “ Talitha koum , ” which means , “ Little girl , I say to you , get up . ”
41005042	Immediately , the girl stood up and began to walk around ! ( She was twelve years old . ) And they were overcome with astonishment .
41005043	But He gave them strict orders that no one should know about this , and He said something to eat should be given to her .
41006001	Now Yeshua went out from there , and He comes to His hometown , and His disciples follow Him .
41006002	When Shabbat came , He began to teach in the synagogue . Many listeners were amazed , saying , “ Where did this fellow get these things ? What’s this wisdom given to Him ? Such miracles are done by His hands !
41006003	Isn’t this the carpenter , the son of Miriam , and the brother of Jacob and Joseph and Judah and Simon ? Aren’t His sisters here with us ? ” And they took offense at Him .
41006004	Then Yeshua began saying to them , “ A prophet is not without honor except in his hometown , among his relatives , and in his own house . ”
41006005	He was not able to do any miracle , except that He laid hands on a few sick people and healed them .
41006006	And He was astonished because of their unbelief . And He was going around among the villages teaching .
41006007	Yeshua summoned the Twelve , and He began to send them out two by two . And He gave them authority over the unclean spirits .
41006008	He directed them to take nothing for the journey except a walking stick — no bread , no bag , no copper coin in their belt —
41006009	but to wear sandals and not to put on two shirts .
41006010	He was also telling them , “ Wherever you enter a house , stay there until you leave that place .
41006011	And whatever place will not receive you or listen to you , as you leave from there , shake the dust off the bottom of your feet as a witness against them . ”
41006012	So they went out and proclaimed that all should repent ,
41006013	and they were driving out many demons and anointing with oil many who were sick and healing them .
41006014	King Herod heard , for Yeshua’s name had become known . Some were saying , “ John the Immerser has risen from the dead ! Because of this , these powers are at work in Him ! ”
41006015	But others were saying , “ It’s Elijah ! ” Still others were saying , “ It’s a prophet , like one of the prophets of old . ”
41006016	But when Herod heard , he said , “ John , the one I beheaded , has been raised ! ”
41006017	For Herod himself sent and arrested John and bound him in prison for the sake of Herodias , the wife of his brother Philip , because Herod had married her .
41006018	For John had been telling Herod , “ It is not permitted for you to have your brother’s wife . ”
41006019	Now Herodias had a grudge against John and wanted to kill him , but she wasn’t able .
41006020	For Herod was in awe of John and kept him safe , knowing him to be a righteous and holy man . When he listened to John he was confused , but he still listened gladly .
41006021	An opportunity came — when Herod , on his birthday , gave a banquet for his high officials , military brass , and the leaders of the Galilee .
41006022	When the daughter of Herodias came in and danced , she pleased Herod and those reclining with him . And the king said to the girl , “ Ask me for whatever you want , and I’ll give it to you ! ”
41006023	He vowed to her , “ Whatever you ask of me I’ll give you , up to half of my kingdom ! ”
41006024	She left the room and said to her mother , “ What should I ask for ? ” Her mother said , “ The head of John the Immerser ! ”
41006025	Immediately she rushed to the king and requested , “ I want you to give me , right now , the head of John the Immerser on a platter ! ”
41006026	The king became very sorrowful ; but because of his oaths and those reclining with him , he didn’t want to refuse her .
41006027	Immediately the king sent an executioner and gave orders to bring John’s head . And the executioner went out and beheaded John in the prison ,
41006028	brought his head on a platter , and gave it to the girl ; and the girl gave it to her mother .
41006029	When John’s disciples heard , they came and took his body and laid it in a tomb .
41006030	The twelve shlichim gathered together with Yeshua , and they reported to Him all they had done and taught .
41006031	There were many coming and going , and they had no time even to eat . So He said to them , “ Come away by yourselves to an isolated place and rest awhile . ”
41006032	So they left privately by boat to an isolated place .
41006033	However , the people saw them leaving , and many recognized them . They ran on foot from all the towns to get there ahead of them .
41006034	As Yeshua came ashore , He saw a large crowd and felt compassion for them , because they were like sheep without a shepherd . So He taught them many things .
41006035	When it was already late , His disciples came to Him and said , “ This place is isolated , and the hour is already late .
41006036	Send these people away so they can go into the nearby countryside and the villages and buy themselves something to eat . ”
41006037	But He answered and said to them , “ You give them something to eat ! ” And they said to Him , “ Should we go and spend two hundred denarii on bread to give them something to eat ? ”
41006038	Then He said to them , “ How many loaves do you have ? Go and see . ” When they found out , they said , “ Five , and two fish . ”
41006039	Then Yeshua made them all sit down in groups on the green grass .
41006040	So they reclined in groups of hundreds and fifties .
41006041	And He took the five loaves and the two fish ; and looking up to heaven , He offered the bracha . He broke the loaves and kept giving them to the disciples to serve to the people ; and He divided the two fish among them all .
41006042	They all ate and were satisfied ,
41006043	and the disciples picked up twelve baskets full of broken pieces and fish .
41006044	Now there were five thousand men who ate the loaves .
41006045	Right away , Yeshua made His disciples get into the boat and go ahead of Him to the other side , to Bethsaida , while He Himself was sending the crowd away .
41006046	After leaving them , He went up on the hillside to pray .
41006047	And when evening came , the boat was in the middle of the sea and He was alone on the land .
41006048	He saw the disciples struggling to row , for the wind was against them . Around the fourth watch in the night , Yeshua comes to them , walking on the sea ; and He wanted to pass by them .
41006049	But when they saw Him walking on the sea , they thought He was a ghost and cried out —
41006050	for they all saw Him and were terrified . But immediately , He spoke to them . He said , “ Take courage ! I am . Do not be afraid . ”
41006051	Then He got into the boat with them , and the wind stopped . They were utterly dumbfounded ,
41006052	for they still hadn’t understood about the loaves . Instead , their hearts were hardened .
41006053	After they had crossed over , they came to land at Gennesaret and set anchor there .
41006054	As they got out of the boat , immediately people recognized Yeshua .
41006055	They ran about the region and began to carry around on their mats all those who were in bad shape , to wherever they heard He was .
41006056	And wherever He entered villages , towns , or countryside , people were placing the sick in the marketplaces and begging Him to let them touch even the tzitzit of His garment — and all who touched it were being healed .
41007001	Now the Pharisees and some of the Torah scholars who had come from Jerusalem gathered around Yeshua .
41007002	And they saw that some of His disciples were eating bread with unclean hands , that is , not washed .
41007003	( For the Pharisees and all Jewish people do not eat unless they wash their hands up to the elbow , keeping the tradition of the elders .
41007004	And when they come from the marketplace , they do not eat unless they perform a ritual washing . There are many other traditions they have received and hold , such as the washing of cups , pitchers , copper vessels . )
41007005	The Pharisees and Torah scholars questioned Yeshua , “ Why don’t Your disciples walk according to the tradition of the elders ? Why do they eat bread with unwashed hands ? ”
41007006	And He said to them , “ Rightly did Isaiah prophesy about you hypocrites , as it is written , ‘ This people honors Me with their lips but their heart is far from Me .
41007007	And in vain they worship Me , teaching as doctrines the commandments of men . ’
41007008	Having left behind the commandment of God , you hold on to the tradition of men . ”
41007009	He was also telling them , “ You set aside the commands of God , in order that you may validate your own tradition .
41007010	For Moses said , ‘ Honor your father and your mother , ’ and , ‘ He who speaks evil of father or mother must be put to death . ’
41007011	But you say if anyone tells his father or mother , ‘ Whatever you might have gained from me is korban ( that is , an offering to God ) , ’
41007012	then you no longer permit him to do anything for his father or mother ,
41007013	making void the word of God with your tradition that you’ve handed down . And you do many such things . ”
41007014	Then Yeshua called the crowd again and began saying to them , “ Hear Me , everyone , and understand .
41007015	There is nothing outside the man that can make him unholy by going into him . Rather , it is what comes out of the man that makes the man unholy . ” ( 16 )
41007017	When He had left the crowd and entered the house , His disciples questioned Him about the parable .
41007018	And He said to them , “ Are you then also lacking understanding ? Don’t you grasp that whatever goes into the man cannot make him unholy ?
41007019	For it does not enter into the heart but into the stomach , and then is eliminated , cleaning out all foods . ”
41007020	And He continued , “ It is what comes out of the man that makes the man unholy .
41007021	For from within , out of the heart of men , come evil intentions , sexual immorality , theft , murder ,
41007022	adultery , greed , wickedness , deceit , lustfulness , envy , slander , pride , and foolishness .
41007023	All these evil things come from within and make the man unholy . ”
41007024	Yeshua got up and left from there to the region of Tyre . When He had entered a house , He didn’t want anyone to know ; but He couldn’t escape notice .
41007025	A woman whose little daughter had an unclean spirit heard about Him . She came immediately and fell at His feet .
41007026	The woman was a Greek , from Syrophoenicia . And she kept begging Yeshua to drive the demon out of her daughter .
41007027	He was telling her , “ First let the children get their fill , for it’s not right to take the children’s bread and throw it to the dogs . ”
41007028	“ Yes , Master , ” she said to Him , “ but even the dogs under the table eat the children’s crumbs . ”
41007029	Then He said to her , “ Because of this word , go your way ! The demon has left your daughter . ”
41007030	She went home and found the child lying on the bed , and the demon gone .
41007031	Again He left the region of Tyre and came through Sidon to the Sea of Galilee , within the region of the Decapolis .
41007032	They bring Him a deaf man who had a speech impediment , and they beg Him to lay His hand on him .
41007033	Yeshua took him aside from the crowd to a private place , and He put His fingers in the man’s ears . After spitting , He touched the man’s tongue .
41007034	Looking up to heaven , He says to the man , “ Ephphatha , ” which means “ Be opened ! ”
41007035	Immediately the man’s ears were opened , his tongue was loosened , and he began to speak plainly .
41007036	Yeshua ordered them not to tell anyone . But the more He ordered them , the more they continued proclaiming it .
41007037	People were completely astounded , saying , “ He has done all things well . He makes even the deaf hear and the mute speak ! ”
41008001	In those days , there was another large crowd with nothing to eat , and Yeshua called the disciples . He said to them ,
41008002	“ I have compassion for the crowd , because they’ve stayed with Me for three days now and have nothing to eat .
41008003	If I send them home hungry they’ll pass out on the way , for some of them have come from very far away . ”
41008004	His disciples answered Him , “ How can anyone satisfy these people with bread here in a wasteland ? ”
41008005	“ How many loaves do you have ? ” Yeshua was asking them . “ Seven , ” they said .
41008006	He directed the crowd to recline on the ground . After taking the seven loaves and giving thanks , He broke them and began giving them to His disciples to serve ; and they served them to the crowd .
41008007	They also had a few small fish and , after offering a bracha for them , He commanded these to be served as well .
41008008	They ate and were satisfied , and they picked up the broken pieces left over — seven baskets .
41008009	About four thousand were there , and Yeshua sent them away .
41008010	Right away , He got into the boat with His disciples and went to the area of Dalmanutha .
41008011	The Pharisees came and began to argue with Him , demanding a sign from heaven , to test Him .
41008012	Sighing deeply in His spirit , Yeshua said , “ Why does this generation demand a sign ? Amen , I tell you , no sign will be given to this generation . ”
41008013	Leaving them , He got back into the boat and crossed to the other side .
41008014	Now the disciples had forgotten to take bread , and they had only one loaf in the boat .
41008015	Yeshua was warning them , “ Watch out ! Beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and the leaven of Herod . ”
41008016	They began to discuss with each other that they had no bread .
41008017	And Yeshua , aware of this , said to them , “ Why do you discuss that you have no bread ? You still don’t get it ? Don’t you understand ? Are your hearts hardened ?
41008018	Having eyes , don’t you see ? And having ears , don’t you hear ? And don’t you remember ?
41008019	When I broke the five loaves for the five thousand , how many baskets of leftovers did you pick up ? ” “ Twelve , ” they say to Him .
41008020	“ When I broke the seven loaves for the four thousand , how many baskets of leftovers did you pick up ? ” “ Seven , ” they say to Him .
41008021	He said to them , “ Do you still not understand ? ”
41008022	They come to Bethsaida . Some people bring a blind man to Yeshua and beg Him to touch the man .
41008023	Taking the blind man by the hand , Yeshua brought him outside the village . After spitting on the man’s eyes and laying His hands on him , Yeshua asked the man , “ Do you see anything ? ”
41008024	The man looked up and said , “ I see men ! They look like trees walking about . ”
41008025	Then Yeshua put His hands on the man’s eyes again . The man looked intently , his sight was restored , and he began to see everything clearly .
41008026	Yeshua sent him straight home , saying , “ Don’t even enter the village ! ”
41008027	Now Yeshua and His disciples went out to the villages around Caesarea Philippi . On the way He asked His disciples , “ Who do people say that I am ? ”
41008028	They told Him , “ John the Immerser ; and others Elijah ; but others , one of the prophets . ”
41008029	Then He asked them , “ But who do you say that I am ? ” Peter answered Him , “ You are the Messiah ! ”
41008030	And He warned them not to tell anyone about Him .
41008031	Then He began to teach them that the Son of Man must suffer many things and be rejected by the elders and ruling kohanim and Torah scholars , and be killed , and after three days rise again .
41008032	He was speaking openly about this . And Peter took Him aside and began to rebuke Him .
41008033	But turning around and looking at His disciples , He rebuked Peter . He said , “ Get behind Me , satan ! You are not setting your mind on the things of God , but the things of men . ”
41008034	Then He called the crowd , along with His disciples , and said to them , “ If anyone wants to follow after Me , he must deny himself , take up his cross , and keep following Me .
41008035	For whoever wants to save his life will lose it , but whoever loses his life for My sake and the sake of the Good News will save it .
41008036	For what does it profit a man to gain the whole world , yet forfeit his soul ?
41008037	For what could a man give in exchange for his soul ?
41008038	For whoever is ashamed of Me and My words in this unfaithful and sinful generation , the Son of Man will also be ashamed of him when He comes in the glory of His Father with the holy angels ! ”
41009001	Yeshua was telling them , “ Amen , I tell you , there are some standing here who will never taste death until they see the kingdom of God come with power ! ”
41009002	After six days , Yeshua takes with Him Peter and Jacob and John , and brings them up a high mountain by themselves . And He was transfigured before them .
41009003	His clothes became radiant and brilliantly white , whiter than any launderer on earth could bleach them .
41009004	Then Elijah appeared to them with Moses , and they were talking with Yeshua .
41009005	Peter responds to Yeshua , “ Rabbi , it’s good for us to be here . Let’s make three sukkot — one for You , and one for Moses , and one for Elijah . ”
41009006	( He didn’t know what to say , for they were terrified . )
41009007	Then a cloud came , overshadowing them ; and out of the cloud came a voice , “ This is My Son , whom I love . Listen to Him ! ”
41009008	Suddenly when they looked around , they no longer saw anyone with them except Yeshua .
41009009	As they were coming down from the mountain , Yeshua ordered them not to tell anyone what they had seen , until the Son of Man rose up from the dead .
41009010	They kept this word to themselves , discussing among themselves what it is to rise up from the dead .
41009011	And they questioned Him , saying , “ Why do the Torah scholars say that Elijah must come first ? ”
41009012	Now He told them , “ Indeed Elijah comes first ; he restores all things . And how is it written that the Son of Man must suffer much and be treated with contempt ?
41009013	I tell you that Elijah has come , and they did to him whatever they wanted , just as it is written about him . ”
41009014	When they came to the disciples , they saw a big crowd around them and the Torah scholars arguing with them .
41009015	Suddenly , when the whole crowd saw Yeshua , they were amazed and began running to greet Him .
41009016	He questioned them , “ What are you arguing about with them ? ”
41009017	And a man from the crowd answered Him , “ Teacher , I brought You my son , who has a spirit that makes him mute .
41009018	Whenever it seizes him , it throws him down ; he foams at the mouth , grinds his teeth , and becomes stiff . I told Your disciples to drive it out , but they couldn’t ! ”
41009019	And answering them , He said , “ Oh faithless generation , how long shall I be with you ? How long shall I put up with you ? Bring him to Me . ”
41009020	They brought the boy to Yeshua . When the spirit saw Him , immediately it threw the boy into a convulsion . The boy fell to the ground and began rolling around and foaming at the mouth .
41009021	Yeshua asked the father , “ How long has this been happening to him ? ” “ Since he was a child , ” the man answered .
41009022	“ It has often thrown him into fire or water to destroy him . But if You can do anything , have compassion and help us ! ”
41009023	“ ‘ If You can ’ ? ” Yeshua said to him . “ All things are possible for one who believes ! ”
41009024	Immediately the boy’s father cried out , “ I believe ! Help my unbelief ! ”
41009025	When Yeshua saw that a crowd was gathering fast , He rebuked the unclean spirit , telling it , “ I command you , deaf and mute spirit , come out of him and do not ever enter him again ! ”
41009026	After howling and shaking the boy wildly , it came out . The boy became so much like a corpse that many were saying , “ He’s dead ! ”
41009027	But Yeshua took him by the hand and lifted him , and the boy stood up .
41009028	After Yeshua came into the house , His disciples began questioning Him in private , “ Why couldn’t we drive it out ? ”
41009029	And He said to them , “ This kind cannot come out except by prayer . ”
41009030	They left from there and passed through the Galilee . Yeshua didn’t want anyone to know ,
41009031	for He was teaching His disciples and telling them , “ The Son of Man is going to be delivered into the hands of men , and they will kill Him . And after He is killed , three days later He will rise up . ”
41009032	But the disciples didn’t understand this statement , and they were afraid to question Him about it .
41009033	Then they came to Capernaum . And when Yeshua was in the house , He began to ask the disciples , “ What were you discussing on the way ? ”
41009034	But they kept quiet , because on the way they had argued with one another about who was the greatest .
41009035	Sitting down , He called the Twelve and said to them , “ If any man wants to be first , he shall be least of all and the servant of everyone . ”
41009036	Taking a small child , He set him in the midst of them . And taking him in His arms , He said to them ,
41009037	“ Whoever welcomes one of these children in My name , welcomes Me ; and whoever welcomes Me , welcomes not Me but the One who sent Me . ”
41009038	John said to Him , “ Teacher , we saw someone driving out demons in Your name , and we tried to stop him because he wasn’t following us . ”
41009039	But Yeshua responded , “ Don’t stop him ! No one who does a miracle in My name will be able soon afterward to speak evil about Me .
41009040	He who is not against us is for us .
41009041	For whoever gives you a cup of water to drink in My name because you belong to Messiah , amen I tell you , he will never lose his reward . ”
41009042	“ But whoever causes one of these little ones who trust in Me to stumble , it would be better for him to have a heavy millstone put around his neck and to be thrown into the sea ! ”
41009043	“ And if your hand causes you to stumble , cut it off ! It is better for you to enter into life crippled than , having two hands , to go to Gehenna , into the unquenchable fire .
41009045	And if your foot causes you to stumble , cut it off ! It’s better for you to enter life lame than , having your two feet , to be thrown into Gehenna .
41009047	If your eye causes you to stumble , tear it out ! It is better for you to enter the kingdom of God with one eye than , having two eyes , to be thrown into Gehenna ,
41009048	where ‘ their worm does not die and the fire is not quenched . ’
41009049	“ For everyone will be salted with fire .
41009050	Salt is good ; but if the salt becomes unsalty , with what will you flavor it ? Have salt in yourselves , and keep shalom with one another . ”
41010001	Then getting up from there , Yeshua goes to the region of Judea beyond the Jordan . Again crowds gather around Him , and , as was His custom , He began to teach them once more .
41010002	Pharisees came up , and to test Him they began asking , “ Is it permitted for a man to divorce his wife ? ”
41010003	And He replied to them , “ What did Moses command you ? ”
41010004	The Pharisees said , “ Moses permitted a man to write a bill of divorce and to put her away . ”
41010005	But Yeshua said to them , “ Because of your hardness of heart he wrote you this commandment !
41010006	But from the beginning of creation , God ‘ made them male and female .
41010007	For this reason a man shall leave his father and mother and be joined to his wife ,
41010008	and the two shall become one flesh . ’ So they are no longer two , but one flesh .
41010009	Therefore what God has joined together , let no man separate ! ”
41010010	In the house , the disciples began questioning Him about this again .
41010011	And He said to them , “ Whoever divorces his wife and marries another commits adultery against her .
41010012	And if she divorces her husband and marries another , she is committing adultery . ”

41010014	But when Yeshua saw this , He got angry . He told them , “ Let the little children come to Me ! Do not hinder them , for the kingdom of God belongs to such as these .

41010020	The man responded , “ Teacher , all these I have kept since my youth ! ”
41010021	Looking at him , Yeshua loved him and said , “ One thing you lack . Go , sell as much as you have , and give to the poor ; and you will have treasure in heaven . Then come , follow Me . ”
41010022	But at this statement , the man became sad and went away grieving , for he had much property .
41010023	Then looking around , Yeshua says to His disciples , “ How hard it will be for the rich to enter the kingdom of God ! ”

41010025	It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter the kingdom of God . ”
41010026	The disciples were even more astonished , saying among themselves , “ Then who can be saved ? ”

41010032	They were on the way going up to Jerusalem , and Yeshua was going ahead of them . And they were amazed , while those who followed were fearful . Again Yeshua took the Twelve aside and began to tell them what was going to happen to Him .

41010046	Then they came to Jericho . Now as Yeshua was leaving Jericho with His disciples and a large crowd , Bartimaeus the son of Timaeus , a blind beggar , was sitting by the roadside .

41010048	Many were warning him to be quiet ; but he kept crying out all the more , “ Ben-David , have mercy on me ! ”

41010050	Throwing off his cloak , he jumped up and came to Yeshua .

41011001	Now as they draw near to Jerusalem , to Bethphage and Bethany , to the Mount of Olives , Yeshua sends two of His disciples

41011003	If anyone says to you , ‘ Why are you doing this ? ’ say , ‘ The Master needs it . ’ And right away he will send it back here . ”
41011004	They went and found a colt outside in the street , tied at a door . And they untied it .

41011006	They answered just as Yeshua had told them , and the people let them go .
41011007	And they brought the colt to Yeshua and laid their cloaks on it , and He sat on it .

41011011	And He entered Jerusalem and went into the Temple . After looking around at everything , He went out to Bethany with the Twelve , since it was already late .
41011012	The next day , when they had left Bethany , He became hungry .
41011013	Seeing from a distance a fig tree in leaf , He went to see if He would find any fruit on it . When He came up to it , He found nothing except leaves , because it wasn’t the season for figs .
41011014	And He said to it , “ May no one ever eat fruit from you again ! ” And His disciples were listening .
41011015	Then they came to Jerusalem . And He entered the Temple and started to drive out those selling and buying in the Temple . He overturned the tables of the moneychangers and the seats of those selling doves ,
41011016	and He wouldn’t let anyone carry goods through the Temple .

41011018	The ruling kohanim and Torah scholars heard this and began looking for a way to destroy Him ; for they were afraid of Him , because the whole crowd was astonished at His teaching .
41011019	Whenever evening came , Yeshua and His disciples would leave the city .
41011020	As they were passing by in the morning , they saw the fig tree shriveled from the roots .

41011022	And Yeshua answered , saying to them , “ Have faith in God !

41011027	Again they come to Jerusalem . While Yeshua was walking in the Temple , the ruling kohanim , Torah scholars , and elders come up to Him .

41011032	But if we say , ‘ From men ’ … ? ” They were afraid of the crowd , for all held that John really was a prophet .
41011033	So answering Yeshua , they say , “ We don’t know . ” And Yeshua tells them , “ Neither will I tell you by what authority I do these things . ”
41012001	Yeshua began to speak to them in parables : “ A man planted a vineyard . He put a hedge around it , dug a pit for the winepress , and built a tower . He leased it to some tenant farmers and went on a journey .
41012002	And at the season , he sent a servant to collect from the tenants part of the vineyard’s fruit .
41012003	But grabbing him , they beat him up and sent him away empty-handed .
41012004	And again the man sent another servant to them , and they wounded his head and treated him shamefully .
41012005	He sent another , and that one they killed ; and so on with many others , beating some and killing some .
41012006	He had yet one , a well-loved son . He sent him to them last of all , saying , ‘ They will respect my son . ’
41012007	“ But those tenants said to one another , ‘ This is the heir ! Come on , let’s kill him and the inheritance will be ours ! ’
41012008	So grabbing the son , they killed him and threw him out of the vineyard .
41012009	“ What then will the master of the vineyard do ? He will come and destroy the tenants and give the vineyard to others .

41012013	Then they send some of the Pharisees and Herodians to Yeshua in order to trap Him with a word .

41012015	Should we pay , or shouldn’t we ? ” But Yeshua saw through their hypocrisy and said to them , “ Why are you testing Me ? Bring Me a denarius so I may see it . ”
41012016	They brought one . And He said to them , “ Whose image is this ? And whose inscription ? ” “ Caesar’s , ” they said to Him .
41012017	Then Yeshua said to them , “ Give to Caesar the things that are Caesar’s , and to God the things that are God’s . ” And they were completely amazed at Him .
41012018	Then Sadducees ( who say there is no resurrection ) came and began questioning Yeshua , saying ,
41012019	“ Teacher , Moses wrote for us that ‘ if a man’s brother dies and leaves a wife but no children , then his brother should take the widow and father children for his brother . ’
41012020	There were seven brothers ; and the first took a wife and , when he died , left no offspring .
41012021	And the second took her and died , leaving no offspring , and the third likewise .
41012022	Now the seven left no offspring . Last of all , the woman died , too .
41012023	In the resurrection , when they rise up , whose wife will she be ? For all seven had married her . ”

41012027	He’s not the God of the dead , but of the living . You have gone far astray ! ”
41012028	One of the Torah scholars came and heard them debating . Seeing that Yeshua had answered them well , he asked Him , “ Which commandment is first of all ? ”
41012029	Yeshua answered , “ The first is , ‘ Shema Yisrael , Adonai Eloheinu , Adonai echad . Hear , O Israel , the Lord our God , the Lord is One .
41012030	And you shall love Adonai your God with all your heart , and with all your soul , and with all your mind , and with all your strength . ’
41012031	The second is this , ‘ You shall love your neighbor as yourself . ’ There is no other commandment greater than these . ”
41012032	“ Well said , Teacher , ” the Torah scholar said to Him . “ You have spoken the truth , that He is echad , and besides Him there is no other !
41012033	And ‘ to love Him with all the heart , with all the understanding , and with all the strength , ’ and ‘ to love the neighbor as oneself , ’ is much more than all burnt offerings and sacrifices . ”
41012034	When Yeshua saw that he had answered wisely , He said to him , “ You are not far from the kingdom of God . ” And no one dared any longer to question Him .

41012037	If David himself calls Him ‘ Lord , ’ in what way is He his son ? ” And the large crowd was listening to Him with delight .
41012038	In His teaching He said , “ Watch out for the Torah scholars , who like to walk around in long robes . They like greetings in the marketplaces ,
41012039	the best seats in the synagogues , and places of honor at feasts .
41012040	They devour widows’ houses and make long prayers as a show . These men will receive greater condemnation ! ”
41012041	He sat down opposite the treasury and began watching how the people were putting money into the offering box . Many rich people were putting in a lot .
41012042	Then a poor widow came and put in two small copper coins , worth less than a penny .
41012043	Calling His disciples over , He said to them , “ Amen , I tell you , this poor widow has put in more than all those contributing to the box !

41014001	Now it was two days before Passover and the Feast of Matzah . The ruling kohanim and Torah scholars were searching for a way to grab Yeshua by stealth and kill Him .

41014061	But keeping silent , Yeshua did not answer . Again the kohen gadol questioned Him , “ Are you Mashiach , Son of the Blessed One ? ”
41014062	“ I am , ” said Yeshua , “ and you shall see ‘ the Son of Man sitting at the right hand of the Powerful One , ’ and ‘ coming with the clouds of heaven ’ ! ”
41014063	Tearing his clothes , the kohen gadol says , “ Why do we still need witnesses ?
41014064	You’ve heard the blasphemy . What seems right to you ? ” Then all condemned Him as deserving death .
41014065	Some began to spit on Him , to blindfold Him , and to beat Him with their fists , saying , “ Prophesy ! ” Also the guards slapped Him around .
41014066	As Peter was below in the courtyard , one of the servant girls of the kohen gadol comes by .
41014067	Seeing Peter warming himself , she looked straight at him . “ You also were with Yeshua of Natzeret , ” she says .
41014068	But he denied it , saying , “ I don’t know or understand what you’re talking about ! ” Then he went outside to the gateway , and a rooster crowed .
41014069	Seeing him , the servant girl began again to tell the bystanders , “ This is one of them . ”
41014070	But again he denied it . And a little while later , the bystanders were again saying to Peter , “ Surely you’re one of them , for you’re also a Galilean . ”
41014071	But he began to curse himself and to swear an oath : “ I do not know this Man you’re talking about ! ”
41014072	Right then , a rooster crowed a second time . Then Peter called to mind the word Yeshua had said to him : “ Before a rooster crows twice , you will deny Me three times . ” And he broke down and began to weep .
41015001	Right at daybreak , the ruling kohanim held a meeting to consult with the elders and Torah scholars and the whole Sanhedrin . They tied up Yeshua , led Him away , and handed Him over to Pilate .
41015002	Pilate interrogated Him , “ Are You the King of the Jews ? ” Yeshua answers him , “ As you say . ”
41015003	The ruling kohanim began to accuse Him of many things .
41015004	Again , Pilate asked Him , “ Aren’t you going to answer ? Look how many charges they’re bringing against You ! ”
41015005	But Yeshua did not answer , so Pilate was amazed .
41015006	Now during the feast , he used to release to them one prisoner , anyone they were asking for .
41015007	Now a man named Bar-Abba had been in jail with the rebels who had committed murder during the rebellion .
41015008	The crowd came up and began to request what he was accustomed to do for them .
41015009	But Pilate answered them , saying , “ Do you want me to release for you the King of the Jews ? ”
41015010	For he knew that out of envy the ruling kohanim had handed Him over .
41015011	But the ruling kohanim stirred up the crowd , so he would release Bar-Abba to them instead .
41015012	Then answering again , Pilate said to them , “ So what do you want me to do with the One you call the King of the Jews ? ”
41015013	They shouted back , “ Execute Him ! ”
41015014	Pilate responded , “ Why ? What evil has He done ? ” But they shouted all the more , “ Execute Him ! ”
41015015	Wanting to satisfy the crowd , Pilate released Bar-Abba for them . And after he had Yeshua scourged , he handed Him over to be crucified .
41015016	The soldiers took Him away , into the palace , the governor’s mansion called the Praetorium . And they call together the cohort of soldiers .
41015017	They dress Him up in purple . After braiding a crown of thorns , they put it on Him .
41015018	And they began to salute Him , “ Hail , King of the Jews ! ”
41015019	Over and over , they kept hitting Him on the head with a staff and spitting on Him ; and kneeling down , they worshiped Him .
41015020	When they finished mocking Him , they stripped the purple off Him and put His own clothes back on Him . And they led Him out to crucify Him .
41015021	Now Simon of Cyrene , the father of Alexander and Rufus , was coming in from the countryside . The soldiers force this passerby to carry Yeshua’s cross-beam .
41015022	They bring Yeshua to the place called Golgotha ( which is translated , Place of a Skull ) .
41015023	They were offering Him wine mixed with myrrh , but He didn’t take it .
41015024	Then they crucify Him and divide up His clothing among themselves , casting lots for them to see who should take what .
41015025	Now it was the third hour when they nailed Him on the stake .
41015026	And the inscription of the charge against Him was written above : “ THE KING OF THE JEWS . ”
41015027	And with Him they execute two outlaws , one on His right and one on His left . ( 28 )
41015029	Those passing by were jeering at Him , shaking their heads and saying , “ Ha ! You who are going to destroy the Temple and rebuild it in three days ,
41015030	save Yourself by coming down from the stake ! ”
41015031	Likewise the ruling kohanim , along with the Torah scholars , were also mocking Him among themselves . “ He saved others , ” they were saying , “ but He can’t save Himself ?
41015032	Let the Messiah , the King of Israel , come down now from the stake , so we may see and believe ! ” Even those executed with Him were ridiculing Him .
41015033	When the sixth hour had come , darkness fell over the whole land until the ninth hour .
41015034	At the ninth hour Yeshua cried out with a loud voice , “ Eloi , Eloi , lema sabachthani ? ” which is translated , “ My God , My God , why have You abandoned Me ? ”
41015035	When some of the bystanders heard it , they began saying , “ Look , He’s calling for Elijah . ”
41015036	Then someone ran and filled a sponge with sour wine . He put it on a stick and was offering it to Yeshua to drink , saying , “ Wait , let’s see if Elijah comes to take Him down . ”
41015037	But letting out a loud cry , Yeshua breathed His last .
41015038	Then the curtain of the Temple was split in two , from top to bottom .
41015039	When the centurion , who was standing in front of Him , saw the way Yeshua breathed His last , he said , “ This Man really was the Son of God ! ”
41015040	There were also women watching from a distance . Among them were Miriam from Magdala , Miriam the mother of Jacob the younger and of Joses , and Salome .
41015041	They would follow Him and serve Him when He was in the Galilee . Many other women who had gone up together with Him to Jerusalem were there also .
41015042	Now evening had already come . Since it was the Day of Preparation , that is , the day before Shabbat ,
41015043	Joseph of Arimathea , a respected council member who himself was waiting for the kingdom of God , went boldly to Pilate and asked for Yeshua’s body .
41015044	Pilate was surprised that He was already dead . Summoning the centurion , he asked him whether Yeshua had been dead for long .
41015045	When Pilate learned this from the centurion , he granted the body to Joseph .
41015046	Joseph bought a linen cloth , took Him down , wrapped Him in the linen , and laid Him in a tomb that had been cut out of the rock . Then he rolled a stone against the door of the tomb .
41015047	Miriam from Magdala and Miriam the mother of Joses were watching where Yeshua’s body was placed .
41016001	When Shabbat was over , Miriam of Magdala , Miriam the mother of Jacob , and Salome bought spices , so that they might come and anoint Yeshua’s body .
41016002	Very early on the first day of the week , when the sun had risen , they come to the tomb .
41016003	They were saying to each other , “ Who will roll away the stone for us from the entrance to the tomb ? ”
41016004	Looking up , they see that the stone ( it was really huge ) had been rolled away .
41016005	As they entered the tomb , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , dressed in a white robe ; and they were startled .
41016006	But he said to them , “ Do not be alarmed . You are looking for Yeshua of Natzeret , who was crucified . He is risen ! He is not here ! See the place where they put Him .
41016007	But go , tell His disciples and Peter , ‘ He is going before you to the Galilee . There you will see Him , just as He told you . ’ ”
41016008	And going outside , they fled from the tomb , gripped by trembling and amazement . They didn’t say anything to anybody , for they were afraid .
41016009	After He had risen early on the first day of the week , He appeared first to Miriam of Magdala , from whom He had driven out seven demons .
41016010	She went and brought word to those who had been with Him , while they were mourning and weeping .
41016011	When they heard that He was alive and had been seen by her , they refused to believe .
41016012	After that , He appeared in a different form to two of them as they were walking on their way to the country .
41016013	They went and reported it to the rest , but they did not believe them either .
41016014	Later He appeared to them , the eleven , as they were reclining at the table . He rebuked them for their unbelief and hardheartedness , because they did not believe those who had seen Him after He had been raised .
41016015	He told them , “ Go into all the world and proclaim the Good News to every creature .
41016016	He who believes and is immersed shall be saved , but he who does not believe shall be condemned .
41016017	These signs will accompany those who believe : in My name they will drive out demons ; they will speak new languages ;
41016018	they will handle snakes ; and if they drink anything deadly , it will not harm them ; they will lay hands on the sick , and they will get well . ”
41016019	Then the Lord Yeshua , after He had spoken to them , was taken up into heaven and sat down at the right hand of God .
41016020	And they went out and proclaimed everywhere , the Lord working with them and confirming the word by the signs that follow .
42001001	Now many have undertaken to organize an account of the events fulfilled among us ,
42001002	just as they were handed down to us from the start by the eyewitnesses and reporters of the word .
42001003	Therefore it seemed best to me also , because I have carefully investigated everything from the beginning , to write for you an orderly record , most excellent Theophilus ,
42001004	so you may know for sure the truth of the words you have been taught .
42001005	In the days of Herod , King of Judah , there was a kohen named Zechariah from the priestly division of Abijah . Elizabeth , his wife , was from the daughters of Aaron .
42001006	Together they were righteous before Adonai , walking without fault in all His commandments and instructions .
42001007	But they were childless , because Elizabeth was barren and both of them were elderly .
42001008	Now it happened to be Zechariah’s time to serve as kohen before Adonai in the order of his division .
42001009	According to the custom of the priestly office , it became his lot to enter the Holy Place of Adonai to burn incense .
42001010	And the whole crowd of people was praying outside at the hour of incense burning .
42001011	An angel of Adonai appeared to him , standing at the right side of the altar of incense .
42001012	Zechariah was in turmoil when he saw the angel , and fear fell upon him .
42001013	But the angel said , “ Do not be afraid , Zechariah , because your prayer has been heard . Your wife , Elizabeth , will give birth to your son , and you will name him John .
42001014	And you will have joy and gladness , and many will rejoice at his birth .
42001015	He will be great before Adonai ; and he should not drink wine and intoxicating beverage , but he will be filled with the Ruach ha-Kodesh just out of his mother’s womb .
42001016	Many of B’nei-Israel will turn to Adonai their God .
42001017	And he will go before Him in the spirit and power of Elijah , to turn the hearts of fathers to the children and the disobedient ones to the wisdom of the righteous , to make ready for Adonai a prepared people .
42001018	Zechariah said to the angel , “ How will I know this for certain ? I’m an old man , and my wife is well-advanced in age . ”
42001019	And speaking to him , the angel declared , “ I am Gabriel , the one standing in God’s presence . I was commissioned to tell you and proclaim to you this good news .
42001020	So look , you will be silent and powerless to speak until the day these things happen , since you did not believe my words which will be fulfilled in their time . ”
42001021	The people were waiting for Zechariah and wondering about his long delay in the Holy Place .
42001022	But when he came out , he couldn’t speak to them . Then they realized that he had seen a vision in the Holy Place . He was making signs to them but remained mute .
42001023	When the days of his priestly service had been completed , he went home .
42001024	After these days , his wife Elizabeth became pregnant and hid herself for five months , saying ,
42001025	“ Adonai has done this for me ! In these days He looked upon me , to take away my disgrace among the people . ”
42001026	Then in the sixth month , the angel Gabriel was sent by Adonai into a town in the Galilee named Natzeret
42001027	and to a virgin engaged to a man named Joseph , of the house of David . The virgin’s name was Miriam .
42001028	And coming to her , the angel said , “ Shalom , favored one ! Adonai is with you . ”
42001029	But at the message , she was perplexed and kept wondering what kind of greeting this might be .
42001030	The angel spoke to her , “ Do not be afraid , Miriam , for you have found favor with God .
42001031	Behold , you will become pregnant and give birth to a son , and you shall call His name Yeshua .
42001032	He will be great and will be called Ben-Elyon . Adonai Elohim will give Him the throne of David , His father .
42001033	He shall reign over the house of Jacob for all eternity , and His kingdom will be without end . ”
42001034	Miriam said to the angel , “ How can this be , since I am not intimate with a man ? ”
42001035	And responding , the angel said to her , “ The Ruach ha-Kodesh will come upon you , and the power of Elyon will overshadow you . Therefore , the Holy One being born will be called Ben-Elohim .
42001036	Behold , even your relative Elizabeth has conceived a son in her old age ; and the one who was called barren is six months pregnant .
42001037	For nothing will be impossible with God . ”
42001038	So Miriam said , “ Behold , the servant of Adonai . Let it be done to me according to your word . ” And the angel left her .
42001039	Now in those days , Miriam got up and quickly traveled into the hill country , to a town in Judah .
42001040	She entered Zechariah’s home and happily greeted Elizabeth .
42001041	When Elizabeth heard Miriam’s greeting , the unborn child leaped in her womb ; and Elizabeth was completely filled with the Ruach ha-Kodesh .
42001042	She then cried out with a great shout , saying , “ You are blessed among women , and blessed is the fruit of your womb .
42001043	Who am I , that the mother of my Master should come to me ?
42001044	For even when I just heard the sound of your greeting in my ear , the unborn child leaped with joy in my womb .
42001045	Blessed is she who trusted that there would be a fulfillment of those things spoken to her by Adonai . ”
42001046	Then Miriam said , “ My soul magnifies Adonai ,
42001047	and my spirit greatly rejoices in God , my Savior .

42001049	For the Mighty One has done a great thing for me , and holy is His name .
42001050	And His mercy is from generation to generation to the ones who fear Him .
42001051	He has displayed power with His arm He has scattered the proud in the thoughts of their hearts .
42001052	He has brought down rulers from thrones and exalted humble ones .
42001053	He has filled the hungry with good things and sent away the rich empty-handed .
42001054	He has helped His servant Israel , remembering His mercy ,
42001055	just as He spoke to our fathers , to Abraham and to his seed forever . ”
42001056	Miriam stayed with her for three months and then returned to her home .
42001057	Upon Elizabeth’s full term to deliver , she gave birth to a son .
42001058	Her neighbors and relatives heard how Adonai had shown her His great mercy , and they began to rejoice with her .
42001059	Now on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child , and they kept trying to call him by his father’s name , Zechariah .
42001060	But his mother declared , “ No , he will be called John . ”
42001061	But they said to her , “ No one among your relatives is called by this name . ”
42001062	So they began making signs to his father , as to what he wanted him named .

42001064	And his mouth was immediately unlocked as well as his tongue , and he began to speak , praising God .

42001073	the vow which He swore to Abraham our father , to grant us —
42001074	rescued fearlessly from the hand of our enemies — to serve Him ,
42001075	in holiness and righteousness before Him all our days .

42001077	to give knowledge of salvation to His people through removal of their sins .
42001078	Through our God’s heart of mercy , the Sunrise from on high will come upon us ,
42001079	to give light to those who sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet in the way of shalom . ”
42001080	And the child kept growing and became strong in spirit ; and he lived in the wilderness until the day of his public appearance to Israel .
42002001	Now it happened in those days a decree went out from Caesar Augustus to register all the world’s inhabitants .
42002002	This was the first census taken when Quirinius was governor of Syria .
42002003	Everyone was traveling to be registered in his own city .
42002004	Now Joseph also went up from the Galilee , out of the town of Natzeret to Judah , to the city of David , which is called Bethlehem , because he was from the house and family of David .
42002005	He went to register with Miriam , who was engaged to him and was pregnant .
42002006	But while they were there , the time came for her to give birth —
42002007	and she gave birth to her firstborn son . She wrapped Him in strips of cloth and set Him down in a manger , since there was no room for them in the inn .
42002008	Now there were shepherds in the same region , living out in the fields and guarding their flock at night .
42002009	Suddenly an angel of Adonai stood before them , and the glory of Adonai shone all around them ; and they were absolutely terrified .
42002010	But the angel said to them , “ Do not be afraid ! For behold , I proclaim Good News to you , which will be great joy to all the people .
42002011	A Savior is born to you today in the city of David , who is Messiah the Lord .

42002016	So they hurried off and found Miriam and Joseph , and the Baby lying in the manger .
42002017	When they had seen this , they made known the word that had been spoken to them concerning this Child .

42002021	When eight days had passed for His brit-milah , He was named Yeshua , the name given by the angel before He was conceived in the womb .
42002022	And when the days of their purification were fulfilled , according to the Torah of Moses , they brought Him to Jerusalem to present to Adonai .

42002025	Now there was a man in Jerusalem whose name was Simeon , and this man was just and pious , waiting for the consolation of Israel . The Ruach ha-Kodesh was on him .
42002026	And it had been revealed to him by the Ruach ha-Kodesh that he would not die before he had seen the Anointed One of Adonai .

42002037	and then as a widow until age eighty-four . She never left the Temple , serving night and day with fasting and prayers .

42002045	When they did not find Him , they returned to Jerusalem to search for Him .
