42004001	Yeshua , now filled with the Ruach ha-Kodesh , returned from the Jordan . He was led by the Ruach in the wilderness
42004002	for forty days , being tested by the devil . Now He ate nothing during those days , and when they had ended , He was hungry .
42004003	The devil said to Him , “ If You are Ben-Elohim , tell this stone to become bread . ”
42004004	Yeshua answered him , “ It is written , ‘ Man shall not live by bread alone . ’ ”
42004005	And leading Him up , the devil showed Him all the kingdoms of the world in an instant .
42004006	And the devil said to Him , “ I’ll give to You all this authority along with its glory , because it has been handed over to me and I can give it to anyone I wish .
42004007	Therefore , if you will worship before me , all this shall be Yours . ”
42004008	But answering , Yeshua told him , “ It is written , ‘ You shall worship Adonai your God , and Him only shall you serve . ’ ”
42004009	Then he brought Yeshua to Jerusalem and placed Him on the highest point of the Temple . He said to Him , “ If You are Ben-Elohim , throw Yourself down from here .
42004010	For it is written , ‘ He will command His angels concerning you , to guard you , ’
42004011	and ‘ upon their hands they will lift you up , so that you may not strike your foot against a stone . ’ ”
42004012	But answering , Yeshua said to him , “ It is said , ‘ You shall not put Adonai your God to the test . ’ ”
42004013	And when the devil had completed every test , he departed from Him until another occasion .
42004014	Yeshua returned in the power of the Ruach to the Galilee , and news about Him went out through all the surrounding region .
42004015	He taught in their synagogues , and everyone was praising Him .
42004016	And He came to Natzeret , where He had been raised . As was His custom , He went into the synagogue on Shabbat , and He got up to read .
42004017	When the scroll of the prophet Isaiah was handed to Him , He unrolled the scroll and found the place where it was written ,
42004018	“ The Ruach Adonai is on me , because He has anointed me to proclaim Good News to the poor . He has sent me to proclaim release to the captives and recovery of sight to the blind , to set free the oppressed ,
42004019	and to proclaim the year of Adonai’s favor . ”
42004020	He closed the scroll , gave it back to the attendant , and sat down . All eyes in the synagogue were focused on Him .
42004021	Then He began to tell them , “ Today this Scripture has been fulfilled in your ears . ”
42004022	All were speaking well of Him and marveling at the gracious words coming out of His mouth . And they were saying , “ Isn’t this the son of Joseph ? ”
42004023	But He said to them , “ Doubtless you will say to Me this proverb , ‘ Doctor , heal yourself ! ’ and ‘ What we have heard was done at Capernaum , do as much here also in your hometown . ’ ”
42004024	But He said , “ Truly , I tell you , ‘ No prophet is accepted in his own hometown . ’
42004025	But with all truthfulness I say to you , that there were many widows in Israel in the days of Elijah , when heaven was closed for three and a half years and there came a great famine over all the land .
42004026	Elijah was not sent to any of them , but only to Zarephath in the land of Sidon , to a widowed woman .
42004027	There were many with tzara’at in Israel in the time of Elisha the prophet , and none of them were purified apart from Naaman the Syrian . ”
42004028	Now all in the synagogue were filled with rage upon hearing these things .
42004029	Rising up , they drove Him out of the town and brought Him as far as the edge of the mountain on which their city had been built , in order to throw Him off the cliff .
42004030	But passing through the middle of them , He went on His way .
42004031	Yeshua came down to Capernaum , a town in the Galilee . He was teaching them on Shabbat ,
42004032	and they were astounded at His teaching because His message had authority .
42004033	In the synagogue was a man who had a unclean demonic spirit , and he cried out with a loud voice ,
42004034	“ Ah ! What have we to do with You , Yeshua of Natzeret ? Have You come to destroy us ? I know who You are ! You are the Holy One of God ! ”
42004035	Yeshua rebuked him , saying , “ Quiet ! Come out of him ! ” And when the demon threw him down in their midst , it came out without hurting him .
42004036	They were all amazed , and they spoke to one another , saying , “ What is this message ? For with authority and power He commands the unclean spirits , and they come out . ”
42004037	So His reputation grew , spreading to every place in that region .
42004038	After He left the synagogue , Yeshua entered Simon’s home . Simon’s mother-in-law was suffering from a high fever , and they petitioned Him concerning her .
42004039	Then standing over her , He rebuked the fever and it left her . Immediately she arose to wait on them .
42004040	When the sun was setting , they brought to Yeshua all who were sick with various diseases . And He was laying hands on each one and healing them .
42004041	Even demons were coming out from many , shouting out and saying , “ You are Ben-Elohim ! ” But He was rebuking them and not permitting them to speak , because they knew Him to be the Messiah .
42004042	Now when it was day , He left and went to a desert place . The crowds were searching for Him , and they came to Him and were trying to keep Him from leaving them .
42004043	But He said to them , “ I must proclaim the Good News of the kingdom of God to the other towns also . It was for this purpose I was sent . ”
42004044	So He kept preaching in the synagogues of Judea .
42005001	It happened that the crowds were pressing upon Yeshua to hear the word of God as He was standing by the Lake of Kinneret ,
42005002	when He saw two boats standing beside the lake . Now the fishermen had left them and were washing the nets .
42005003	Getting into one of the boats , Simon’s boat , Yeshua asked him to push out a ways from the land . Then sitting down , He taught the crowds from the boat .
42005004	When He had finished speaking , He said to Simon , “ Go out into the deep water , and let down your nets for a catch . ”
42005005	Simon replied , “ Master , we’ve worked hard all night and caught nothing . But at Your word I will let down the nets . ”
42005006	When they had done this , they caught so many fish that their nets began to break .
42005007	So they signaled to their partners in the other boat to come and help them . They came and filled both boats so full that they began to sink .
42005008	But when Simon Peter saw this , he fell down at Yeshua’s knees , saying , “ Go away from me , Master , for I am a sinful man ! ”
42005009	For amazement had gripped him and all who were with him , over the catch of fish they had netted ;
42005010	so also Jacob and John , Zebedee’s sons , who were partners with Simon . But Yeshua said to Simon , “ Do not be afraid . From now on , you will be catching men . ”
42005011	So when they had brought the boats to the landing , they left everything and followed Him .
42005012	Now while Yeshua was in one of the towns , a man covered with tzara’at appeared . And when he saw Yeshua , he fell on his face and begged Him , saying , “ Master , if You are willing , You can make me clean . ”
42005013	Yeshua stretched out His hand and touched him , saying , “ I am willing . Be cleansed ! ” Immediately , the tzara’at left him .
42005014	Yeshua ordered him to tell no one , but commanded him , “ Go and show yourself to the kohen . Then bring an offering for your cleansing , just as Moses commanded , as a testimony to them . ”
42005015	But the news about Yeshua was spreading all the more , and many crowds were coming together to hear and to be healed of their diseases .
42005016	Yet He would often slip away into the wilderness and pray .
42005017	Now on one of those days , Yeshua was teaching . Pharisees and Torah scholars were sitting there , who had come from every village of the Galilee and Judea , as well as from Jerusalem . And Adonai’s power to heal was in Him .
42005018	And behold , men were carrying a paralyzed man on a stretcher , trying to bring him in and place him before Yeshua .
42005019	But when they found no way to bring him in because of the crowd , they went up on the roof and let him down with his stretcher through the tiles , right in the middle before Yeshua .
42005020	When He saw their faith , He said , “ Man , your sins are forgiven . ”
42005021	Then the Torah scholars and the Pharisees began to question , saying , “ Who is this fellow speaking blasphemies ? Who can pardon sins but God alone ? ”
42005022	Yeshua , knowing their thoughts , replied to them , “ Why are you raising questions in your hearts ?
42005023	Which is easier , to say , ‘ Your sins are forgiven you , ’ or to say , ‘ Get up and walk ’ ?
42005024	But so you may know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to pardon sins … . ” He said to the paralyzed one , “ I tell you , get up and take your cot , and go home ! ”
42005025	Immediately he got up before them , picked up what he had been lying on , and went home , glorifying God .
42005026	Astonishment took hold of them , and they glorified God and all were filled with awe , saying , “ We’ve seen incredible things today ! ”
42005027	After these things , Yeshua went out and observed a tax collector named Levi , sitting at the tax booth . He said to him , “ Follow Me . ”
42005028	And leaving everything , he got up and followed Him .
42005029	Levi made a great banquet for Yeshua at his house , and there was a large crowd of tax collectors and others who were reclining with them .
42005030	The Pharisees and their Torah scholars began murmuring to His disciples , saying , “ Why do you eat and drink with tax collectors and sinners ? ”
42005031	And Yeshua answered and said to them , “ Those who are healthy have no need for a doctor , but those who are sick do .
42005032	I did not come to call the righteous , but the sinful to repentance . ”
42005033	But they said to Him , “ John’s disciples often fast and offer prayers , as do the disciples of the Pharisees . But Your disciples are eating and drinking . ”
42005034	But Yeshua said to them , “ You cannot make the guests of the bridegroom fast while the bridegroom is with them , can you ?
42005035	But the days will come ; and when the bridegroom is taken away from them , then they will fast in those days . ”
42005036	Now he was also telling them a parable . “ No one tears a patch from a new garment to use it on an old garment . Otherwise he will rip the new , and the patch from the new will not match the old .
42005037	And no one puts new wine into old wineskins . Otherwise , the new wine will burst the skins , it will be spilled out , and the skins will be destroyed .
42005038	But new wine must be put into fresh wineskins .
42005039	No man who drinks old wine wants new , because he says , ‘ The old is fine . ’ ”
42006001	Now during Shabbat , Yeshua was passing through grain fields ; and His disciples were picking and eating heads of grain , rubbing them in their hands .
42006002	But some of the Pharisees said , “ Why are you doing what is not permitted on Shabbat ? ”
42006003	Then answering them , Yeshua said , “ Haven’t you read what David did when he was hungry , and those with him ?
42006004	How he entered into the house of God , took and ate the showbread which only the kohanim are permitted to eat , and even gave it to those with him ? ”
42006005	He said to them , “ The Son of Man is Lord of Shabbat . ”
42006006	On a different Shabbat , Yeshua entered the synagogue and was teaching . A man was there , whose right hand was paralyzed .
42006007	But closely watching Him were the Torah scholars and Pharisees , to see if He heals on Shabbat , so that they might find grounds to accuse Him .
42006008	But He knew their opinions and said to the man with the paralyzed hand , “ Get up and stand in our midst . ” And getting up , the man stood .
42006009	Yeshua said to them , “ I ask you , is it permitted on Shabbat to do good or to do evil , to save or to destroy a life ? ”
42006010	Then looking around at everyone , He said to the man , “ Stretch out your hand . ” The man did , and his hand was restored .
42006011	But they were filled with fury and discussed among themselves what they might do to Yeshua .
42006012	And it was during these days that Yeshua went out to the mountain to pray , and He spent all night in prayer to God .
42006013	When day came , He called His disciples , choosing from among them twelve whom He also named shlichim —
42006014	Simon , whom He also named Peter , and Andrew his brother ; and Jacob and John ; and Philip and Bartholomew ;
42006015	and Matthew and Thomas ; Jacob the son of Alphaeus ; Simon who was called the Zealot ;
42006016	Judah the son of Jacob ; and Judah from Kriot , who became a traitor .
42006017	Then Yeshua came down with them and stood on a level place . A large crowd of His disciples and a multitude of people , from all Judea , Jerusalem , and the coastal region of Tyre and Sidon ,
42006018	had come to hear Him and to be healed of their diseases . Even those disturbed by defiling spirits were being healed .
42006019	Everyone in the crowd was trying to touch Him , because power flowed from Him and He was healing them all .
42006020	And looking up at His disciples , He said , “ Blessed are you who are poor , for yours is the kingdom of God .
42006021	Blessed are you who hunger now , for you shall be satisfied . Blessed are you who weep now , for you shall laugh .
42006022	Blessed are you when people hate you , and when they exclude you , and revile you , and spurn your name as evil on account of the Son of Man .
42006023	Rejoice in that day and jump for joy ! For behold , your reward is great in heaven ! For their fathers used to treat the prophets the same way . ”
42006024	But woe to you who are rich , for you are receiving your comfort in full .
42006025	Woe to you who are full , for you shall be hungry . Woe to you who are laughing now , for you shall mourn and weep .
42006026	Woe to you when all men speak well of you , for their fathers used to treat the false prophets the same way . ”
42006027	“ But I say to you who are listening : Love your enemies , do good to those who hate you ,
42006028	bless those who curse you , pray for the ones who mistreat you .
42006029	To the one who strikes you on the cheek , offer the other also . And from the one who takes your cloak , do not hold back your shirt .
42006030	Give to every one who asks you ; and whoever takes something of yours , make no demands upon him .
42006031	“ Do to others as you would have them do to you .
42006032	If you love those who love you , what credit is that to you ? For even sinners love those who love them .
42006033	And if you do good to those who are doing good to you , what credit is that to you ? Even sinners do this .
42006034	And if you lend to those from whom you expect to take , what credit is that to you ? Even sinners lend to sinners in order to receive back the same .
42006035	“ But love your enemies , and do good , and lend , expecting nothing in return . Then your reward will be great and you will be sons of Elyon , for He is kind to the ungrateful and evil ones .
42006036	Be compassionate , just as your Father is compassionate to you . ”
42006037	Do not judge , and you will not be judged . Do not condemn , and you will not be condemned . Pardon , and you will be pardoned .
42006038	Give , and it will be given to you — a good measure , pressed down , shaken together , overflowing , will be given into your lap . For whatever measure you measure out will be measured back to you . ”
42006039	He also spoke this parable to them : “ The blind cannot show the way to the blind , can he ? Won’t they both fall into a pit ?
42006040	A disciple is not above his teacher , but everyone who is fully trained will be like his teacher .
42006041	“ Why do you look at the speck in your brother’s eye , but do not notice the beam in your own eye ?
42006042	How can you say to your brother , ‘ Brother , let me take out the speck in your eye , ’ when you yourself do not see the beam in your own eye ? You hypocrite ! First take the beam out of your own eye , and then you will see clearly the speck in your brother’s eye , to take it out . ”
42006043	“ For there is no good tree that produces rotten fruit , nor again does a rotten tree produce good fruit .
42006044	Each tree comes to be known by its own fruit . For figs are not gleaned out of briars ; neither are bunches of grapes gathered from thorn bushes .
42006045	“ Out of the good treasure of his heart the good man brings forth good , and out of evil the evil man brings forth evil . For from the overflow of the heart his mouth speaks . ”
42006046	“ Why do you call Me ‘ Master , Master ’ and do not do what I say ?
42006047	Everyone who comes to Me and hears My words and does them , I will show you what he is like .
42006048	He is like a man building a house , who dug deep and laid a foundation on the rock . And when a flood came , the torrent burst against that house but could not shake it , because it had been well built .
42006049	“ But the one who hears yet does not do is like a man who built a house upon land without a foundation . When the torrent burst against it , immediately it collapsed — and the destruction of that house was great ! ”
42007001	When Yeshua finished all His drash in the hearing of the people , He entered Capernaum .
42007002	Now a certain centurion had a valued slave , who was ill and about to die .
42007003	When he heard about Yeshua , he sent Jewish elders to Him , asking Him to come and save his slave .
42007004	When they came to Yeshua , they begged Him earnestly , saying , “ He is worthy for You to grant this ,
42007005	for he loves our people and even built our synagogue . ”
42007006	Now Yeshua started to go with them ; and when He wasn’t far from the house , the centurion sent friends to say to Him , “ Master , do not trouble Yourself , for I’m not worthy for You to come under my roof .
42007007	That is why I didn’t consider myself worthy to come to You . But say the word and let my servant be healed .
42007008	For I also am a man under authority , with soldiers under me . I say to this one , ‘ Go ! ’ and he goes ; and to another , ‘ Come ! ’ and he comes ; and to my servant , ‘ Do this ! ’ and he does it . ”
42007009	Now when Yeshua heard this , He was amazed at him . Turning to the crowd following Him , He said , “ I tell you , not even in Israel have I found such great faith . ”
42007010	When those who had been sent returned to the house , they found the slave in good health .
42007011	The next day Yeshua traveled to a town called Nain , and coming along with Him were His disciples and a large crowd .
42007012	Just as He came near the town gate , behold , a dead man was being carried out , the only son of his mother , a widow . A considerable crowd from the town was with her .
42007013	When the Lord saw her , He felt compassion for her and said , “ Don’t cry . ”
42007014	Then He came up and touched the coffin , and the pallbearers came to a standstill . He said , “ Young man ! I tell you , get up ! ”
42007015	The dead man sat up and began speaking , and Yeshua gave him to his mother .
42007016	Fear took hold of them all , and they glorified God , saying , “ A great prophet has appeared among us , and God has visited His people . ”
42007017	This report concerning Him spread throughout all Judea and the surrounding region .
42007018	John’s disciples reported to him about all these things . Calling two of his disciples ,
42007019	John sent them to the Lord , saying , “ Are you the One who is to come , or should we look for another ? ”
42007020	When they appeared before Him , the men said , “ John the Immerser sent us to you , saying , ‘ Are you the One who is to come , or shall we look for another ? ’ ”
42007021	At this very hour He was healing many of diseases , sicknesses , and evil spirits ; and He granted sight to many who were blind .
42007022	And answering , He said to them , “ Go report to John what you saw and heard : the blind see , the lame walk , those with tzara’at are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead are raised , and the poor have good news proclaimed to them .
42007023	Blessed is he who is not led to stumble because of Me . ”
42007024	And after John’s messengers left , He began to speak about John to the crowds . “ What did you go out to the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken by the wind ?
42007025	No ? So what did you go out to see ? A man dressed in fine garments ? Look , those who wear finery and live in luxury are in the palaces of kings !
42007026	Then what did you go out to see ? A prophet ? Yes , I tell you , even more than a prophet .
42007027	This is the one about whom it is written , ‘ Behold , I send My messenger before You , who will prepare Your way before You . ’
42007028	I say to you , there is no one greater than John among those born of women ; yet the least in the kingdom of God is greater than he . ”
42007029	And when all the people heard , even the tax collectors , they affirmed God’s justice , because they had been immersed with John’s immersion .
42007030	But the Pharisees and Torah lawyers , not having been immersed by John , declared God’s purpose invalid for themselves .
42007031	“ So then , to what shall I compare the people of this generation ? What are they like ?
42007032	They are like children sitting in the marketplace and calling to each other , saying , ‘ We played the flute for you , and you didn’t dance . We sang a dirge , and you didn’t weep . ’
42007033	“ For John the Immerser has come not eating bread nor drinking wine , and you say , ‘ He has a demon . ’
42007034	The Son of Man has come eating and drinking . and you say , ‘ Look , a glutton and a drunkard , a friend of tax collectors and sinners ! ’
42007035	Yet wisdom is vindicated by all her children . ”
42007036	Now one of the Pharisees was asking Yeshua if He would eat with him . Upon entering the Pharisee’s home , He reclined at the table .
42007037	And behold , a woman in the town who was a sinner , when she discovered that Yeshua was reclining at the Pharisee’s home , brought an alabaster jar of perfume .
42007038	As she stood behind Him at His feet , weeping , she began to drench His feet with tears and kept wiping them with her head of hair . Then she was kissing His feet and anointing them with perfume .
42007039	Now when the Pharisee who invited Him saw this , he said to himself , “ If this were a prophet , He would know what sort of woman is touching Him — that she’s a sinner . ”
42007040	And answering , Yeshua said to him , “ Simon , I have something to say to you . ” And he said , “ Say it , Teacher ! ”
42007041	“ A moneylender had two debtors . One owed him five hundred denarii , but the other fifty .
42007042	When neither could repay him , he canceled both debts . So which of them will love him more ? ”
42007043	Simon replied , “ I suppose the one who had the bigger debt canceled . ” “ You have judged correctly , ” Yeshua said .
42007044	Turning toward the woman , He said to Simon , “ Do you see this woman ? I entered into your house , and you didn’t give Me water for My feet . But she has drenched My feet with tears and wiped them with her hair .
42007045	You didn’t greet Me with a kiss ; but from the time she entered , she has not stopped kissing My feet .
42007046	You didn’t anoint My head with oil , but she has anointed My feet with perfume .
42007047	For this reason I tell you , her sins , which are many , have been forgiven — for she loved much . But the one who is forgiven little , loves little .
42007048	He then said to her , “ Your sins have been forgiven . ”
42007049	But those who were reclining at table with Him began to say to one another , “ Who is this , who even forgives sins ? ”
42007050	Then He said to the woman , “ Your faith has saved you . Go in shalom . ”
42008001	Soon afterward , Yeshua began traveling throughout towns and villages , preaching and proclaiming the Good News of the Kingdom of God . The twelve were also with Him .
42008002	And certain women who had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities — Miriam , the one called Magdalene , out of whom seven demons had gone ;
42008003	Joanna , the wife of Kuza , Herod’s finance minister ; Susanna ; and many others — were supporting them out of their own resources .
42008004	And when a large crowd was gathering and those from various towns were traveling to Him , He spoke by means of a parable .
42008005	“ The sower went out to spread his seed . As he sowed , some fell beside the road and was trampled ; and the birds of the air ate it up .
42008006	And other seed fell on rock ; when it came up , that seed withered away because it had no moisture .
42008007	Other seed fell among the thorns , and the thorns grew up with it and choked it .
42008008	And other seed fell into the good soil ; and when it came up , it produced fruit a hundredfold . ” While saying these things , He would call out , “ He who has ears to hear , let him hear . ”
42008009	Now His disciples were asking Him what this parable meant .
42008010	Then Yeshua said to them , “ To you has been given to know the secrets of the kingdom of God ; but to the others it is given in parables , in order that ‘ Seeing , they may not see , and hearing , they may not understand . ’
42008011	“ Now the parable is this : the seed is the word of God .
42008012	Those beside the road are the ones who have heard ; then the devil comes and takes away the word from their heart , so that they may not believe and be saved .
42008013	But those on the rocky places are the ones who , when they hear , accept the word with joy . But these have no root ; they believe for a season , and in a time of testing fall away .
42008014	Now that which fell into the thorns are those who were hearing ; but as they go along the way , they are choked by the cares and riches and pleasures of life , and they do not bear mature fruit .
42008015	But the seed in the good soil are those with a praiseworthy and good heart , who have heard the word and hold it fast and bear fruit with patient endurance .
42008016	“ Now no one after lighting a lamp covers it with some object or places it under a bed . But he puts it on a lampstand so that all those who enter may be able to see the light .
42008017	For nothing is hidden that will not become evident , nor secret that shall not be known and come into open view .
42008018	So pay attention how you listen . For whoever has , to him more will be given . And whoever does not have , even what he supposes he has will be taken away from him . ”
42008019	Yeshua’s mother and brothers came to Him , but were not able to reach Him through the crowd .
42008020	Now it was reported to Him , “ Your mother and Your brothers are standing outside , wanting to see You . ”
42008021	But answering , He said to them , “ My mother and My brothers are these who are hearing the word of God and doing it . ”
42008022	Now on one of those days Yeshua and His disciples got into a boat , and He said to them , “ Let’s move to the other side of the lake . ” So they set out .
42008023	Then as they were sailing , He fell asleep . A violent windstorm came down on the lake , and they were swamped with water and in danger .
42008024	They came to Yeshua and woke Him , saying , “ Master , Master , we’re perishing ! ” He got up and rebuked the wind and the surging wave of water . Then they stopped , and it became calm .
42008025	Then Yeshua said to them , “ Where is your faith ? ” But they were afraid and marveled , saying to one another , “ Who then is this ? He commands even the winds and the water , and they obey Him ! ”
42008026	They sailed over to the country of the Gerasenes , which is on the opposite side of the Galilee .
42008027	A demon-plagued man from the town met Yeshua as He was coming out onto the land . The man hadn’t worn any clothing for a long time and was living not in a house but in the tombs .
42008028	Seeing Yeshua , he cried out and fell down before Yeshua , and with a loud voice said , “ What’s between You and me , Yeshua , Ben El Elyon ? I’m begging You , do not torment me ! ”
42008029	For Yeshua commanded the defiling spirit to come out of the man . For many times it had seized him so that , even though he was restrained and bound with chains and shackles , he would break the chains and be driven by the demons into the desert .
42008030	Yeshua questioned him , “ What is your name ? ” “ Legion , ” he said , for many demons had entered him .
42008031	They kept begging Him not to command them to depart into the abyss .
42008032	Now a large herd of pigs was feeding on the mountain . The demons urged Yeshua to let them enter these pigs , and He gave them permission .
42008033	Then the demons came out of the man and entered into the pigs . The herd rushed down the cliff into the lake and was drowned .
42008034	But when the herdsmen saw what happened , they ran away and reported it in the town and countryside .
42008035	People went out to see what had happened . They came to Yeshua and found the man from whom the demons had gone — clothed and in his right mind , sitting at the feet of Yeshua . And they were frightened .
42008036	Now those who had seen it reported how the demon-plagued man had been restored .
42008037	And all the people from the region surrounding the Gerasenes asked Yeshua to go away from them because they were overcome by great fear . So He got into a boat and returned .
42008038	The man from whom the demons had gone out begged to go with Yeshua . But Yeshua sent him away , saying ,
42008039	“ Return to your home , and describe all that God has done for you . ” So he went away , proclaiming throughout the whole town all that Yeshua had done for him .
42008040	As Yeshua returned , the crowd welcomed Him , for they were all expecting Him .
42008041	And here came a man named Jairus , a leader in the synagogue . Falling at Yeshua’s feet , he begged Him to come to his house ,
42008042	because his only daughter , about twelve years old , was dying . But as He made His way , the masses were crushing in upon Him .
42008043	And there was a woman with a blood flow for twelve years , who could not be healed by anyone .
42008044	She came up from behind and touched the tzitzit of Yeshua’s garment . Immediately , her blood flow stopped .
42008045	Yeshua said , “ Who touched Me ? ” When everyone denied it , Peter said , “ Master , the crowds are surrounding You and pressing in ! ”
42008046	But Yeshua said , “ Someone touched Me , for I recognized power going out from Me . ”
42008047	Then seeing that she did not escape notice , the woman came trembling and fell prostrate before Him . In the presence of all the people , she confessed why she had touched Him and how she had been healed immediately .
42008048	He said to her , “ Daughter , your faith has made you well . Go in shalom . ”
42008049	While He was still speaking , someone comes from the house of the synagogue leader , saying , “ Your daughter has died . Don’t bother the Teacher anymore . ”
42008050	But hearing this , Yeshua replied to him , “ Do not fear — just keep trusting , and she shall be restored . ”
42008051	When Yeshua came into the house , He didn’t let anyone enter with Him except Peter , John , Jacob , and the child’s father and mother .
42008052	And everyone was weeping and lamenting her ; but He said , “ Don’t weep , for she didn’t die but is sleeping . ”
42008053	But they were ridiculing Him , knowing she had died .
42008054	But Yeshua , took her by the hand and called out , saying , “ Child , get up ! ”
42008055	Her spirit returned , and she arose immediately . Yeshua ordered food to be given to her to eat .
42008056	Her parents were utterly astonished , but He ordered them to say nothing of what had happened .
42009001	Now when Yeshua called the twelve together , He gave them power and authority over all the demons and to heal diseases .
42009002	He sent them out to proclaim the kingdom of God and to heal .
42009003	And He said to them , “ Take nothing for the journey — no walking stick , no travel bag , no bread , no money , nor even to have two shirts .
42009004	Whatever house you enter , stay there and depart from there .
42009005	And whoever does not receive you , when you leave that town , shake off the dust from your feet as a witness against them . ”
42009006	So they went out and began traveling throughout the villages , proclaiming the Good News and healing everywhere .
42009007	Now Herod the tetrarch heard all that was happening . He was very confused , because some were saying that John had been raised from the dead ,
42009008	but others that Elijah had appeared , and others that some prophet from among the ancients had arisen .
42009009	But Herod said , “ I beheaded John , but who is this about whom I hear such things ? ” And he kept trying to see Him .
42009010	When the shlichim returned , they described to Yeshua all they had done . Then He took them along and withdrew privately to a city named Bethsaida .
42009011	But the crowds found out and followed Him . So Yeshua welcomed them and began speaking to them about the kingdom of God and curing those in need of healing .
42009012	Now the day began to wind down , and the twelve came and said to Yeshua , “ Send the crowd away , so they might go into the nearby villages and countryside and find food and lodging ; for we are in a desolate place here . ”
42009013	But Yeshua said to them , “ You give them something to eat ! ” But they said , “ We have no more than five loaves of bread and two fish , unless we go to buy food for all these people . ”
42009014	For there were about five thousand men . Then Yeshua said to His disciples , “ Have the people recline in groups of about fifty each . ”
42009015	They did so , and all reclined .
42009016	And He took the five loaves and the two fish ; and looking up to heaven , He offered the bracha and broke them . And He kept giving them to the disciples to set before the crowd .
42009017	Then they all ate and were satisfied . And what was left over was picked up , twelve baskets of the fragments .
42009018	Once when Yeshua was praying alone and His disciples were near , He put a question to them , saying , “ Who do the crowds say that I am ? ”
42009019	They replied , “ John the Immerser , but others Elijah , and others that some prophet from among the ancients has arisen . ”
42009020	Then He said to them , “ But who do you that say I am ? ” Then Peter answered and said , “ The Messiah of God . ”
42009021	But Yeshua warned them , and He ordered them not to tell this to anyone ,
42009022	saying , “ The Son of Man must suffer many things and be rejected by the elders and ruling kohanim and Torah scholars , and be killed , and on the third day be raised . ”
42009023	Then Yeshua was saying to everyone , “ If anyone wants to follow Me , he must deny himself , take up his cross every day , and follow Me .
42009024	For whoever wants to save his life will lose it , but whoever loses his life for My sake will save it .
42009025	“ For what does it profit a man if he gains the whole world but loses or forfeits himself ?
42009026	For whoever is ashamed of Me and My words , the Son of Man will be ashamed of him when He comes in His glory and the glory of the Father and the holy angels .
42009027	But I tell you truthfully , there are some standing here who will never taste death until they see the kingdom of God . ”
42009028	About eight days after these teachings , Yeshua took Peter , John , and Jacob with Him and went up the mountain to pray .
42009029	While He was praying , the appearance of His face changed , and His clothing flashed like white lightning .
42009030	And behold , two men were talking with Him , Moses and Elijah .
42009031	Appearing in glory , they were speaking of Yeshua’s departure , which was about to take place in Jerusalem .
42009032	Now Peter and those with him were overcome with sleep . But when they awakened , they saw Yeshua’s glory and the two men standing with Him .
42009033	And as they were leaving Yeshua , Peter said to Him , “ Master , it’s good for us to be here . Let’s make three sukkot : one for You , and one for Moses , and one for Elijah ” — not knowing what he was saying .
42009034	While he was yet saying these things , a cloud came and overshadowed them ; and they were afraid as they entered the cloud .
42009035	Then a voice came out of the cloud , saying , “ This is My Son , the One I have chosen . Listen to Him ! ”
42009036	And after the voice happened , Yeshua was found alone . They kept quiet and told no one in those days any of the things they had seen .
42009037	On the next day as they came down from the mountain , a large crowd met Yeshua .
42009038	Suddenly a man from the crowd shouted out loudly , saying , “ Teacher , I’m begging You to look at my son , for he’s my only child !
42009039	You see , a spirit takes hold of him , and he immediately screams . It throws him into convulsions with frothing . It hardly ever leaves him — it’s crushing him !
42009040	I begged Your disciples to drive it out , but they couldn’t . ”
42009041	Then answering , Yeshua said , “ O faithless and twisted generation , how long shall I be with you and put up with you ? Bring your son here . ”
42009042	And while the boy was still approaching Yeshua , the demon knocked him down to the ground and threw him into convulsions . But Yeshua rebuked the unclean spirit , healed the boy , and restored him to his father .
42009043	And all were amazed at the mighty power of God . But as everyone was marveling at all He was doing , He said to His disciples ,
42009044	“ Put these words into your ears : the Son of Man is about to be delivered into the hands of men . ”
42009045	But they did not understand this statement ; it was yet concealed from them so they could not grasp it . And they were afraid to ask Him about this statement .
42009046	Now a dispute began between the disciples as to who might be the greatest among them .
42009047	But Yeshua , knowing the reasoning of their heart , took a child and set him by His side .
42009048	He said to them , “ Whoever welcomes this child in My name , welcomes Me . And whoever welcomes Me , welcomes the One who sent Me . The one who is the least among all of you is the one who is great . ”
42009049	John replied , “ Master , we saw someone driving out demons in Your name , and we tried to stop him because he doesn’t follow along with us . ”
42009050	Yeshua said to him , “ Do not stop him , for he who is not against you is for you . ”
42009051	When the days were approaching for Him to be taken up , Yeshua was determined to go up to Jerusalem .
42009052	He sent messengers before Him , and they went and entered a Samaritan village to make His arrangements .
42009053	But they did not receive Him , because He was focused on going up to Jerusalem .
42009054	When His disciples Jacob and John saw this , they said , “ Master , do You want us to command fire to come down from heaven and consume them ? ”
42009055	But Yeshua turned and rebuked them .
42009056	Then they moved on to another village .
42009057	As they were traveling on the road , someone said to Him , “ I will follow You wherever You go . ”
42009058	But Yeshua said to him , “ Foxes have dens and birds of the air have nests , but the Son of Man has nowhere to lay His head . ”
42009059	He said to another , “ Follow Me . ” But that one said , “ First let me go and bury my father . ”
42009060	But Yeshua said to him , “ Let the dead bury their own dead . But you , go and proclaim the kingdom of God . ”
42009061	Then another also said , “ I will follow You , Master , but first let me say goodbye to those in my home . ”
42009062	But Yeshua said to him , “ No one who has put his hand to the plow and looked back is fit for the kingdom of God . ”
42010001	Now after these things , the Lord assigned seventy others and sent them out by twos before Him into every town and place where He Himself was about to go .
42010002	And He was telling them , “ The harvest is plentiful , but the workers are few . Therefore , beg the Lord of the harvest to send out workers into His harvest .
42010003	“ Go forth ! Look , I am sending you as lambs in the midst of wolves .
42010004	Do not be burdened with a money belt , travel bag , or shoes ; and do not greet anyone along the way .
42010005	Whatever home you enter , first say , “ Shalom be on this home . ”
42010006	If a son of shalom is there , your shalom will rest on him ; but if not , it will return to you .
42010007	And remain in this same home , eating and drinking the things they offer , for the worker is deserving of his wage . Do not keep moving from house to house .
42010008	“ Whatever town you enter and they welcome you , eat what they set before you .
42010009	Then heal the sick in that town , and say to them , ‘ The kingdom of God has come near to you . ’
42010010	But if you enter a town and they do not welcome you , then go out into its streets and say ,
42010011	‘ Even the dust of your town sticking to our feet , we wipe off as a witness to you . But know this ! The kingdom of God has come near . ’
42010012	I tell you , it will be more tolerable for Sodom on that day than for that town .
42010013	“ Woe to you , Chorazin ! Woe to you , Bethsaida ! For if the miracles done in you had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have turned long ago , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
42010014	Yet it will be more bearable for Tyre and Sidon at the Judgment than for you !
42010015	And you , Capernaum ? You won’t be lifted up to heaven , will you ? No , you will go down as far as Sheol .
42010016	The one who listens to you hears Me , and the one who rejects you rejects Me , and the one who rejects Me rejects the One who sent Me . ”
42010017	Then the seventy returned with joy , saying , “ Master , even the demons submit to us in Your name ! ”
42010018	And Yeshua said to them , “ I was watching satan fall like lightning from heaven .
42010019	Behold , I have given you authority to trample upon serpents and scorpions , and over all the power of the enemy ; nothing will harm you .
42010020	Nevertheless , do not rejoice that the spirits submit to you , but rejoice that your names have been written in the heavens . ”
42010021	In that very hour , He was overjoyed in the Ruach ha-Kodesh and said , “ I praise You , Father , Master of the universe , that You have hidden these things from the wise and discerning and revealed them to infants . Yes , Father , for this way was pleasing to You .
42010022	All things have been handed over to Me by My Father . No one knows who the Son is except the Father , and who the Father is except the Son and anyone to whom the Son chooses to reveal Him . ”
42010023	Then turning to the disciples , He said privately , “ Blessed are the eyes that see what you see !
42010024	For I tell you , many prophets and kings desired to see what you are seeing yet did not see , and to hear what you are hearing yet did not hear . ”
42010025	Now a certain Torah lawyer stood up to entrap Yeshua , saying , “ Teacher , what should I do to gain eternal life ? ”
42010026	Then Yeshua said to him , “ What has been written in the Torah ? How do you read it ? ”
42010027	And he replied , “ You shall love Adonai your God with all your heart , and with all your soul , and with all your strength , and with all your mind ; and your neighbor as yourself . ”
42010028	Yeshua said to him , “ You have answered correctly . Do this and you will live . ”
42010029	But wanting to vindicate himself , he said to Yeshua , “ Then who is my neighbor ? ”
42010030	Yeshua replied , “ A certain man was going down from Jerusalem to Jericho . He was attacked by robbers , who stripped him and beat him . Then they left , abandoning him as half dead .
42010031	And by chance , a kohen was going down that road ; but when he saw the man , he passed by on the opposite side .
42010032	Likewise a Levite also , when he came to the place and saw him , passed by on the opposite side .
42010033	But a Samaritan who was traveling came upon him ; and when he noticed the man , he felt compassion .
42010034	He went up to him and bandaged his wounds , pouring on olive oil and wine . Then setting him on his own animal , he brought him to a lodge for travelers and took care of him .
42010035	The next day he took out two denarii and gave them to the innkeeper , saying , ‘ Take care of him . And whatever else you spend , upon my return I will repay you myself . ’
42010036	Which of these three seems to you a neighbor to the one attacked by robbers ? ”
42010037	And he said , “ The one who showed mercy to him . ” Then Yeshua said to him , “ Go , and you do the same . ”
42010038	Now while they were traveling , Yeshua entered a certain village ; and a woman named Martha welcomed Him into her house .
42010039	She had a sister called Miriam , who was seated at the Master’s feet , listening to His teaching .
42010040	But Martha was distracted with much serving ; so she approached Yeshua and said , “ Master , doesn’t it concern you that my sister has left me to serve alone ? Then tell her to help me ! ”
42010041	But answering her , the Lord said , “ Martha , Martha , you are anxious and bothered about many things ;
42010042	but only one thing is necessary . For Miriam has chosen the good part , which will not be taken away from her . ”
42011001	Now Yeshua was praying in a certain place . When He finished , one of His disciples said to Him , “ Master , teach us to pray , just as John taught his disciples . ”
42011002	Then Yeshua said to them , “ When you pray , say , ‘ Father , sanctified be Your Name , Your kingdom come .
42011003	Give us each day our daily bread .
42011004	And forgive us our sins , for we also forgive everyone indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation . ”
42011005	Then Yeshua said to them , “ Which of you has a friend and will go to him in the middle of the night and say to him , ‘ Friend , lend me three loaves of bread ,
42011006	because a friend of mine has come to me on his journey and I have nothing to set before him . ’
42011007	Then from within he may answer , saying , ‘ Don’t bother me . The door is already locked , and my children and I are in bed . I can’t get up to give you anything . ’
42011008	I tell you , even if the friend will not get up and give him anything out of friendship , yet because of the man’s persistence he will get up and give him as much as he needs .
42011009	“ So I say to you , ‘ Ask , and it shall be given to you . Seek , and you shall find . Knock , and it shall be opened to you .
42011010	For everyone who asks receives , and the one who seeks finds , and to the one who knocks it will be opened . ’
42011011	What father , if his son asks for a fish , will give him a snake instead ?
42011012	And if he asks for an egg , will he give him a scorpion ?
42011013	If you then , being evil , know how to give good gifts to your children , how much more will your heavenly Father give the Ruach ha-Kodesh to those who ask Him ! ”
42011014	Now Yeshua was driving out a demon , and it was mute . When the demon had gone out , the mute one spoke and the crowds were amazed .
42011015	But some among them said , “ By beelzebul , the ruler of demons , He drives out demons . ”
42011016	Others , testing Him , were demanding from Him a sign from heaven .
42011017	But Yeshua , knowing their thoughts , said to them , “ Every kingdom divided against itself is destroyed , and a house against a house falls .
42011018	Now if satan is divided against himself , how will his kingdom stand ? For you say by beelzebul I drive out the demons .
42011019	But if by beelzebul I drive out demons , by whom do your sons drive them out ? For this reason , they will be your judges .
42011020	But if by the finger of God I drive out demons , then the kingdom of God has come to you .
42011021	“ When a strong one , fully-armed , protects his own estate , his possessions are safe .
42011022	But as soon as someone stronger than he attacks and overpowers him , then he takes away the armor that he had trusted in and divides up his plunder .
42011023	He who is not with Me is against Me , and he who does not gather with Me scatters .
42011024	“ When an unclean spirit goes out of a man , it passes through waterless places looking for rest . Not finding any , it says , ‘ I will return to my house where I came from . ’
42011025	And when it comes , it finds the house swept and put in order .
42011026	Then it goes and takes along seven other spirits more evil than itself , and they go in and settle there . And that man’s last condition becomes worse than the first . ”
42011027	Then as Yeshua was saying these things , a certain woman in the crowd , raising her voice , said to Him , “ Blessed is the womb that carried You and the breasts that nursed You ! ”
42011028	But He said , “ Rather , blessed are those who hear the word of God and obey it . ”
42011029	With the crowds increasing , Yeshua began to say , “ This generation is a wicked generation . It demands a sign , yet no sign will be given to it except the sign of Jonah .
42011030	For just as Jonah became a sign to the Ninevites , so also the Son of Man will be to this generation .
42011031	The Queen of the South will rise up at the Judgment with the men of this generation and condemn them , for she came from the ends of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon . And behold , something greater than Solomon is here .
42011032	The men of Nineveh will rise at the judgment with this generation and will condemn it , because they repented at Jonah’s proclamation . And indeed , one greater than Jonah is here .
42011033	“ No one lighting a lamp puts it in a cellar or under a basket , but on the lampstand so that those entering may see the light .
42011034	Your eye is the lamp of your body . When your eye is healthy , your whole body is full of light . But when it is sick , your body is full of darkness .
42011035	Therefore , watch out that the light in you is not darkness .
42011036	If then your body is full of light , with no part of it dark , it will be as full of light as when a lamp gives you light with its gleam . ”
42011037	As He spoke , a Pharisee asked Yeshua to eat with him , so He entered and sat down .
42011038	But the Pharisee was surprised when he saw that Yeshua did not do the ritual handwashing before the meal .
42011039	But the Lord said to him , “ You Pharisees clean the outside of the cup and plate , but inside you are full of greed and wickedness .
42011040	Fools ! Didn’t He who created the outside also create the inside ?
42011041	But give as tzedakah those things that are within , and indeed everything is pure to you .
42011042	“ But woe to you Pharisees , for you tithe mint , rue , and every garden herb , yet bypass justice and the love of God . It is necessary to do these things without neglecting the others .
42011043	Woe to you Pharisees , for you love the best seats in the synagogues and the greetings in the marketplaces .
42011044	Woe to you , for you are like unmarked tombs , and people walk over them without knowing . ”
42011045	But answering , one of the Torah lawyers says to Him , “ Teacher , when You say these things , You insult us too . ”
42011046	Then Yeshua said , “ Woe to you Torah lawyers as well , for you weigh the people down with burdens hard to carry , yet you yourselves will not touch the burdens with even a finger .
42011047	“ Woe to you , for you build the tombs of the prophets whom your own fathers killed !
42011048	So you are witnesses and approve the deeds of your fathers , for indeed they killed them and you are building their tombs .
42011049	“ For this reason also the wisdom of God said , ‘ I will send them prophets and shlichim , and some of them they will kill and persecute ,
42011050	so that the blood of the prophets shed since the foundation of the world might be required from this generation —
42011051	from the blood of Abel to the blood of Zechariah , the one who perished between the altar and the house of God . Yes , I tell you , it will be required from this generation . ’
42011052	“ Woe to you , Torah lawyers , for you have taken away the key of knowledge . You yourselves did not enter , and you stood in the way of those entering . ”
42011053	When Yeshua left there , the Torah scholars and the Pharisees began to be very hostile and to interrogate Him on many issues ,
42011054	plotting against Him to catch Him in His words .
42012001	Meanwhile , when thousands of people had gathered , so many that they were trampling one another , Yeshua began speaking first to His disciples , “ Be on guard yourselves against the hametz of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
42012002	There is nothing covered up that will not be revealed , and nothing hidden that will not be made known .
42012003	Therefore , whatever you have said in the dark will be heard in the light , and what you have spoken in private rooms will be proclaimed from the housetops .
42012004	“ I say to you , My friends , you should not be afraid of those who kill the body , since after this they have nothing more they can do .
42012005	But I will show you whom you should fear . Fear the One who , after the killing , has authority to cast into Gehenna . Yes , I tell you , fear this One !
42012006	“ Aren’t five sparrows being sold for two pennies ? Yet not one of them is forgotten before God .
42012007	Indeed , even the hairs of your head are all numbered . So do not fear ; you are more valuable than many sparrows .
42012008	Now I tell you , whoever acknowledges Me before men , the Son of Man also will acknowledge him before the angels of God .
42012009	But the one who denies Me before men will be denied before the angels of God .
42012010	And everyone who speaks a word against the Son of Man will be forgiven , but the one who slanders the Ruach ha-Kodesh will not be forgiven .
42012011	And when they bring you to the synagogues , rulers , and authorities , do not worry about how you should defend yourself or what you should say ,
42012012	because the Ruach ha-Kodesh will teach you at that time what is necessary to say . ”
42012013	Then someone from the crowd said to him , “ Teacher , tell my brother to divide the inheritance with me . ”
42012014	But Yeshua said to him , “ Man , who made Me a judge or arbitrator over you ? ”
42012015	Then He said to them , “ Watch out ! Be on guard against all kinds of greed , because one’s life does not consist in the abundance of the material goods he possesses . ”
42012016	And Yeshua told them a parable , saying , “ The land of a certain rich man produced good crops .
42012017	And he began thinking to himself , saying , ‘ What shall I do ? I don’t have a place to store my harvest ! ’
42012018	And he said , ‘ Here’s what I’ll do ! I’ll tear down my barns and build larger ones , and there I’ll store all my grain and my goods .
42012019	And I’ll say to myself , ’ O my soul , you have plenty of goods saved up for many years ! So take it easy ! Eat , drink , and be merry . ” ’
42012020	But God said to him , ‘ You fool ! Tonight your soul is being demanded back from you ! And what you have prepared , whose will that be ? ’
42012021	So it is with the one who stores up treasure for himself and is not rich in God . ”
42012022	Then Yeshua said to His disciples , “ So I say to you , do not worry about life , what you will eat ; nor about the body , what you will wear .
42012023	For life is more than food and the body more than clothing .
42012024	Consider the ravens . They do not sow or reap , they have no storeroom or barn , yet God feeds them . How much more valuable you are than birds !
42012025	“ And which of you by worrying can add a single hour to his life ?
42012026	So if you cannot do even something very little , why do you worry about other things ?
42012027	Consider the lilies , how they grow . They neither toil nor spin . Yet I tell you that not even Solomon in all his glory was clothed like one of these .
42012028	But if God so clothes the grass in the field — which is here today and thrown into the furnace tomorrow — then how much more will He clothe you , O you of little faith ?
42012029	“ So do not seek what you will eat and what you will drink , and do not keep worrying .
42012030	For all the nations of the world strive after these things . But your Father knows that you need these things .
42012031	Instead , seek His kingdom , and these things shall be added to you .
42012032	Do not be afraid , little flock , for your Father chose to give you the kingdom .
42012033	“ Sell your possessions and do tzedakah . Make money pouches for yourselves that do not get old — a treasure in the heavens that never runs out , where no thief approaches and no moth destroys .
42012034	For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
42012035	“ Have your belt strapped on and lamps burning .
42012036	Be like people waiting for their master to return from a wedding feast , so that when he comes and knocks , they may open to him immediately .
42012037	“ Happy are those slaves whose master finds them alert when he comes . Amen , I tell you , he will prepare himself and have them recline at table , and will come and serve them .
42012038	” And if he comes in the second or even the third watch and finds them so , they will be happy .
42012039	But understand this , that if the master of the house had known at what hour the thief was coming , he would not have allowed his house to be broken into .
42012040	You also must be ready , for the Son of Man is coming at an hour you don’t expect . ”
42012041	Then Peter said , “ Master , are You telling this parable for us , or for everyone ? ”
42012042	And the Lord said , “ Who then is the faithful and wise manager , whom the master will put in charge of his servants , to give them their food portion at the proper time ?
42012043	Blessed is that servant whose master finds him so doing when he comes .
42012044	Truly I tell you , his master will put him in charge of all his possessions .
42012045	“ But if that servant says in his heart , ‘ My master is taking a long time to come , ’ and he begins to beat the young slave boys and girls and to eat and drink and get drunk ,
42012046	the master of that servant will come on a day when he does not expect him and at an hour he does not know . And he will cut him in two and assign him a place with the unfaithful .
42012047	“ That slave who knew his master’s will but did not prepare or act according to his desire will be harshly whipped .
42012048	But the one who did not know and did things worthy of a beating will be whipped lightly . From everyone given much , much will be required ; and from the one for whom more is provided , all the more they will ask of him .
42012049	“ I came to pour out fire on the earth , and how I wish it were already ablaze !
42012050	But I have an immersion to endure , and how distressed I am until it is finished !
42012051	“ Do you suppose that I have come to bring shalom on earth ? No , I tell you , but rather division .
42012052	From now on there will be five in one house in opposition , three against two and two against three .
42012053	They will be divided , father against son and son against father , mother against daughter and daughter against mother , mother-in-law against daughter-in-law and daughter-in-law against mother-in-law . ”
42012054	Then He also was saying to the crowds , “ When you see a cloud rising in the west , instantly you say , ‘ A rainstorm is coming ’ — and so it is .
42012055	And when a south wind is blowing , you say , ‘ It will be a scorcher ’ — and so it is .
42012056	Hypocrites ! The surface of the earth and sky you know how to interpret yet you don’t know how to interpret this present time ?

42024017	Then He said to them , “ What are these things you are discussing with one another as you are walking along ? ” They stood still , looking gloomy .
42024018	Then the one named Cleopas answered and said to Him , “ Are You the only one visiting Jerusalem who doesn’t know the things that happened there in these days ? ”
42024019	Yeshua said to them , “ What kind of things ? ” And they said to Him , “ The things about Yeshua from Natzeret , who was a Prophet , powerful in deed and word before God and all the people —
42024020	how the ruling kohanim and our leaders handed Him over to be sentenced to death , and they executed Him .
42024021	But we were hoping that He was the One about to redeem Israel . Besides all this , today is the third day since these things happened .
42024022	“ But also some women among us amazed us . Early in the morning they were at the tomb .
42024023	When they didn’t find His body , they came saying that they had also seen a vision of angels , who said He is alive !
42024024	Some of those with us went to the tomb and found it just as the women said , but they did not see Him . ”
42024025	Yeshua said to them , “ Oh foolish ones , so slow of heart to put your trust in all that the prophets spoke !
42024026	Was it not necessary for Messiah to suffer these things and to enter into His glory ? ”
42024027	Then beginning with Moses and all the Prophets , He explained to them the things written about Himself in all the Scriptures .
42024028	They approached the village where they were going , and He acted as though He were going farther on .
42024029	But they urged Him , saying , “ Stay with us , for it is nearly evening and the day is already gone . ” So He went in to stay with them .
42024030	And it happened that when He was reclining at the table with them , He took the matzah , offered a bracha and , breaking it , gave it to them .
42024031	Then their eyes were opened and they recognized Him , and He disappeared from them .
42024032	They said to one another , “ Didn’t our heart burn within us while He was speaking with us on the road , while He was explaining the Scriptures to us ? ”
42024033	And they got up that very hour and returned to Jerusalem . They found the eleven and others with them gathered together ,
42024034	saying , “ The Lord is risen indeed ! He has appeared to Simon ! ”
42024035	Then they began telling about the events on the road and how He became recognized by them in the breaking of the matzah .
42024036	While they were speaking of these things , Yeshua Himself stood in the midst of them and said , “ Shalom Aleichem ! ”
42024037	But they were startled and terrified , thinking they were seeing a ghost .
42024038	Then He said to them , “ Why are you so shaken ? And why do doubts arise in your heart ?
42024039	Look at My hands and My feet — it is I Myself ! Touch Me and see ! For a spirit doesn’t have flesh and bones , as you see I have . ”
42024040	And when He had said this , He showed them His hands and His feet .
42024041	But while they were still in disbelief due to joy and wonder , He said to them , “ Do you have anything to eat here ? ”
42024042	They gave Him a piece of broiled fish ,
42024043	and He took it and ate it in their presence .
42024044	Then He said to them , “ These are My words which I spoke to you while I was still with you — everything written concerning Me in the Torah of Moses and the Prophets and the Psalms must be fulfilled .
42024045	Then He opened their minds to understand the Scriptures ,
42024046	and He said to them , “ So it is written , that the Messiah is to suffer and to rise from the dead on the third day ,
42024047	and that repentance for the removal of sins is to be proclaimed in His name to all nations , beginning from Jerusalem .
42024048	You are witnesses of these things .
42024049	And behold , I am sending the promise of My Father upon you ; but you are to stay in the city until you are clothed with power from on high . ”
42024050	Then Yeshua led them out as far as Bethany , and He lifted up His hands and blessed them .
42024051	And while blessing them , He departed from them from them and was taken up into heaven .
42024052	After worshiping Him , they returned to Jerusalem with great joy .
42024053	And they were continually in the Temple , praising God .
43001001	In the beginning was the Word . The Word was with God , and the Word was God .
43001002	He was with God in the beginning .
43001003	All things were made through Him , and apart from Him nothing was made that has come into being .
43001004	In Him was life , and the life was the light of men .
43001005	The light shines in the darkness , and the darkness has not overpowered it .
43001006	There came a man sent from God , whose name was John .
43001007	He came as a witness to testify about the light , so that through him everyone might believe .
43001008	He was not the light , but he came to bear witness concerning the light .
43001009	The true light , coming into the world , gives light to every man .
43001010	He was in the world , and the world was made through Him ; but the world did not know Him .
43001011	He came to His own , but His own did not receive Him .
43001012	But whoever did receive Him , those trusting in His name , to these He gave the right to become children of God .
43001013	They were born not of a bloodline , nor of human desire , nor of man’s will , but of God .
43001014	And the Word became flesh and tabernacled among us . We looked upon His glory , the glory of the one and only from the Father , full of grace and truth .
43001015	John testifies about Him . He cried out , saying , “ This is He of whom I said , ‘ The One who comes after me is above me , because He existed before me . ’ ”
43001016	Out of His fullness , we have all received grace on top of grace .
43001017	Torah was given through Moses ; grace and truth came through Yeshua the Messiah .
43001018	No one has ever seen God ; but the one and only God , in the Father’s embrace , has made Him known .
43001019	This is John’s testimony , when the Judean leaders sent kohanim and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , “ Who are you ? ”
43001020	He openly admitted and did not deny ; he admitted , “ I am not the Messiah . ”
43001021	“ What then ? Are you Elijah ? ” they asked him . “ I am not , ” said John . “ Are you the Prophet ? ” “ No , ” he answered .
43001022	So they said to him , “ Who are you ? Give us an answer for those who sent us . What do you say about yourself ? ”
43001023	He said , “ I am ‘ the voice of one crying in the wilderness , “ Make straight the way of Adonai , ” ’ as the prophet Isaiah said . ”
43001024	Now those sent were from the Pharisees .
43001025	They asked him , “ If you’re not the Messiah , Elijah , or the Prophet , why then are you immersing ? ”
43001026	“ I immerse in water , ” John answered . “ Among you stands One you do not know ,
43001027	coming after me , whose sandals I’m not worthy to untie . ”
43001028	These things happened in Bethany beyond the Jordan , where John was immersing .
43001029	The next day , John sees Yeshua coming to him and says , “ Behold , the Lamb of God who takes away the sin of the world !
43001030	This is the One about whom I told you , ‘ He who comes after me is above me , because He was before me . ’
43001031	I didn’t know Him , but I came immersing with water so that He might be revealed to Israel . ”
43001032	Then John testified , “ I have seen the Ruach coming down like a dove out of heaven , and it remained on Him .
43001033	I did not know Him ; but the One who sent me to immerse in water said to me , ‘ The One on whom you see the Ruach coming down and remaining , this is the One who immerses in the Ruach ha-Kodesh . ’
43001034	And I have seen and testified that this is Ben-Elohim . ”
43001035	Again the next day , John was standing with two of his disciples
43001036	and watched Yeshua walking by . He said , “ Behold , the Lamb of God ! ”
43001037	The two disciples heard him say this , and they followed Yeshua .
43001038	Yeshua turned around and saw them following . He said to them , “ What are you looking for ? ” They said to Him , “ Rabbi ” ( which is translated Teacher ) , “ where are you staying ? ”
43001039	“ Come and see , ” Yeshua tells them . So they came and saw where He was staying , and they spent that day with Him . It was about the tenth hour .
43001040	Andrew , the brother of Simon Peter , was one of the two who heard John speak and followed Yeshua .
43001041	First he finds his own brother Simon and tells him , “ We’ve found the Messiah ! ” ( which is translated Anointed One ) .
43001042	Andrew brought Simon to Yeshua . Yeshua looked at him and said , “ You are Simon , son of John . You shall be called Kefa ( which is translated Peter ) . ”
43001043	The next day , Yeshua decided to go to the Galilee . He finds Philip and says to him , “ Follow Me ! ”
43001044	Now Philip was from Bethsaida , the same town as Andrew and Peter .
43001045	Philip finds Nathanael and tells him , “ We’ve found the One that Moses in the Torah , and also the prophets , wrote about — Yeshua of Natzeret , the son of Joseph ! ”
43001046	“ Natzeret ! ” Nathanael answered . “ Can anything good come from there ? ” Philip said to him , “ Come and see . ”
43001047	Yeshua saw Nathanael coming toward Him . He said , “ Look , a true Israelite ! There’s nothing false in him . ”
43001048	Nathanael said to Him , “ How do you know me ? ” Yeshua answered , “ Before Philip called you , when you were under the fig tree , I saw you . ”
43001049	“ Rabbi , ” Nathanael answered , “ You are Ben-Elohim ! You are the King of Israel ! ”
43001050	“ Because I told you that I saw you under the fig tree , you believe ? ” Yeshua replied to him . “ You will see greater things than that ! ”

43002001	On the third day , there was a wedding at Cana in the Galilee . Yeshua’s mother was there ,
43002002	and Yeshua and His disciples were also invited to the wedding .
43002003	When the wine ran out , Yeshua’s mother said to Him , “ They don’t have any wine ! ”
43002004	Yeshua said to her , “ Woman , what does this have to do with you and Me ? My hour hasn’t come yet . ”
43002005	His mother said to the servants , “ Do whatever He tells you . ”
43002006	Now there were six stone jars , used for the Jewish ritual of purification , each holding two to three measures .
43002007	Yeshua said to them , “ Fill the jars with water ! ” So they filled them up to the top .
43002008	Then He said to them , “ Take some water out , and give it to the headwaiter . ” And they brought it .
43002009	Now the headwaiter did not know where it had come from , but the servants who had drawn the water knew . As the headwaiter tasted the water that had become wine , he calls the bridegroom
43002010	and says to him , “ Everyone brings out the good wine first , and whenever they are drunk , then the worse . But you’ve reserved the good wine until now ! ”
43002011	Yeshua did this , the first of the signs , in Cana of the Galilee — He revealed His glory , and His disciples believed in Him .
43002012	After this Yeshua went down to Capernaum with His mother , brothers , and disciples , and they stayed there a few days .
43002013	The Jewish feast of Passover was near , so Yeshua went up to Jerusalem .
43002014	In the Temple , He found the merchants selling oxen , sheep , and doves ; also the moneychangers sitting there .
43002015	Then He made a whip of cords and drove them all out of the Temple , both the sheep and oxen . He dumped out the coins of the moneychangers and overturned their tables .
43002016	To those selling doves , He said , “ Get these things out of here ! Stop making My Father’s house a marketplace ! ”
43002017	His disciples remembered that it is written , “ Zeal for your House will consume Me ! ”
43002018	The Judean leaders responded , “ What sign do You show us , since You are doing these things ? ”
43002019	“ Destroy this Temple , ” Yeshua answered them , “ and in three days I will raise it up . ”
43002020	The Judean leaders then said to Him , “ Forty-six years this Temple was being built , and You will raise it up in three days ? ”
43002021	But He was talking about the temple of His body .

43002023	Now when He was in Jerusalem for the Passover , during the feast , many believed in His name , seeing the signs He was doing .

43003001	Now there was a man , a Pharisee named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jewish people .

43003008	The wind blows where it wishes and you hear its sound , but you do not know where it comes from or where it goes . So it is with everyone born of the Ruach . ”

43003018	The one who believes in Him is not condemned ; but whoever does not believe has been condemned already , because he has not put his trust in the name of the one and only Ben-Elohim .
43003019	“ Now this is the judgment , that the light has come into the world and men loved the darkness instead of the light , because their deeds were evil .

43003022	Afterwards , Yeshua and His disciples came to the land of Judea . There He was staying with them and immersing .

43004001	Now Yeshua knew that the Pharisees heard that He was making and immersing more disciples than John .

43004005	So He comes to a Samaritan town called Shechem , near the plot of land that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
43004006	Now Jacob’s well was there . So Yeshua , exhausted from the journey , was sitting by the well . It was midday .
43004007	A Samaritan woman comes to draw water . “ Give me a drink , ” Yeshua tells her ,
43004008	for His disciples had gone away to the town to buy food .
43004009	Then the Samaritan woman tells Him , “ How is it that You , a Jew , ask me , a Samaritan woman , for a drink ? ” ( For Jewish people don’t deal with Samaritans . )
43004010	Yeshua replied to her , “ If you knew the gift of God , and who it is who is saying to you , ‘ Give Me a drink , ’ you would have asked Him , and He would have given you living water . ”

43004012	You’re not greater than our father Jacob , are You ? He gave us this well . He drank out of it himself , with his sons and his cattle . ”
43004013	Yeshua replied to her , “ Everyone who drinks from this water will get thirsty again .

43004015	“ Sir , ” the woman tells Him , “ give me this water , so I won’t get thirsty or have to come all the way here to draw water ! ”

43004023	But an hour is coming — it is here now — when the true worshipers will worship the Father in spirit and truth , for the Father is seeking such people as His worshipers .

43004027	At this moment , His disciples came back . They were amazed that He was speaking with a woman . Yet no one said , “ What do You want ? ” or “ Why are You speaking with her ? ”
43004028	So the woman left her water jar and went back to the town . She tells the people ,
43004029	“ Come see a man who told me everything I ever did ! He couldn’t be the Messiah , could He ? ”
43004030	The people left the town and began coming to Him .
43004031	Meanwhile , the disciples were pressing Him , “ Rabbi , eat ! ”
43004032	But He said to them , “ I have food to eat that you know nothing about . ”
43004033	So the disciples were saying to each other , “ No one brought Him food to eat , did they ? ”
43004034	Yeshua tells them , “ My food is to do the will of the One who sent Me and to accomplish His work .

43004036	“ The reaper receives a reward and gathers fruit for eternal life , so that the sower and reaper may rejoice together .
43004037	For the saying is true , ‘ One sows and another reaps . ’
43004038	I sent you to reap what you haven’t worked for . Others have worked hard , and you have joined in their work . ”
43004039	Many of the Samaritans from that town put their trust in Him because of the word of the woman testifying , “ He told me everything I ever did ! ”

43004050	Yeshua tells him , “ Go ! Your son lives ! ” The man believed the word that Yeshua said to him and started off .
43004051	While on his way down , his servants met him , saying that his son was living .

43005001	After this there was a Jewish feast , and Yeshua went up to Jerusalem .
43005002	Now in Jerusalem there is a pool by the sheep gate , called Bethzatha in Aramaic , which has five porches .
43005003	In these a crowd of invalids was lying around — blind , lame , disabled . ( 4 )
43005005	Now a certain man had been an invalid there for thirty-eight years .
43005006	Seeing him lying there and knowing he had been that way a long time , Yeshua said to him , “ Do you want to get well ? ”
43005007	The invalid answered Him , “ Sir , I have nobody to put me into the pool when the water is stirred up . While I’m trying to get in , somebody else steps down before me ! ”
43005008	Yeshua tells him , “ Get up ! Pick up your mat and walk ! ”
43005009	Immediately , the man was healed ! He took up his mat and started walking around . Now that day was Shabbat ,
43005010	so Judean leaders were saying to the man who was healed , “ It’s Shabbat ! It’s not permitted for you to carry your mat . ”
43005011	But he answered them , “ The man who made me well told me , ‘ Pick up your mat and walk . ’ ”

43005015	The man left and told the Judean leaders that it was Yeshua who had made him well .
