43005017	But Yeshua said to them , “ My Father is still working , and I also am working . ”
43005018	So for this reason the Judean leaders kept trying even harder to kill Him — because He was not only breaking Shabbat , but also calling God His own Father , making Himself equal with God .
43005019	Therefore Yeshua answered them , “ Amen , amen I tell you , the Son cannot do anything by Himself . He can do only what He sees the Father doing . Whatever the Father does , the Son does likewise .
43005020	For the Father loves the Son and shows Him everything He does . He will show Him even greater works than these , so that you will be amazed .
43005021	For just as the Father raises the dead and gives them life , so also the Son gives life to whomever He wants .
43005022	The Father does not judge anyone , but has handed over all judgment to the Son
43005023	so that all should honor the Son , just as they honor the Father . Whoever does not honor the Son does not honor the Father who sent Him .
43005024	“ Amen , amen I tell you , whoever hears My word and trusts the One who sent Me has eternal life . He does not come into judgment , but has passed over from death into life .
43005025	Amen , amen I tell you , an hour is coming and is now here , when the dead will hear the voice of Ben-Elohim . Those who hear will live !
43005026	For just as the Father has life in Himself , so also He has granted the Son to have life in Himself .
43005027	Also He has given the Son authority to judge , because He is the Son of Man .
43005028	“ Do not be amazed at this , for an hour is coming when all who are in their graves will hear His voice
43005029	and come out ! Those who have done good will come to a resurrection of life , and those who have done evil will come to a resurrection of judgment .
43005030	I can do nothing on My own . Just as I hear , I judge ; and My judgment is just , for I do not seek My own will , but the will of the One who sent Me . ”
43005031	“ If I testify about Myself , My witness is not valid .
43005032	There is another who testifies about Me , and I know that the testimony He gives is true .
43005033	You have sent to John , and he has testified to the truth .
43005034	I do not receive the testimony of man , but I say these things so that you may be saved .
43005035	He was the lamp that was burning and shining , and you wanted to rejoice for a while in his light .
43005036	“ But the testimony I have is greater than that from John . The works the Father has given Me to finish — the very works I am doing — testify about Me , that the Father has sent Me .
43005037	And the Father who sent Me has testified concerning Me . You have never heard His voice nor seen His form .
43005038	Nor do you have His Word living in you , because you do not trust the One He sent .
43005039	You search the Scriptures because you suppose that in them you have eternal life . It is these that testify about Me .
43005040	Yet you are unwilling to come to Me so that you may have life !
43005041	“ I do not accept glory from men .
43005042	But I know you , that you do not have the love of God in yourselves .
43005043	I have come in My Father’s name , and you do not receive Me . But if another comes in his own name , you will receive him .
43005044	How can you believe , when you receive glory from one another and you do not seek the glory that comes from God alone ?
43005045	“ Do not think that I will accuse you before the Father . The one who accuses you is Moses , in whom you have put your hope .
43005046	For if you were believing Moses , you would believe Me — because he wrote about Me .
43005047	But since you do not believe his writings , how will you believe My words ? ”
43006001	Afterwards , Yeshua went away to the other side of the Sea of Galilee , also known as the Sea of Tiberias .
43006002	A large crowd kept following Him , because they were watching the signs He was performing on the sick .
43006003	Then Yeshua went up the mountainside and sat down there with His disciples .
43006004	Passover , the Jewish feast , was near .
43006005	Lifting up His eyes and seeing a large crowd coming to Him , Yeshua said to Philip , “ Where will we buy bread so these may eat ? ”
43006006	Now Yeshua was saying this to test him , for He knew what He was about to do .
43006007	Philip answered Him , “ Two hundred denarii isn’t enough to buy bread for each to get a little bit ! ”
43006008	One of His disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter’s brother , said to Him ,
43006009	“ There’s a boy here who has five barley loaves and two fish — but what’s that for so many ? ”
43006010	Yeshua said , “ Make the people recline . ” There was much grass in the area . So the men reclined , about five thousand in number .
43006011	Then Yeshua picked up the loaves . And having given thanks , He distributed bread to everyone who was reclining . He did the same with the fish , as much as they wanted .
43006012	When the people were full , Yeshua said to His disciples , “ Gather up the leftovers , so nothing is wasted . ”
43006013	So they gathered them and filled twelve baskets with broken pieces from the five barley loaves , which were left over by those who had finished eating .
43006014	When the people saw the sign that Yeshua performed , they began to say , “ This is most certainly the Prophet who is to come into the world ! ”
43006015	Realizing that they were about to come and seize Him by force to make Him king , Yeshua withdrew again to the mountain , Himself alone .
43006016	Now when evening came , Yeshua’s disciples went down to the sea .
43006017	Getting into a boat , they set out to cross the sea toward Capernaum . By now it had become dark , and still Yeshua had not come to them .
43006018	A great wind began to blow , stirring up the sea .
43006019	After they had rowed about twenty-five or thirty stadia , they catch sight of Yeshua walking on the sea , approaching the boat . They were terrified !
43006020	But Yeshua says to them , “ I am . Don’t be afraid . ”
43006021	Then they wanted to take Him into the boat , and right away the boat reached the shore where they were headed .
43006022	The next day , the crowd remaining on the other side of the sea realized that no other boat had been there except the one , and that Yeshua hadn’t gone into the boat with His disciples , but that His disciples had gone away alone .
43006023	Some other boats from Tiberias came close to the place where they had eaten the bread after the Master had given thanks .
43006024	So when the crowd realized that neither Yeshua nor His disciples were there , they got into the boats and set off for Capernaum to find Him .
43006025	When they found Him on the other side of the sea , they said , “ Rabbi , when did You get here ? ”
43006026	Yeshua responded to them , “ Amen , amen I tell you , you seek Me not because you saw signs , but because you ate all the bread and were filled .
43006027	Don’t work for food that spoils , but for the food that endures to eternal life , which the Son of Man will give to you . For on Him , God the Father has put the seal of approval . ”
43006028	Then they said to Him , “ What shall we do to perform the works of God ? ”
43006029	Yeshua answered them , “ This is the work of God , to trust in the One He sent . ”
43006030	So they said to Him , “ Then what sign do You perform , so that we may see and believe You ? What work do You do ?
43006031	Our fathers ate the manna in the wilderness ; as it is written , ‘ Out of heaven He gave them bread to eat . ’ ”
43006032	Yeshua answered them , “ Amen , amen I tell you , it isn’t Moses who has given you bread from heaven , but My Father gives you the true bread from heaven .
43006033	For the bread of God is the One coming down from heaven and giving life to the world . ”
43006034	So they said to Him , “ Sir , give us this bread from now on ! ”
43006035	Yeshua said to them , “ I am the bread of life . Whoever comes to Me will never be hungry , and whoever believes in Me will never be thirsty .
43006036	But I told you that you have seen Me , yet you do not believe .
43006037	Everyone the Father gives Me will come to Me , and anyone coming to Me I will never reject .
43006038	For I have come down from heaven not to do My own will but the will of the One who sent Me .
43006039	“ Now this is the will of the One who sent Me , that I lose not one of all He has given Me , but raise each one on the last day .
43006040	For this is the will of My Father , that everyone who sees the Son and trusts in Him may have eternal life ; and I will raise him up on the last day . ”
43006041	Some of the Judeans started to grumble about Him , because He said , “ I am the bread that came down from heaven . ”
43006042	They were saying , “ Isn’t this Yeshua the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? How can He now say , ‘ I have come down from heaven ’ ? ”
43006043	Yeshua answered , “ Stop grumbling among yourselves !
43006044	No one can come to Me unless My Father who sent Me draws him — and I will raise him up on the last day .
43006045	It is written in the Prophets , ‘ They will all be taught by God . ’ Everyone who has listened and learned from the Father comes to Me .
43006046	Not that anyone has seen the Father except the One who is from God — He has seen the Father .
43006047	“ Amen , amen I tell you , he who believes has eternal life .
43006048	I am the bread of life .
43006049	Your fathers ate the manna in the desert , yet they died .
43006050	This is the bread that comes down from heaven , so that one may eat and not die .
43006051	I am the living bread , which came down from heaven . If anyone eats this bread , he will live forever . This bread is My flesh , which I will give for the life of the world . ”
43006052	Then the Jews began arguing with one another , “ How can this man give us His flesh to eat ? ”
43006053	So Yeshua said to them , “ Amen , amen I tell you , unless you eat the flesh of the Son of Man and drink His blood , you have no life in yourselves .
43006054	He who eats My flesh and drinks My blood has eternal life , and I will raise him up on the last day .
43006055	“ For My flesh is real food and My blood is real drink .
43006056	He who eats My flesh and drinks My blood abides in Me , and I in him .
43006057	Just as the living Father sent Me and I live because of the Father , so the one who eats of Me will also live because of Me .
43006058	This is the bread that came down from heaven — not like the bread your fathers ate and then died . He who eats this bread will live forever . ”
43006059	He said these things while teaching at the synagogue in Capernaum .
43006060	So when many of His disciples heard this , they said , “ This is a hard teaching . Who can listen to it ? ”
43006061	But Yeshua knew His disciples were murmuring , so He said to them , “ Does this offend you ?
43006062	Then what if you see the Son of Man going back up to the place where He was before ?
43006063	It is the Ruach who gives life ; the flesh is of no benefit . The words I have spoken to you are Ruach and are life !
43006064	Yet some of you do not trust . ” Yeshua knew from the beginning who were the ones who did not trust , as well as which one would betray Him .
43006065	Then He told them , “ For this reason I’ve told you that no one can come to Me unless it has been granted to him by the Father . ”
43006066	From this time , many of His disciples left and quit walking with Him .
43006067	So Yeshua said to the Twelve , “ You don’t want to leave also , do you ? ”
43006068	Simon Peter answered Him , “ Lord , to whom shall we go ? You have the words of eternal life !
43006069	We have trusted and have come to know that you are the Holy One of God . ”
43006070	Yeshua answered them , “ Didn’t I choose you , the Twelve ? Yet one of you is the adversary ! ”
43006071	Now He was speaking of Judah , the son of Simon of Kriot — for he , one of the Twelve , was about to betray Him .
43007001	After these events , Yeshua was walking about in the Galilee . He did not want to walk in Judea , because the Judean leaders wanted to kill Him .
43007002	Now the Jewish Feast of Tabernacles was near .
43007003	Therefore His brothers said to Him , “ Leave here and go to Judea , so Your disciples also may see the works You are doing .
43007004	No one who wants to be well known does everything in secret . If You are doing these things , show Yourself to the world ! ”
43007005	For not even His brothers were trusting in Him .
43007006	Therefore Yeshua said to them , “ My time has not yet come , but your time is always at hand .
43007007	The world cannot hate you , but it hates Me because I testify that its works are evil .
43007008	You go on up to the Feast . I’m not going to this Feast , because My time hasn’t yet fully come . ”
43007009	After saying these things , He stayed in the Galilee .
43007010	But after His brothers went to the Feast , He also went , not openly but secretly .
43007011	Then the Judean leaders were searching for Him at the Feast and kept asking , “ Where is that fellow ? ”
43007012	There was a lot of murmuring about Him in the crowds . Some were saying , “ He is good . ” But others were saying , “ Not so ! He leads the people astray . ”
43007013	Yet no one spoke openly about Him for fear of the Judean leaders .
43007014	About halfway through the Feast , Yeshua went up to the Temple and began teaching .
43007015	Then the Judean leaders were amazed , saying , “ How does this man know so much , having never been taught ? ”
43007016	Yeshua answered , “ My teaching is not from Me , but from Him who sent Me .
43007017	If anyone wants to do His will , he will know whether My teaching comes from God or it is Myself speaking .
43007018	Whoever speaks from himself seeks his own glory ; but He who seeks the glory of the One who sent Him , He is true and there is no unrighteousness in Him .
43007019	Hasn’t Moses given you the Torah ? Yet none of you keeps it . Why are you trying to kill Me ? ”
43007020	The crowd answered , “ You have a demon ! Who’s trying to kill you ? ”
43007021	Yeshua answered , “ I did one good work , and all of you are amazed .
43007022	Because Moses has given you circumcision ( though it is not from Moses , but from the patriarchs ) , you circumcise a man on Shabbat .
43007023	If a man receives circumcision on Shabbat so that the Torah of Moses may not be broken , why are you angry that I healed a man’s whole body on Shabbat ?
43007024	Do not judge by appearance , but judge righteously . ”
43007025	Then some of the people from Jerusalem were saying , “ Isn’t this the person they’re trying to kill ?
43007026	Look , He speaks openly and they’re saying nothing to Him . Can it be that the leaders know He is the Messiah ?
43007027	But we know where this person is from . But the Messiah , whenever He may come , no one knows where He is from . ”
43007028	Then , while teaching in the Temple courts , Yeshua cried out , “ You know both who I am and where I am from ! I have not come on My own , but the One who sent Me is true . You do not know Him ,
43007029	but I know Him because I am from Him and He sent Me . ”
43007030	Then they were trying to seize Him ; but no one laid a hand on Him , because His hour had not yet come .
43007031	Yet many from the crowd believed in Him and were saying , “ When the Messiah comes , He won’t perform more signs than this person has , will He ? ”
43007032	The Pharisees heard people in the crowd murmuring these things about Him , and the ruling kohanim and Pharisees sent guards to arrest Him .
43007033	Yeshua said , “ I am with you only a little while longer , and then I am going to the One who sent Me .
43007034	You will look for Me but will not find Me . Where I am , you cannot come . ”
43007035	The Judean leaders then said among themselves , “ Where is this person about to go that we shall not find Him ? He’s not going to the Diaspora to teach the Greeks , is He ?
43007036	What did He mean by saying , ‘ You will look for Me but will not find Me . Where I am , you cannot come ’ ? ”
43007037	On the last and greatest day of the Feast , Yeshua stood up and cried out loudly , “ If anyone is thirsty , let him come to Me and drink .
43007038	Whoever believes in Me , as the Scripture says , ‘ out of his innermost being will flow rivers of living water . ’ ”
43007039	Now He said this about the Ruach , whom those who trusted in Him were going to receive ; for the Ruach was not yet given , since Yeshua was not yet glorified .
43007040	When they heard these words , some of the crowd said , “ This man really is the Prophet . ”
43007041	Others were saying , “ This is the Messiah . ” Still others were saying , “ The Messiah doesn’t come from the Galilee , does He ?
43007042	Didn’t the Scripture say that the Messiah comes from the seed of David and from Bethlehem , David’s town ? ”
43007043	So a division arose in the crowd because of Yeshua .
43007044	Some wanted to capture Him , but no one laid hands on Him .
43007045	Then the guards returned to the ruling kohanim and Pharisees , who asked them , “ Why didn’t you bring Him ? ”
43007046	“ Never has anyone spoken like this man , ” the guards answered .
43007047	The Pharisees responded , “ You haven’t been led astray also , have you ?
43007048	Have any of the rulers or Pharisees believed in Him ?
43007049	No , but this mob that doesn’t know the Torah — they are cursed ! ”
43007050	Nicodemus , the one who had come to Yeshua before and was one of them , said to them ,
43007051	“ Our Torah doesn’t judge a man unless it first hears from him and knows what he’s doing , does it ? ”
43007052	They answered him , “ You aren’t from the Galilee too , are you ? Search , and see that no prophet comes out of the Galilee ! ”
43007053	Then everyone went to his own house .
43008001	But Yeshua went to the Mount of Olives .
43008002	At dawn , He came again into the Temple . All the people were coming to Him , and He sat down and began to teach them .
43008003	The Torah scholars and Pharisees bring in a woman who had been caught in adultery . After putting her in the middle ,
43008004	they say to Yeshua , “ Teacher , this woman has been caught in the act of committing adultery .
43008005	In the Torah , Moses commanded us to stone such women . So what do You say ? ”
43008006	Now they were saying this to trap Him , so that they would have grounds to accuse Him . But Yeshua knelt down and started writing in the dirt with His finger .
43008007	When they kept asking Him , He stood up and said , “ The sinless one among you , let him be the first to throw a stone at her . ”
43008008	Then He knelt down again and continued writing on the ground .
43008009	Now when they heard , they began to leave , one by one , the oldest ones first , until Yeshua was left alone with the woman in the middle .
43008010	Straightening up , Yeshua said to her , “ Woman , where are they ? Did no one condemn you ? ”
43008011	“ No one , Sir , ” she said . “ Then neither do I condemn you , ” Yeshua said . “ Go , and sin no more . ”
43008012	Yeshua spoke to them again , saying , “ I am the light of the world . The one who follows Me will no longer walk in darkness , but will have the light of life . ”
43008013	Then the Pharisees said to Him , “ You are testifying about Yourself , so Your testimony is not valid . ”
43008014	Yeshua answered them , “ Even if I testify about Myself , My testimony is valid . For I know where I came from and where I am going . But you don’t know where I come from or where I am going .
43008015	You judge according to the flesh , but I do not judge anyone .
43008016	Yet even if I do judge , My judgment is true , because it is not I alone but I with the Father who sent Me .
43008017	Even in your Torah it is written that the testimony of two men is true .
43008018	I am one witness for Myself , and the Father who sent Me bears witness for Me . ”
43008019	Then they said to Him , “ Where is your Father ? ” Yeshua answered , “ You know neither Me nor My Father . If you knew Me , you would also know My Father . ”
43008020	He spoke these words in the treasury while teaching in the Temple , but no one arrested Him because His hour had not yet come .
43008021	Then again Yeshua spoke to them , “ I am going away . You will look for Me and die in your sin . Where I am going , you cannot come . ”
43008022	“ He won’t kill Himself , will He ? ” the Judeans asked . “ Is that why He says , ‘ Where I am going , you cannot come ’ ? ”
43008023	Yeshua said , “ You are from below ; I am from above . You are of this world ; I am not of this world .
43008024	Therefore I told you that you will die in your sins . If you don’t believe that I am , you will die in your sins . ”
43008025	So they asked Him , “ Who are you ? ” Yeshua replied , “ What have I been telling you from the beginning ?
43008026	I have much to say and judge about you . But the One who sent Me is true , and I tell the world what I heard from Him . ”
43008027	They didn’t understand that He was talking to them about the Father .
43008028	So Yeshua said , “ When you have lifted up the Son of Man , then you will know who I am . I do nothing by Myself , but speak just what the Father has taught Me .
43008029	The One who sent Me is with Me . He has not left Me alone , because I always do what is pleasing to Him . ”
43008030	As He was speaking these things , many people put their trust in Him .
43008031	Then Yeshua said to the Judeans who had trusted Him , “ If you abide in My word , then you are truly My disciples .
43008032	You will know the truth , and the truth will set you free ! ”
43008033	They answered Him , “ We are Abraham’s children and have never been slaves to anyone ! How can you say , ‘ You will become free ’ ? ”
43008034	Yeshua answered them , “ Amen , amen I tell you , everyone who sins is a slave to sin .
43008035	Now the slave does not remain in the household forever ; the son abides forever .
43008036	So if the Son sets you free , you will be free indeed !
43008037	I know you are Abraham’s children ; yet you are trying to kill Me , because My word has no place in you .
43008038	I tell of what I have seen with the Father ; so also you do what you heard from the Father . ”
43008039	“ Abraham is our father , ” they replied to Him . Yeshua said to them , “ If you are Abraham’s children , do the deeds of Abraham .
43008040	But now you are seeking to kill Me — a Man who has told you the truth , which I heard from God . This Abraham did not do !
43008041	You are doing the deeds of your father . ” They said to Him , “ We were not born as illegitimate children — we have one Father , God Himself ! ”
43008042	Yeshua said to them , “ If God were your Father , you would love Me , for from God I came and now I am here . For I have not come on My own , but He sent Me .
43008043	Why don’t you understand My speech ? Because you’re not able to hear My word !
43008044	You are of your father the devil , and you want to do the desires of your father . He was a murderer from the beginning and does not stand in the truth , because there is no truth in him . Whenever he speaks lies he is just being himself — for he is a liar and the father of lies .
43008045	“ But because I speak the truth , you do not believe Me .
43008046	Which one of you convicts Me of sinning ? If I am telling the truth , why don’t you believe Me ?
43008047	He who belongs to God hears the words of God . The reason you don’t hear is because you do not belong to God . ”
43008048	The Judean leaders responded , “ Aren’t we right to say you are a Samaritan and have a demon ? ”
43008049	Yeshua answered , “ I do not have a demon ! I honor My Father , yet you dishonor Me .
43008050	But I do not seek My own glory ; there is One who is seeking and judging .
43008051	Amen , amen I tell you , if anyone keeps My word , he will never see death . ”
43008052	“ Now we know You have a demon ! ” the Judean leaders said to Him . “ Abraham and the prophets died . Yet You say , ‘ If anyone keeps My word , he will never taste death . ’
43008053	You are not greater than our father Abraham who died , are You ? The prophets also died ! Who do You make Yourself out to be ? ”
43008054	Yeshua answered , “ If I glorify Myself , My glory is nothing . It is My Father who gives Me glory — the One of whom you say , ‘ He is our God . ’
43008055	Yet you do not know Him , but I know Him . If I say I do not know Him , I will be a liar like you . Yet I do know Him and keep His Word .
43008056	Your father Abraham rejoiced to see My day ; he saw it and was thrilled . ”
43008057	Then the Judeans said to Him , “ You’re not even fifty years old and you’ve seen Abraham ? ”
43008058	Yeshua answered , “ Amen , amen I tell you , before Abraham was , I am ! ”
43008059	Then they picked up stones to throw at Him , but Yeshua hid Himself and went out from the Temple .
43009001	As Yeshua was passing by , He saw a man who had been blind since birth .
43009002	His disciples asked Him , “ Rabbi , who sinned , this man or his parents , that he should be born blind ? ”
43009003	Yeshua answered , “ Neither this man nor his parents sinned . This happened so that the works of God might be brought to light in him .
43009004	We must do the work of the One who sent Me , so long as it is day ! Night is coming when no one can work .
43009005	While I am in the world , I am the light of the world . ”
43009006	Having said these things , He spat on the ground , made mud with the saliva , and spread the mud on the blind man’s eyes .
43009007	He told him , “ Go , wash in the Pool of Siloam ” ( which is translated Sent ) . So he went away , washed , and came back seeing .
43009008	Therefore his neighbors and those who had seen him as a beggar kept saying , “ Isn’t this the one who used to sit and beg ? ”
43009009	“ This is the one ! ” some said . “ No , but it looks like him , ” said others . But the man himself kept saying , “ I am ! ”
43009010	So they asked him , “ Then how were your eyes opened ? ”
43009011	He answered , “ The Man who is called Yeshua made mud , rubbed it on my eyes , and said to me , ‘ Go to Siloam and wash . ’ So I went away and washed , and then I received my sight ! ”
43009012	“ Where is He ? ” they asked him . “ I don’t know , ” he said .
43009013	They bring to the Pharisees the man who once was blind .
43009014	Now the day was Shabbat when Yeshua made the mud and opened the man’s eyes .
43009015	So again the Pharisees were asking him how he received his sight . He responded , “ He put mud on my eyes , and I washed , and I see ! ”
43009016	So some of the Pharisees began saying , “ This man isn’t from God , because He doesn’t keep Shabbat ! ” But others were saying , “ How can a sinner perform such signs ? ” So there was a split among them .
43009017	Again they say to the blind man , “ What do you say about Him , since He opened your eyes ? ” And he said , “ He’s a prophet . ”
43009018	So the Judean leaders didn’t believe that he had been blind and received his sight until they called his parents .
43009019	They questioned them , “ Is this your son , whom you say was born blind ? Then how does he see now ? ”
43009020	Then his parents answered , “ We know that this is our son and that he was born blind .
43009021	We don’t know how he now sees , nor do we know who opened his eyes . Ask him — he’s old enough . He will speak for himself . ”
43009022	His parents said this because they were afraid of the Judean leaders . For the Judean leaders had already agreed that anyone who professed Yeshua to be Messiah would be thrown out of the synagogue .
43009023	That’s why his parents said , “ He’s old enough — ask him . ”
43009024	So a second time they called the man who had been blind and said , “ Give glory to God ! We know that this man is a sinner ! ”
43009025	The man replied , “ I don’t know whether He’s a sinner . One thing I do know is that I was blind , but now I see ! ”
43009026	So they asked him , “ What did He do to you ? How did He open your eyes ? ”
43009027	“ I told you already and you didn’t listen ! ” the man responded . “ What , do you want to hear it again ? You don’t want to become His disciples too , do you ? ”
43009028	They railed at him and said , “ You’re a disciple of that One , but we’re disciples of Moses !
43009029	We know that God has spoken to Moses ; but as for this fellow , we don’t know where He is from . ”
43009030	The man replied to them , “ That’s amazing ! You don’t know where He is from , yet He opened my eyes !
43009031	We know that God doesn’t listen to sinners ; but if anyone fears Him and does His will , He hears this one .
43009032	Since the beginning of the world , no one has ever heard that anyone has opened the eyes of a man born blind .
43009033	If this man were not from God , He couldn’t do anything . ”
43009034	They replied to him , “ You were born completely in sin , and you’re teaching us ? ” And they threw him out .
43009035	Yeshua heard that they had thrown him out . Finding him , He said , “ Do you believe in the Son of Man ? ”
43009036	The man answered , “ Who is He , Sir ? Tell me , so that I may believe in Him ! ”
43009037	Yeshua said , “ You have seen Him — He is the One speaking with you . ”
43009038	He said , “ Lord , I believe ! ” And he worshiped Him .
43009039	Yeshua said , “ For judgment I came into this world , so that those who don’t see may see , and the ones who do see may become blind . ”
43009040	Some of the Pharisees who were with Him heard Him say this and asked , “ We’re not blind too , are we ? ”
43009041	Yeshua said to them , “ If you were blind , you would have no sin . But now you say , ‘ We see . ’ So your sin remains . ”
43010001	“ Amen , amen I tell you , he who does not enter the sheepfold by the door , but climbs in some other way , is a thief and a robber .
43010002	But he who enters through the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
43010003	To him the doorkeeper opens , and the sheep hear his voice . The shepherd calls his own sheep by name and leads them out .
43010004	“ When he has brought out all his own , he goes ahead of them ; and the sheep follow him because they know his voice .
43010005	They will never follow a stranger , but will run away from him , for they do not know the voice of strangers . ”
43010006	Yeshua told them this parable , but they did not understand what He was telling them .
43010007	So Yeshua said again , “ Amen , amen I tell you , I am the gate for the sheep .
43010008	All those who came before Me are thieves and robbers , but the sheep did not listen to them .
43010009	I am the gate ! If anyone comes in through Me , he will be saved . He will come and go and find pasture .
43010010	The thief comes only to steal , slaughter , and destroy . I have come that they might have life , and have it abundantly !
43010011	“ I am the Good Shepherd . The Good Shepherd lays down His life for the sheep .
43010012	The hired worker is not the shepherd , and the sheep are not his own . He sees the wolf coming and abandons the sheep and flees . Then the wolf snatches and scatters the sheep .
43010013	The man is only a hired hand and does not care about the sheep .
43010014	“ I am the Good Shepherd . I know My own and My own know Me ,
43010015	just as the Father knows Me and I know the Father . And I lay down My life for the sheep .
43010016	I have other sheep that are not from this fold ; those also I must lead , and they will listen to My voice . So there shall be one flock , one Shepherd .
43010017	“ For this reason the Father loves Me , because I lay down My life , so that I may take it up again .
43010018	No one takes it away from Me , but I lay it down on My own . I have the authority to lay it down , and I have the authority to take it up again . This command I received from My Father . ”
43010019	Again a division arose among the Judeans because of these words .
43010020	Many of them were saying , “ He has a demon . He’s insane ! Why listen to Him ? ”
43010021	Others said , “ These are not the sayings of someone who is plagued by a demon . A demon cannot open the eyes of the blind , can it ? ”
43010022	Then came Hanukkah ; it was winter in Jerusalem .
43010023	Yeshua was walking in the Temple around Solomon’s Colonnade .
43010024	Then the Judean leaders surrounded Him , saying , “ How long will You hold us in suspense ? If You are the Messiah , tell us outright ! ”
43010025	Yeshua answered them , “ I told you , but you don’t believe ! The works I do in My Father’s name testify concerning Me .
43010026	But you don’t believe , because you are not My sheep .
43010027	My sheep hear My voice . I know them , and they follow Me .
43010028	I give them eternal life ! They will never perish , and no one will snatch them out of My hand .
43010029	My Father , who has given them to Me , is greater than all . And no one is able to snatch them out of the Father’s hand .
43010030	I and the Father are one . ”
43010031	Again the Judean leaders picked up stones to stone Him .
43010032	Yeshua answered them , “ I’ve shown you many good works from the Father . For which of these are you going to stone Me ? ”
43010033	The Judean leaders answered , “ We aren’t stoning you for a good work , but for blasphemy . Though You are a man , You make Yourself God ! ”
43010034	Yeshua answered them , “ Isn’t it written in your Writings , ‘ I have said you are gods’ ?
43010035	If he called them ‘ gods , ’ to whom the Word of God came ( and the Scripture cannot be broken ) ,
43010036	do you say of Him , the One the Father set apart and sent into the world , ‘ You speak blasphemy , ’ because I said , ‘ I am Ben-Elohim ’ ?
43010037	“ If I don’t do the works of My Father , don’t believe Me !
43010038	But if I do , even if you don’t trust Me , trust the deeds . Then you may come to know and continue to understand that the Father is in Me , and I am in the Father . ”
43010039	Therefore they tried to capture Him again , but He escaped from their hand .
43010040	Again He went back across the Jordan to the place where John first started immersing , and He stayed there .
43010041	Many people came to Him and were saying , “ John performed no sign , but all John said about this man was true . ”
43010042	And many trusted in Him there .
43011001	Now a man named Lazarus was sick . He was from Bethany , the village of Miriam and her sister Martha .
43011002	This was the same Miriam who anointed the Master with perfume and wiped His feet with her hair . It was her brother Lazarus who was sick .
43011003	So the sisters sent a word to Yeshua , saying , “ Master , the one you love is sick ! ”
43011004	When Yeshua heard this , He said , “ This sickness will not end in death . It is for God’s glory , so that Ben-Elohim may be glorified through it . ”
43011005	Now Yeshua loved Martha and her sister and Lazarus .
43011006	However , when He heard that Lazarus was sick , He stayed where He was for two more days .
43011007	Then after this , He said to His disciples , “ Let’s go up to Judea again . ”
43011008	“ Rabbi , ” the disciples say to Him , “ just now the Judean leaders were trying to stone You ! And You’re going back there again ? ”
43011009	Yeshua answered , “ Aren’t there twelve hours in the day ? If a man walks in the day , he doesn’t stumble , because he sees the light of the world .
43011010	But if a man should walk around at night , he stumbles , because the light is not in him . ”
43011011	After He said this , He tells them , “ Our friend Lazarus has fallen asleep , but I’m going there to wake him up . ”
43011012	So the disciples said to Him , “ Master , if he has fallen asleep , he will get better . ”
43011013	Now Yeshua had spoken about his death , but they thought He was talking about ordinary sleep .
43011014	Then Yeshua told them clearly , “ Lazarus is dead !
43011015	I’m glad for your sake I wasn’t there , so that you may believe . Anyway , let’s go to him ! ”
43011016	Then Thomas called the Twin said to the other disciples , “ Let’s go too , so that we may die with Him ! ”
43011017	So when Yeshua arrived , He discovered that Lazarus had been in the tomb already for four days .
43011018	Bethany was less than two miles from Jerusalem ,
43011019	and many of the Judeans had come to Martha and Miriam to console them about their brother .
43011020	When Martha heard that Yeshua was coming , she went out to meet Him ; but Miriam sat in the house .
43011021	Martha said to Yeshua , “ Master , if You had been here , my brother wouldn’t have died !
43011022	But I know , even now , that whatever You may ask of God , He will give You . ”
43011023	Yeshua said to her , “ Your brother will rise again . ”
43011024	Martha said to Him , “ I know , he will rise again in the resurrection on the last day . ”
43011025	Yeshua said to her , “ I am the resurrection and the life ! Whoever believes in Me , even if he dies , shall live .
43011026	And whoever lives and believes in Me shall never die . Do you believe this ? ”
43011027	She says to Him , “ Yes , Lord , I believe that you are the Messiah , Ben-Elohim who has come into the world . ”
43011028	After she said this , she left and secretly told her sister Miriam , “ The Teacher is here , and He’s calling for you . ”
43011029	As soon as Miriam heard , she quickly got up and was coming to Him .
43011030	Now Yeshua had not yet come into the village , but was still in the place where Martha had met Him .
43011031	The Judeans , who were with Miriam in the house and comforting her , seeing how quickly she got up and went out , followed her . They thought she was going to the tomb to weep there .
43011032	So when Miriam came to where Yeshua was , she saw Him and fell at His feet , saying to Him , “ Master , if You had been here , my brother would not have died ! ”
43011033	When Yeshua saw her weeping , and the Judeans who came with her weeping , He was deeply troubled in spirit and Himself agitated .
43011034	“ Where have you laid him ? ” He asked . “ Come and see , Master , ” they tell Him .
43011035	Yeshua wept .
43011036	So the Judeans said , “ See how He loved him ! ”
43011037	But some of them said , “ Couldn’t this One , who opened the eyes of the blind man , have also kept this man from dying ? ”
43011038	So Yeshua , again deeply troubled within Himself , comes to the tomb . It was a cave , and a stone was lying against it .
43011039	Yeshua says , “ Roll away the stone ! ” Martha , the dead man’s sister , said to Him , “ Master , by this time he stinks ! He’s been dead for four days ! ”
43011040	Yeshua says to her , “ Didn’t I tell you that if you believed , you would see the glory of God ? ”
43011041	So they rolled away the stone . Yeshua lifted up His eyes and said , “ Father , I thank you that you have heard Me .
43011042	I knew that You always hear Me ; but because of this crowd standing around I said it , so that they may believe that You sent Me . ”
43011043	And when He had said this , He cried out with a loud voice , “ Lazarus , come out ! ”
43011044	He who had been dead came out , wrapped in burial clothes binding his hands and feet , with a cloth over his face . And Yeshua tells them , “ Cut him loose , and let him go ! ”
43011045	Therefore many of the Judeans , who had come to Miriam and had seen what Yeshua had done , put their trust in Him .
43011046	But some of them went to the Pharisees and told them what Yeshua had done .
43011047	So the ruling kohanim and Pharisees called a meeting of the Sanhedrin . “ What are we doing ? ” they asked . “ This Man is performing many signs !
43011048	If we let Him go on like this , everyone will believe in Him , and the Romans will come and take away both our holy place and our nation . ”
43011049	But one of them , Caiaphas , who was kohen gadol that year , said to them , “ You know nothing !
43011050	You don’t take into account that it is better for you that one man die for the people rather than for the whole nation to be destroyed . ”
43011051	Now he did not say this by himself ; but as the kohen gadol that year , he prophesied that Yeshua would die for the nation .
43011052	And not for the nation only , but also so that He might gather together into one the scattered children of God .
43011053	So from that day on , they plotted to kill Him .
43011054	Therefore Yeshua no longer walked openly among the Judeans , but went from there to the country near the wilderness , to a city called Ephraim . He stayed there with His disciples .
43011055	Now the Jewish Passover was near ; and many people went up out of the regions to Jerusalem before Passover , to purify themselves .
43011056	So they were searching for Yeshua , saying to one another as they stood in the Temple , “ What do you think ? Won’t He come to the feast at all ? ”
43011057	Now the ruling kohanim and Pharisees had given orders that if anyone knew where He was , he should report it so that they might arrest Him .
43012001	Six days before Passover , Yeshua came to Bethany , where Lazarus was , whom Yeshua had raised from the dead .
43012002	So they prepared a dinner there for Yeshua . Martha was serving , and Lazarus was one of those reclining at the table with Him .
43012003	Then Miriam took a pound of very expensive oil of pure nard and anointed Yeshua’s feet , and she wiped His feet dry with her hair . Now the house was filled with the fragrance of the oil .
43012004	But Judah from Kriot , one of His disciples , the one who was about to betray Him , said ,
43012005	“ Why wasn’t this oil sold for three hundred denarii and the money given to the poor ? ”
43012006	Now he said this not because he cared about the poor , but because he was a thief . Since he had the moneybox , he used to steal from what was put in it .
43012007	Therefore Yeshua said , “ Leave her alone ! She set it aside for the day of My burial .
43012008	You will always have the poor among you , but you will not always have Me . ”
43012009	Now a large crowd of Judeans knew He was there and came , not only for Yeshua but also to see Lazarus , whom He had raised from the dead .
43012010	So the ruling kohanim made plans to kill Lazarus also ,
43012011	because on account of him many of the Jewish people were going and putting their trust in Yeshua .
43012012	The next day , the huge crowd that had come up for the feast heard that Yeshua was coming to Jerusalem .
43012013	So they took palm branches and went out to meet Him , shouting , “ ‘ Hoshia-na ! Baruch ha-ba b’shem Adonai ! Blessed is He who comes in the name of the Lord ! ’ The King of Israel ! ”

43012017	So the crowd , which had been with Yeshua when He called Lazarus out of the tomb and raised him from the dead , kept on telling everyone about it .

43012019	So the Pharisees said to each other , “ You see that you can’t do anything . Look , the whole world has taken off after Him ! ”
43012020	Now there were some Greeks among those who were going up to worship at the feast .
43012021	These came to Philip , who was from Bethsaida in the Galilee . “ Sir , ” they said , “ we want to see Yeshua . ”
43012022	Philip comes and tells Andrew ; Andrew and Philip come and tell Yeshua .
43012023	Yeshua answers them , saying , “ The hour has come for the Son of Man to be glorified !
43012024	Amen , amen I tell you , unless a grain of wheat falls to the earth and dies , it remains alone . But if it dies , it produces much fruit .
43012025	He who loves his life will lose it , and the one who hates his life in this world will keep it forever .
43012026	If any man serves Me , he must follow Me ; and where I am , there also will My servant be . If anyone serves Me , the Father will honor him .
43012027	“ Now My soul is troubled . And what shall I say ? ‘ Father , save Me from this hour ’ ? But it was for this reason I came to this hour .
43012028	Father , glorify Your name ! ” Then a voice came out of heaven , “ I have glorified it , and again I will glorify it ! ”
43012029	Therefore the crowd that was standing there and heard it was saying that it had thundered . Others were saying , “ An angel has spoken to Him . ”
43012030	Yeshua responded , “ This voice hasn’t come for My sake , but for yours .
43012031	Now is the judgment of this world ! Now the prince of this world will be driven out !
43012032	And as I am lifted up from the earth , I will draw all to Myself . ”
43012033	He said this to show the kind of death He was about to die .
43012034	The crowd answered Him , “ We’ve heard from Scripture that the Messiah remains forever . How can You say , ‘ The Son of Man must be lifted up ’ ? Who is this Son of Man ? ”
43012035	Therefore Yeshua said to them , “ The light is with you for a little longer . Walk while you have the light , so that the darkness will not overtake you . The one who walks in darkness doesn’t know where he is going .
43012036	While you have the light , believe in the light so that you may become sons of light . ” Yeshua spoke these things , then left and hid Himself from them .
43012037	But even though He had performed so many signs before them , they weren’t trusting in Him .
43012038	This was to fulfill the word of Isaiah the prophet , who said , “ Adonai , who has believed our report ? To whom has the arm of Adonai been revealed ? ”
43012039	For this reason they could not believe , for Isaiah also said ,
43012040	“ He has blinded their eyes and hardened their hearts , so they might not see with their eyes nor understand with their hearts and turn back , and I would heal them . ”
43012041	Isaiah said these things because he saw His glory and spoke of Him .
43012042	Nevertheless many , even among the leaders , put their trust in Him . But because of the Pharisees , they were not confessing Yeshua , so they would not be thrown out of the synagogue ;
43012043	for they loved the glory of men more than the glory of God .
43012044	Yeshua cried out , “ Whoever puts trust in Me believes not in Me but in the One who sent Me !
43012045	And whoever beholds Me beholds the One who sent Me .
43012046	As light I have come into the world , so that everyone who trusts in Me should not remain in darkness .
43012047	“ If anyone hears My words but doesn’t keep them , I do not judge him ; for I came to save the world , not to judge the world .
43012048	The one who rejects Me and doesn’t receive My words has a judge ; the word I spoke will judge him on the last day .
43012049	For I did not speak on My own , but the Father Himself who sent Me has commanded Me what to say and speak .
43012050	And I know that His commandment is life everlasting . Therefore what I say , I say just as the Father has told Me . ”
43013001	Now it was just before the feast of Passover . Yeshua knew that His hour had come to depart from this world to the Father . Having loved His own who were in the world , He loved them until the end .
43013002	While the seder meal was happening , the devil had already put in the heart of Judah from Kriot that he should hand over Yeshua .
43013003	Yeshua knew that the Father had given all things into His hands , and that He had come from God and was returning to God .
43013004	So He gets up from the meal and lays aside His outer garment ; and taking a towel , He wrapped it around His waist .
43013005	Then He pours water into a basin . He began to wash the disciples’ feet , drying them with the towel wrapped around Him .
43013006	Then He comes to Simon Peter , who says to Him , “ Master , are You going to wash my feet ? ”
43013007	Yeshua responded , “ You don’t know what I am doing now , but you will understand after these things . ”
43013008	Peter said to Him , “ You shall never wash my feet ! ” Yeshua answered him , “ If I don’t wash you , you have no part with Me . ”
43013009	Simon Peter said to Him , “ Master , then not only my feet , but also my hands and my head ! ”
43013010	Yeshua said to him , “ He who has bathed has no need to wash , except the feet ; he is completely clean . And you all are clean , though not every one . ”

43013017	If you know these things , you are blessed if you do them ! ”
43013018	“ I am not speaking to all of you — I know whom I have chosen . But so the Scripture may be fulfilled , ‘ He who eats My bread has lifted up his heel against Me . ’

43013020	Amen , amen I tell you , he who receives the one I send , receives Me ; and he who receives Me , receives the One who sent Me . ”
43013021	After He said these things , Yeshua was agitated in spirit and testified , “ Amen , amen I tell you , one of you will betray Me ! ”
43013022	The disciples began looking at each other , perplexed — who was He talking about ?
43013023	One of His disciples , whom Yeshua loved , was reclining at His side .
43013024	Simon Peter nods to him and says , “ Ask Him — who is He talking about ? ”

43013028	But no one reclining at the table knew why Yeshua said this to him .

43013035	By this all will know that you are My disciples , if you have love for one another . ”

43013038	Yeshua answers , “ Will you lay down your life for Me ? Amen , amen I tell you , before the rooster crows , you will deny Me three times ! ”
43014001	“ Do not let your heart be troubled . Trust in God ; trust also in Me .
43014002	In My Father’s house there are many dwelling places . If it were not so , would I have told you that I am going to prepare a place for you ?
43014003	If I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again and take you to Myself , so that where I am you may also be .

43014017	the Ruach of truth , whom the world cannot receive , because it does not behold Him or know Him . You know Him , because He abides with you and will be in you .

43014020	“ In that day , you will know that I am in My Father , you are in Me , and I am in you .

43014022	Judah ( not the one from Kriot ) said to Him , “ Master , what has happened , that You are about to reveal Yourself to us and not the world ? ”

43015001	“ I am the true vine , and My Father is the gardener .
43015002	Every branch in Me that does not bear fruit , He takes away ; and every branch that bears fruit , He trims so that it may bear more fruit .
43015003	You are already clean because of the word I have spoken to you .
43015004	Abide in Me , and I will abide in you . The branch cannot itself produce fruit , unless it abides on the vine . Likewise , you cannot produce fruit unless you abide in Me .
43015005	“ I am the vine ; you are the branches . The one who abides in Me , and I in him , bears much fruit ; for apart from Me , you can do nothing .

43015021	“ But all these things they will do to you for the sake of My name , because they do not know the One who sent Me .

43016001	“ I have spoken these things to you so that you may be kept from stumbling .
43016002	They will throw you out of the synagogues . Yes , an hour is coming when whoever kills you will think he is offering service to God .
43016003	They will do these things because they have never known the Father or Me .
43016004	But I have spoken these things to you so that when their hour comes , you may remember that I told you of them . I did not tell you these things from the beginning , because I was with you . ”
43016005	“ But now I am going to the One who sent Me , and not one of you is asking Me , ‘ Where are you going ? ’
43016006	Because I have spoken these things to you , grief has filled your heart .
43016007	But I tell you the truth , it is to your advantage that I go away ! For if I do not go away , the Helper will not come to you ; but if I go , I will send Him to you .

43016012	“ I still have much more to tell you , but you cannot handle it just now .

43016014	He will glorify Me , because He will take from what is Mine and declare it to you .
43016015	Everything that the Father has is Mine . For this reason I said the Ruach will take from what is Mine and declare it to you . ”
43016016	“ A little while , and you will no longer see Me ; and again in a little while , you will see Me . ”
43016017	Then some of His disciples said to one other , “ What does He mean by telling us , ‘ A little while , and you will no longer see Me ; and again in a little while , you will see Me ’ ? And , ‘ Because I am going to the Father ’ ? ”
43016018	They kept on saying , “ What’s this He’s saying , ‘ A little while ’ ? We don’t know what He’s talking about ! ”
43016019	Yeshua knew that they wanted to question Him , so He said to them , “ Are you asking each other about this , that I said , ‘ A little while , and you will no longer see Me ; and again in a little while , you will see Me ’ ?
43016020	Amen , amen I tell you , you will weep and mourn , but the world will celebrate . You will be filled with sorrow , but your sorrow will turn to joy !
43016021	“ When a woman is in labor , she has pain because her hour has come . But when she gives birth to the child , she no longer remembers the anguish , because of the joy that a human being has been born into the world .
43016022	So also you have sorrow now ; but I will see you again , and your heart will rejoice , and no one will take your joy away from you !
43016023	“ In that day , you will ask Me nothing . Amen , amen I tell you , whatever you ask the Father in My name , He will give you .
43016024	Up to now , you have not asked for anything in My name . Ask and you will receive , so that your joy may be full .
43016025	“ These things I have spoken to you in metaphors . An hour is coming when I will no longer speak to you in metaphors , but will tell you plainly about the Father .
43016026	In that day , you will ask in My name — and I’m not telling you that I will ask the Father on your behalf .
43016027	For the Father Himself loves you , because you have loved Me and have believed that I came forth from God .
43016028	I came forth from the Father and have come into the world . Again I am leaving the world and going to the Father . ”
43016029	His disciples say , “ See , now You’re speaking plainly and not in metaphors .
43016030	Now we know that You know everything and have no need to be asked anything . By this we believe that You came forth from God . ”
43016031	Yeshua answered them , “ Do you now believe ?
43016032	Look , the hour is coming — indeed has come — when you will be scattered , each to his own , and you will abandon Me . Yet I am not alone , because the Father is with Me .
43016033	These things I have spoken to you , so that in Me you may have shalom . In the world you will have trouble , but take heart ! I have overcome the world ! ”
43017001	Yeshua spoke these things ; then , lifting up His eyes to heaven , He said , “ Father , the hour has come . Glorify Your Son , so the Son may glorify You .
43017002	Even as You gave Him authority over all flesh , so may He give eternal life to all those You have given Him .
43017003	And this is eternal life , that they may know You , the only true God , and Yeshua the Messiah , the One You sent .
43017004	I glorified You on earth by finishing the work that You have given Me to do .
43017005	Now , Father , glorify Me together with Yourself , with the glory which I had with You before the world came to be . ”
43017006	“ I have made Your name known to the men of this world that You gave Me . They were Yours ; You gave them to Me , and they have kept Your word .
43017007	Now they have come to know that everything You have given Me is from You .
43017008	The words , which You gave Me , I have given to them . They received them and truly understood that I came from You , and they believed that You sent Me .
43017009	I ask on their behalf . Not on behalf of the world do I ask , but on behalf of those You have given Me , for they are Yours .
43017010	All Mine are Yours , and Yours are Mine ; and I have been glorified in them .
43017011	I am no longer in the world ; but they are in the world , and I am coming to You . Holy Father , keep them in Your name that You have given Me , so that they may be one just as We are .
43017012	While I was with them , I was keeping them in Your name that You have given Me . I guarded them , and not one of them was lost except the son of destruction , so that the Scripture would be fulfilled .
43017013	“ But now I am coming to You . I say these words while I am still in the world , so that they may have My joy made full in themselves .
43017014	I have given them Your word ; and the world hated them , because they are not of the world just as I am not of the world .
43017015	I am not asking that You take them out of the world , but that You keep them from the evil one .
43017016	They are not of the world , just as I am not of the world .
43017017	“ Make them holy in the truth . Your word is truth .
43017018	Just as You sent Me into the world , so I have sent them into the world .
43017019	And for their sakes I make Myself holy , so that they also may be made holy in truth . ”
43017020	“ I pray not on behalf of these only , but also for those who believe in Me through their message ,
43017021	that they all may be one . Just as You , Father , are in Me and I am in You , so also may they be one in Us , so the world may believe that You sent Me .
43017022	The glory that You have given to Me I have given to them , that they may be one just as We are one —
43017023	I in them and You in Me — that they may be perfected in unity , so that the world may know that You sent Me and loved them as You loved Me .
43017024	“ Father , I also want those You have given Me to be with Me where I am , so that they may see My glory — the glory You gave Me , for You loved Me before the foundation of the world .
43017025	Righteous Father , the world did not know You , but I knew You ; and these knew that You sent Me .
43017026	I made your Name known to them , and will continue to make it known , so that the love with which You loved Me may be in them , and I in them . ”
43018001	When Yeshua had said these things , He went out with His disciples across the Kidron Valley , where there was a garden , which He and His disciples entered .
43018002	Now Judah , who was betraying Him , also knew the place , because Yeshua had often met there with His disciples .
43018003	So Judah , having taken a band of soldiers and some officers from the ruling kohanim and Pharisees , comes there with lanterns , torches , and weapons .
43018004	Then Yeshua , knowing all the things coming upon Him , went forward . He said to them , “ Who are you looking for ? ”
43018005	“ Yeshua ha-Natzrati , ” they answered Him . Yeshua tells them , “ I am . ” Now Judah , the one betraying Him , was also standing with them .
43018006	So when Yeshua said to them , “ I am , ” they drew back and fell to the ground .
43018007	So again He asked them , “ Who are you looking for ? ” And they said , “ Yeshua ha-Natzrati . ”
43018008	Yeshua answered , “ I told you , I am ! If you’re looking for Me , let these men go their way . ”
43018009	This was so the word would be fulfilled that He spoke : “ I did not lose one of those You have given Me . ”
43018010	Then Simon Peter , who had a sword , drew it and struck the servant of the kohen gadol , and cut off his right ear . Now the servant’s name was Malchus .
43018011	So Yeshua said to Peter , “ Put the sword into the sheath ! The cup the Father has given Me — shall I never drink it ? ”
43018012	Then the band of soldiers , with the captain and the officers of the Judeans , seized Yeshua and tied Him up .
43018013	They led Him first to Annas , for he was the father-in-law of Caiaphas , the kohen gadol that year .
43018014	Now Caiaphas was the one who had advised the Judean leaders that it was better for one man to die on behalf of the people .
43018015	Simon Peter was following Yeshua with another disciple . Now that disciple was known to the kohen gadol , so he went with Yeshua into the court of the kohen gadol .
43018016	But Peter was left standing outside by the door . So the other disciple , who was known to the kohen gadol , went out and spoke to the doorkeeper and brought Peter in .
43018017	The maidservant at the door says to Peter , “ Aren’t you one of this Man’s disciples too ? ” He says , “ No , I’m not . ”
43018018	The servants and officers were standing around a fire they had made , because it was cold and they were warming themselves . And Peter was also with them , standing and warming himself .
43018019	The kohen gadol then questioned Yeshua about His disciples and His teaching .
43018020	“ I have spoken openly to the world , ” Yeshua answered him . “ I always taught in the synagogues and the Temple , where all the Jewish people come together . I spoke nothing in secret .
43018021	Why question Me ? Ask those who have heard what I spoke to them . Look , they know what I said . ”
43018022	When He had said this , one of the officers standing nearby gave Yeshua a slap , saying , “ Is that the way you answer the kohen gadol ? ”
43018023	Yeshua answered him , “ If I have spoken wrongly , give evidence of the wrong ; but if rightly , why hit Me ? ”
43018024	Then Annas sent Him , still tied up , to Caiaphas , the kohen gadol .
43018025	Now Simon Peter was standing outside and warming himself . So they said to him , “ Aren’t you one of His disciples too ? ” He denied it and said , “ No , I’m not ! ”
43018026	One of the servants of the kohen gadol , a relative of the man whose ear Peter had cut off , said , “ Didn’t I see you in the garden with Him ? ”
43018027	Again Peter denied it , and immediately a rooster crowed .
43018028	Then they led Yeshua from Caiaphas to the Praetorium . It was early . They themselves did not enter the Praetorium , so they would not become unclean but might eat the Passover .
43018029	Therefore Pilate came out to them and said , “ What charge do you bring against this man ? ”
43018030	They answered , “ If He weren’t an evildoer , we wouldn’t have handed Him over to you . ”
43018031	Then Pilate said to them , “ Take Him yourselves , and judge Him by your Torah ! ” The Judean leaders responded , “ We are not authorized to put anyone to death . ”
43018032	This happened so that the word Yeshua spoke would be fulfilled , signifying what kind of death He was about to die .
43018033	So Pilate went back into the Praetorium , called for Yeshua , and asked Him , “ Are you the King of the Jews ? ”
43018034	“ Are you saying this on your own , ” Yeshua answered , “ or did others tell you about Me ? ”
43018035	Pilate answered , “ I’m not a Jew , am I ? Your own nation and ruling kohanim handed You over to me ! What have You done ? ”
43018036	Yeshua answered , “ My kingdom is not of this world . If My kingdom were of this world , then My servants would be fighting so that I wouldn’t be handed over to the Judean leaders . But as it is , My kingdom is not from here . ”
43018037	So Pilate said to Him , “ Are you a king , then ? ” Yeshua answered , “ You say that I am a king . For this reason I was born , and for this reason I came into the world , so that I might testify to the truth . Everyone who is of the truth hears My voice . ”
43018038	Pilate said to Him , “ What is truth ? ” After he said this , he went out again to the Judean leaders . He said to them , “ I find no case against Him .
43018039	But it’s your custom that I release someone for you at Passover . So do you want me to release to you the King of the Jews ? ”
43018040	They shouted back , “ Not this One , but Bar-Abba ! ” Now Bar-Abba was a revolutionary .
43019001	Then Pilate took Yeshua and had Him scourged .
43019002	The soldiers twisted together a crown of thorns and put it on His head , and dressed Him in a purple robe .
43019003	They kept coming up to Him , saying , “ Hail , King of the Jews ! ” and slapping Him over and over .
43019004	Pilate came out again . He said to them , “ Look , I’m bringing Him out to you , to let you know that I find no case against Him . ”
43019005	So Yeshua came out , wearing the crown of thorns and the purple robe . “ Behold , the Man ! ” Pilate said to them .
43019006	When the ruling kohanim and officers saw Him , they yelled out , “ Execute Him ! Execute Him ! ” Pilate said to them , “ Take Him yourselves and execute Him ! For I don’t find a case against Him . ”
43019007	The Judean leaders answered him , “ We have a law , and according to the Torah He must die , because He claimed to be Ben-Elohim ! ”
43019008	When Pilate heard this word , he became even more fearful .
43019009	He went into the Praetorium again and said to Yeshua , “ Where are You from ? ” But Yeshua gave him no answer .
43019010	So Pilate said to Him , “ You aren’t speaking to me ? Don’t You know that I have the authority to release You , and I have the authority to crucify You ? ”
43019011	Yeshua answered , “ You would have no authority over Me if it hadn’t been given to you from above . For this reason , the one who handed Me over to you has the greater sin . ”
43019012	Pilate tried to let Him go after this ; but the Judean leaders cried out , saying , “ If you release this Man , you are no friend of Caesar . Everyone who makes himself a king opposes Caesar ! ”
43019013	So when Pilate heard these words , he brought Yeshua out and sat down on the judge’s seat at a place called the Stone Pavement ( but in Aramaic , Gabbatha ) .
43019014	It was the Day of Preparation for Passover , about the sixth hour . And Pilate said to the Judean leaders , “ Behold , your king ! ”
43019015	They shouted back , “ Take Him away ! Take Him away ! Execute Him ! ” Pilate said to them , “ Should I execute your king ? ” The ruling kohanim answered , “ We have no king but Caesar ! ”
43019016	Finally , Pilate handed Yeshua over to be crucified .
43019017	Then they took Yeshua . He went out , carrying His own crossbar , to the Place of a Skull , which in Aramaic is called Golgotha .
43019018	There they crucified Him , and with Him two others , one on each side and Yeshua in between .
43019019	Pilate also wrote a sign and put it on the execution stake . It was written , “ YESHUA HA-NATZRATI , THE KING OF THE JEWS . ”
43019020	Many Judeans read this sign , because the place where Yeshua was executed was near the city ; it was written in Hebrew , Latin , and Greek .
43019021	The ruling kohanim of the Judeans were saying to Pilate , “ Don’t write , ‘ The King of the Jews , ’ but that He said , ‘ I am King of the Jews . ’ ”
43019022	“ What I have written , I have written , ” Pilate answered .
43019023	So the soldiers , when they executed Yeshua , took His outer garments and made four parts , a part for each soldier . They took His tunic also , but it was seamless , woven top to bottom in one piece .
43019024	So they said to one another , “ Let’s not tear it , but cast lots for it to see whose it will be . ” This was so the Scripture would be fulfilled , “ They divided My garments among them , and for My clothing they cast lots . ” So the soldiers did these things .
43019025	Standing near the execution stake of Yeshua were His mother , His mother’s sister , Miriam the wife of Clopas , and Miriam from Magdala .
43019026	Yeshua saw His mother and the disciple whom He loved standing nearby . He tells His mother , “ Woman , behold , your son ! ”
43019027	Then He tells the disciple , “ Behold , your mother ! ” From that very hour , the disciple took her into his own home .
43019028	After this , when Yeshua knew that all things were now completed , to fulfill the Scripture He said , “ I am thirsty . ”
43019029	A jar full of sour wine was sitting there , so they put a sponge soaked with the sour wine on a hyssop branch and brought it to His mouth .
43019030	When Yeshua tasted the sour wine , He said , “ It is finished ! ” And He bowed His head and gave up His spirit .
43019031	It was the Day of Preparation , and the next day was a festival Shabbat . So that the bodies should not remain on the execution stake during Shabbat , the Judean leaders asked Pilate to have the legs broken and to have the bodies taken away .
43019032	So the soldiers came and broke the legs of the first and then the other who had been executed with Yeshua .
43019033	Now when they came to Yeshua and saw that He was already dead , they did not break His legs .
43019034	But one of the soldiers pierced His side with a spear , and immediately blood and water came out .
43019035	He who has seen it has testified , and his testimony is true . He knows that he is telling the truth , so that you also may believe .
43019036	These things happened so that the Scripture would be fulfilled , “ Not a bone of His shall be broken . ”
43019037	And again another Scripture says , “ They shall look on Him whom they have pierced . ”
43019038	After these things , Joseph of Arimathea asked Pilate if he could take Yeshua’s body away . Joseph was a disciple of Yeshua , but secretly for fear of the Judean leaders . Pilate gave permission , so Joseph came and took the body away .
43019039	Nicodemus , who had first visited Yeshua at night , also came bringing a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about a hundred pounds .
43019040	Then they took the body of Yeshua and wrapped it in linen with the spices , as is the Jewish burial custom .
43019041	Now in the place where He was executed , there was a garden . In the garden was a new tomb where no one had yet been buried .
43019042	Because it was the Jewish Day of Preparation and the tomb was nearby , they laid Yeshua there .
43020001	Early in the morning on the first day of the week , while it is still dark , Miriam from Magdala comes to the tomb . She sees that the stone had been rolled away from the tomb .
43020002	So she comes running to Simon Peter and the other disciple , the one Yeshua loved . She tells them , “ They’ve taken the Master out of the tomb , and we don’t know where they’ve put Him ! ”
43020003	Then Peter and the other disciple set out , going to the tomb .
43020004	The two were running together , but the other disciple outran Peter and arrived at the tomb first .
43020005	Leaning in , he sees the linen strips lying there . But he didn’t go in .
43020006	Then Simon Peter comes following him , and he entered the tomb . He looks upon the linen strips lying there ,
43020007	and the face cloth that had been on His head . It was not lying with the linen strips , but was rolled up in a place by itself .
43020008	So then the other disciple , who had reached the tomb first , also entered . He saw and believed .

43020010	So the disciples went back to their own homes .

43020016	Yeshua says to her , “ Miriam ! ” Turning around , she says to Him in Aramaic , “ Rabboni ! ” ( which means Teacher ) .

43020019	It was evening on that day , the first of the week . When the doors were locked where the disciples were , for fear of the Judean leaders , Yeshua came and stood in their midst ! And He said to them , “ Shalom aleichem ! ”
43020020	After He said this , He showed them His hands and His side . Then the disciples rejoiced when they saw the Lord .

43020023	If you forgive anyone’s sins , they are forgiven ; but if you hold back , they are held back . ”
43020024	One of the Twelve , Thomas called the Twin , was not with them when Yeshua came .
43020025	The other disciples were saying to him , “ We’ve seen the Lord ! ” But he replied to them , “ Unless I see the nail prints in His hands , and put my finger into the mark of the nails , and put my hand in His side , I will never believe ! ”

43020027	Then He said to Thomas , “ Put your finger here , and look at My hands . Reach out your hand and put it into My side . Stop doubting and believe ! ”
43020028	Thomas answered and said to Him , “ My Lord and my God ! ”
43020029	Yeshua said to Him , “ Because you have seen Me , you have believed ? Blessed are the ones who have not seen and yet have believed ! ”
43020030	Yeshua performed many other signs in the presence of the disciples , which are not written in this book .

43021001	After these things , Yeshua revealed Himself again to the disciples at the Sea of Tiberias . Now here is how He appeared .
43021002	Simon Peter , Thomas called the Twin , Nathanael of Cana in the Galilee , the sons of Zebedee , and two of the other disciples were together .
43021003	Simon Peter said to them , “ I’m going fishing . ” “ We’re coming with you too , ” they said . They went out and got into the boat , and that night they caught nothing .
43021004	At dawn , Yeshua stood on the beach ; but the disciples didn’t know that it was Yeshua .
43021005	So Yeshua said to them , “ Boys , you don’t happen to have any fish , do you ? ” “ No , ” they answered Him .
43021006	He said to them , “ Throw the net off the right side of the boat , and you’ll find some . ” So they threw the net , and they were not able to haul it in because of the great number of fish .
43021007	Therefore the disciple whom Yeshua loved said to Peter , “ It’s the Lord ! ” When Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he tied his outer garment around himself — for he was stripped down for work — and threw himself into the sea .
43021008	But the other disciples came in the boat from about two hundred cubits offshore , dragging the net full of fish .
43021009	So when they got out onto the land , they saw a charcoal fire with fish placed on it , and bread .
43021010	Yeshua said to them , “ Bring some of the fish you’ve just caught . ”
43021011	Simon Peter went aboard and hauled the net to shore . There were 153 fish , many of them big ; but the net was not broken .
43021012	Yeshua said to them , “ Come , have breakfast . ” None of the disciples dared ask Him , “ Who are You ? ” — knowing it was the Lord .
43021013	Yeshua comes and takes the bread and gives it to them , and likewise the fish .
43021014	This was now the third time that Yeshua was revealed to the disciples after He was raised from the dead .
43021015	When they had finished breakfast , Yeshua said to Simon Peter , “ Simon , son of John , do you love Me more than these ? ” “ Yes , Lord , ” he said to Him , “ You know that I love you . ” He said to him , “ Feed My lambs ! ”
43021016	He said to him again a second time , “ Simon , son of John , do you love Me ? ” “ Yes , Lord , ” he said , “ You know that I love You . ” He said to him , “ Take care of My sheep ! ”
43021017	He said to him a third time , “ Simon , son of John , do you love Me ? ” Peter was grieved because He said to him for a third time , “ Do you love Me ? ” And he said to Him , “ Lord , You know everything ! You know that I love You ! ” Yeshua said to him , “ Feed My sheep ! ”
43021018	“ Amen , amen I tell you , when you were younger , you used to dress yourself and walk wherever you wanted ; but when you grow old , you will stretch out your hands , and someone else will dress you and carry you where you do not want to go . ”
43021019	Now this He said to indicate by what kind of death Peter was going to glorify God . And after this , Yeshua said to him , “ Follow Me ! ”
43021020	Peter , turning around , sees the disciple following . This was the one whom Yeshua loved , who also had reclined against Yeshua’s chest at the seder meal and said , “ Master , who is the one who is betraying You ? ”
43021021	Seeing him , Peter said to Yeshua , “ Lord , what about him ? ”
43021022	Yeshua said to him , “ If I want him to remain until I come , what is that to you ? You follow Me ! ”
43021023	Therefore this saying went out among the brethren , that this disciple would not die . Yet Yeshua did not say to him that he would not die , but , “ If I want him to remain until I come , what is that to you ? ”
43021024	This is the disciple who is an eyewitness of these things and wrote these things . We know that his testimony is true .
43021025	There are also many other things that Yeshua did . If all of them were to be written one by one , I suppose that not even the world itself will have room for the books being written !
44001001	I wrote the first volume , Theophilus , about all that Yeshua began to do and teach —
44001002	up to the day He was taken up , after He had given orders by the Ruach ha-Kodesh to the shlichim He had chosen .
44001003	To them He showed Himself to be alive after His suffering through many convincing proofs , appearing to them for forty days and speaking about the kingdom of God .
44001004	Now while staying with them , He commanded them not to leave Jerusalem , but to wait for what the Father promised — which , He said , “ you heard from Me .

44001006	So when they gathered together , they asked Him , “ Lord , are You restoring the kingdom to Israel at this time ? ”
44001007	He said to them , “ It is not your place to know the times or seasons which the Father has placed under His own control .
44001008	But you will receive power when the Ruach ha-Kodesh has come upon you ; and you will be My witnesses in Jerusalem , and through all Judah , and Samaria , and to the end of the earth . ”

44001010	While they were staring into heaven as He went up , suddenly two men stood with them in white clothing .
