45014011	For it is written , “ As I live , says Adonai , every knee shall bow to Me , and every tongue shall give praise to God . ”
45014012	So then each one of us shall give account of himself to God .
45014013	Therefore let us not judge one another from now on , but rather decide this — not to put a stumbling block or a trap in the way of a brother .
45014014	I know , and am persuaded in the Lord Yeshua , that nothing is unholy in itself ; but it is unholy for the one who considers it unholy .
45014015	For if your brother is grieved on account of food , you are no longer walking according to love . Do not destroy by your food the one for whom Messiah died .
45014016	Therefore do not let what is good for you be spoken of as evil —
45014017	for the kingdom of God is not about eating and drinking , but righteousness and shalom and joy in the Ruach ha-Kodesh .
45014018	For the one who serves Messiah in this manner is pleasing to God and approved by men .
45014019	So then let us pursue what makes for shalom and for the building up of one another .
45014020	Stop tearing down the work of God for the sake of food . Indeed all things are clean , but wrong for the man who by eating causes stumbling .
45014021	It is good not to eat meat or drink wine or do anything by which your brother stumbles .
45014022	The faith you have , keep it to yourself before God . How fortunate is the one who does not condemn himself for what he approves .
45014023	But the one who has doubts is condemned if he eats , because it is not of faith . And whatever is not of faith is sin .
45015001	Now we who are strong ought to bear the weaknesses of the powerless and not just please ourselves .
45015002	Let each of us please his neighbor for his good , for building him up .
45015003	For even Messiah did not please Himself , but as it is written , “ The insults of those who insulted You have fallen on Me . ”
45015004	For whatever was written before was written for our instruction , so that through patience and the encouragement of the Scriptures we might have hope .
45015005	Now may the God of patience and encouragement grant you to be like-minded with one another in the manner of Messiah Yeshua ,
45015006	so that together with one voice you may glorify the God and Father of our Lord Yeshua the Messiah .
45015007	Therefore accept one another just as Messiah also accepted you , to the glory of God .
45015008	For I declare that Messiah has become a servant to the circumcised for the sake of God’s truth , in order to confirm the promises given to the patriarchs
45015009	and for the Gentiles to glorify God for His mercy . As it is written , “ For this reason I will give You praise among the Gentiles , and I will sing to Your name . ”
45015010	And again it says , “ Rejoice , O Gentiles , with His people . ”
45015011	And again , “ Praise Adonai all you Gentiles , and let all the peoples praise Him . ”
45015012	And again , Isaiah says , “ There shall be a shoot of Jesse ; and the One who arises to rule the Gentiles , in Him shall the Gentiles hope . ”
45015013	Now may the God of hope fill you with all joy and shalom in trusting , so you may overflow with hope in the power of the Ruach ha-Kodesh .
45015014	Now I myself am convinced about you , my brethren , that you also are full of goodness , filled with all knowledge and also able to counsel one another .
45015015	But I have written rather boldly to you on some points as a reminder — because of the grace given to me by God
45015016	to be a servant of Messiah Yeshua to the Gentiles , in priestly service to the Good News of God — so that the offering up of the Gentiles might be pleasing , made holy by the Ruach ha-Kodesh .
45015017	So in Messiah Yeshua , I have reason to boast before God .
45015018	For I will not dare to speak of anything except what Messiah accomplished through me , to bring about the obedience of the Gentiles by word and deed ,
45015019	in the power of signs and wonders , in the power of the Spirit of God . So from Jerusalem and around even to Illyricum , I have fully proclaimed the Good News of Messiah .
45015020	In this way I make it my aim to proclaim the Good News not where Messiah was already named , lest I build on another person’s foundation ,
45015021	but as it is written , “ Those who have never been told shall see , and those who have not heard shall understand . ”
45015022	For this reason I was often hindered from coming to you .
45015023	But now with no place in these regions , and since I have had a desire for many years to come to you ,
45015024	I hope to see you while traveling through when I go to Spain — and to be helped on my journey there by you , if first I may enjoy your company for a bit .
45015025	But now I am going to Jerusalem , bringing aid to the kedoshim .
45015026	For Macedonia and Achaia were pleased to make some contribution for the poor among the believers in Jerusalem .
45015027	Yes , they were pleased to do so , and they are under obligation to them . For if the Gentiles have shared in their spiritual blessings , they also ought to serve them in material blessings .
45015028	So when I have finished delivering the collection safely to them , I will head for Spain by way of you .
45015029	Now I know that when I come to you , I will come in the fullness of the blessing of Messiah .
45015030	Now I urge you , brethren , through our Lord Yeshua the Messiah and through the love of the Ruach , to press on together with me — with prayers to God on my behalf .
45015031	Pray that I might be rescued from the unbelieving Judeans , and that my service for Jerusalem might be acceptable to the kedoshim .
45015032	Then , God willing , I may come to you in joy , and together with you find rest .
45015033	Now may the God of shalom be with you all . Amen .
45016001	Now I recommend to you our sister Phoebe — who is a shammashit of Messiah’s community at Cenchrea —
45016002	so you may receive her in the Lord , in a way worthy of kedoshim , and help her in whatever matter she may need from you . For she herself has become a patroness of many , including me as well .
45016003	Greet Prisca and Aquila , my fellow workers in Messiah Yeshua ,
45016004	who risked their own necks for my life . Not only I give them thanks , but also all of Messiah’s communities among the Gentiles .
45016005	Greet also the community that meets in their house . Greet Epaenetus whom I dearly love , who is the first fruit in Asia for Messiah .
45016006	Greet Miriam , who has worked hard for you .
45016007	Greet Andronicus and Junia , my kin and fellow prisoners who are well known among the shlichim . They were in Messiah before me .
45016008	Greet Ampliatus , whom I dearly love in the Lord .
45016009	Greet Urbanus , our fellow worker in Messiah , and Stachys whom I dearly love .
45016010	Greet Apelles , who is approved in Messiah . Greet those from the household of Aristobulus .
45016011	Greet Herodion , my kinsman . Greet those from the household of Narcissus , who are in the Lord .
45016012	Greet Tryphaena and Tryphosa , workers in the Lord . Greet Persis whom I dearly love , who has worked hard in the Lord .
45016013	Greet Rufus , chosen in the Lord , and his mother — who was also a mother to me .
45016014	Greet Asyncritus , Phlegon , Hermes , Patrobas , Hermas , and the brethren with them .
45016015	Greet Philologus and Julia , Nereus and his sister , also Olympas and all the kedoshim with them .
45016016	Greet one another with a holy kiss . All of Messiah’s communities greet you .
45016017	Now I urge you , brethren , to keep your eye on those who are causing divisions and stumbling blocks , contrary to the teaching that you learned . Turn away from them .
45016018	For such people do not serve our Lord the Messiah , but only their own belly . By their smooth talk and flattery they deceive the hearts of the unsuspecting .
45016019	Your obedience has become known to all , so I rejoice over you — but I want you to be wise about what is good and innocent about what is evil .
45016020	Now the God of shalom will soon crush satan under your feet . May the grace of our Lord Yeshua be with you .
45016021	Timothy , my fellow worker , greets you ; so do Lucius and Jason and Sosipater , my kin .
45016022	I , Tertius , who wrote this letter , greet you in the Lord .
45016023	Gaius , host to me and the whole community , greets you . Erastus , the city treasurer , greets you , and so does brother Quartus .
45016025	Now to the One who is able to strengthen you according to my Good News and the proclamation of Yeshua the Messiah , according to the revelation of the mystery which has been kept secret for long ages
45016026	but now is revealed and through the Writings of the Prophets has been made known to all the nations , according to the commandment of the eternal God to bring about obedience of faith —
45016027	to the only wise God , through Yeshua the Messiah , to Him be the glory forever . Amen .
46001001	Paul , called as a shaliach of Messiah Yeshua by the will of God , and Sosthenes our brother ,
46001002	To God’s community in Corinth — having been made holy in Messiah Yeshua , called as kedoshim — with all who everywhere call on the name of our Lord Yeshua the Messiah , both theirs and ours :
46001003	Grace to you and shalom from God our Father , and the Lord Yeshua the Messiah ! Thanksgiving
46001004	I always thank my God for you because of God’s grace that was given to you in Messiah Yeshua .
46001005	For in Him you were made rich in every way — in all speaking and all knowledge —
46001006	just as the evidence of Messiah was confirmed among you .
46001007	So you are not lacking in any spiritual gift , as you eagerly wait for the revealing of our Lord Yeshua the Messiah .
46001008	He will also strengthen you until the end — blameless in the Day of our Lord Yeshua the Messiah .
46001009	God is faithful , through whom you were called into the fellowship of His Son , Yeshua the Messiah our Lord .
46001010	Now I urge you , brethren , through the name of our Lord Yeshua the Messiah , that you all speak the same thing and that there be no divisions among you , but that you be united in the same mind and in the same purpose .
46001011	For it has been reported to me concerning you , my brethren , by those who are from Chloe’s household , that there are rivalries among you .
46001012	I say this because you are each saying , “ I follow Paul , ” or “ I follow Apollos , ” or “ I follow Kefa , ” or “ I follow Messiah . ”
46001013	Has Messiah been divided ? Paul wasn’t crucified for you , was he ? Or were you immersed into the name of Paul ?
46001014	I thank God that I immersed none of you , except Crispus and Gaius ,
46001015	so that no one should say that I had immersed you into my own name .
46001016	( I also immersed the household of Stephanas ; besides them , I don’t recall if I immersed anyone else . )
46001017	For Messiah sent me not to immerse , but to proclaim the Good News — not with cleverness of speech , so that the cross of Messiah would not be made of no effect .
46001018	For the message of the cross is foolishness to those who are perishing , but to us who are being saved it is the power of God .
46001019	For it is written , “ I will destroy the wisdom of the wise and bring to nothing the understanding of the intelligent . ”
46001020	Where is the wise one ? Where is the Torah scholar ? Where is the debater of this age ? Hasn’t God made foolish the wisdom of the world ?
46001021	For seeing that — in God’s wisdom — the world through its wisdom did not know God , God was pleased — through the foolishness of the message proclaimed — to save those who believe .
46001022	For Jewish people ask for signs and Greek people seek after wisdom ,
46001023	but we proclaim Messiah crucified — a stumbling block to Jewish people and foolishness to Gentile people ,
46001024	but to those who are called ( both Jewish and Greek people ) , Messiah , the power of God and the wisdom of God .
46001025	For the foolishness of God is wiser than men , and the weakness of God is stronger than men .
46001026	For you see your calling , brethren , that not many are wise according to human standards , not many are powerful , and not many are born well .
46001027	Yet God chose the foolish things of the world so He might put to shame the wise ; and God chose the weak things of the world so He might put to shame the strong ;
46001028	and God chose the lowly and despised things of the world , the things that are as nothing , so He might bring to nothing the things that are —
46001029	so that no human might boast before God .
46001030	But because of Him you are in Messiah Yeshua , who became to us wisdom from God and righteousness and holiness and redemption —
46001031	so that , just as it is written , “ Let him who boasts , boast in Adonai . ”
46002001	When I came to you , brethren , I did not come with excellence of speech or wisdom , proclaiming to you the mystery of God .
46002002	For I decided not to know about anything among you except Yeshua the Messiah — and Him crucified .
46002003	I was with you in weakness and in fear and in much trembling .
46002004	My speech and my preaching were not with persuasive words of wisdom , but in demonstration of the Spirit and of power —
46002005	so that your faith would not be in the wisdom of men but in the power of God .
46002006	We do speak wisdom , however , among those who are mature — but not a wisdom of this age or of the rulers of this age , who are coming to nothing .
46002007	Rather , we speak God’s wisdom in a mystery — a wisdom that has been hidden , which God destined for our glory before the ages .
46002008	None of the rulers of this age understood it — for if they had , they would not have crucified the Lord of glory .
46002009	But as it is written , “ Things no eye has seen and no ear has heard , that have not entered the heart of mankind — these things God has prepared for those who love Him . ”
46002010	But God revealed these things to us through the Ruach . For the Ruach searches all things — even the depths of God .
46002011	For who among men knows the things of a man , except the man’s spirit within him ? In the same way , no one knows the things of God except the Ruach Elohim .
46002012	Now we have received not the spirit of the world , but the Spirit who is from God — so we might come to know the things freely given to us by God .
46002013	These things we also speak — not in words taught by human wisdom but in words taught by the Ruach , explaining the spiritual to the spiritual .
46002014	Now a natural man does not accept the things of the Ruach Elohim , for they are foolishness to him ; and he cannot understand them , because they are spiritually discerned .
46002015	But the one who is spiritual discerns all things , and he himself is discerned by no one . For
46002016	“ who has known the mind of Adonai , that he will instruct Him ? ” But we have the mind of Messiah .
46003001	And I , brethren , could not speak to you as Ruach — filled but as worldly — as infants in Messiah .
46003002	I gave you milk , not solid food , for you were not yet ready . Indeed , even now you are not yet ready ,
46003003	for you are still worldly . For since there is jealousy and strife among you , aren’t you worldly and walking in a human way ?
46003004	For when one says , “ I follow Paul , ” and another , “ I follow Apollos , ” are you not mere humans ?
46003005	What then is Apollos ? And what is Paul ? Servants through whom you came to trust — and to each as the Lord gave .
46003006	I planted , Apollos watered , but God gave the increase .
46003007	So neither the one who plants nor the one who waters is anything , but only God who makes things grow .
46003008	Now he who plants and he who waters work as one , but each will receive his own reward according to his own labor .
46003009	For we are God’s co-workers ; you are God’s field , God’s building .
46003010	According to the grace of God which was given to me , like a skilled master builder I laid a foundation , and another builds on it . But let each consider carefully how he builds on it .
46003011	For no one can lay any other foundation than what is already laid — which is Yeshua the Messiah .
46003012	Now if anyone builds on the foundation with gold , silver , precious stones , wood , hay , straw ,
46003013	each one’s work will become clear . For the Day will show it , because it is to be revealed by fire ; and the fire itself will test each one’s work — what sort it is .
46003014	If anyone’s work built on the foundation survives , he will receive a reward .
46003015	If anyone’s work is burned up , he will suffer loss — he himself will be saved , but as through fire .
46003016	Don’t you know that you are God’s temple and that the Ruach Elohim dwells among you ?
46003017	If anyone destroys God’s temple , God will destroy him ; for God’s temple is holy , and you are that temple .
46003018	Let no one deceive himself . If anyone thinks he is wise in this age , let him become a fool so he may become wise .
46003019	For the wisdom of this world is foolishness in the sight of God . For it is written , “ He catches the clever in their craftiness . ”
46003020	And again , “ The Lord knows the thoughts of the wise , that they are useless . ”
46003021	So let no one boast about men . For all things are yours —
46003022	whether Paul or Apollos or Kefa , or the world or life or death , or things present or things to come . All are yours ,
46003023	and you are Messiah’s , and Messiah is God’s .
46004001	So let each one think of us in this way — as Messiah’s helpers and stewards of the mysteries of God .
46004002	In this case , moreover , what is required of stewards is to be found trustworthy .
46004003	But to me it matters very little to be judged by you or by any human court . In fact , I do not even judge myself .
46004004	For I know of nothing against myself , yet I am not justified by this . It is the Lord who judges me .
46004005	Therefore do not judge anything before the time — wait until the Lord comes . He will bring to light the things hidden in darkness and also make clear the motives of the hearts . Then the praise for each one will come from God .
46004006	Now I have applied these things to myself and Apollos for your benefit , brethren , so you might learn from us not to go beyond what is written . Then none of you will be puffed up in favor of one against the other .
46004007	For who makes you different ? And what do you have that you did not receive ? But if you did receive it , why do you boast as if you had not received it ?
46004008	Already you are full ! Already you have become rich ! Without us you have become kings ! Indeed , I wish you were kings , so we also might be kings with you !
46004009	For it seems to me that God has put us , the shlichim , on display last of all — like men sentenced to death . For we have become a spectacle to the world , both to angels and to people .
46004010	We are fools for Messiah’s sake , but you are wise in Messiah ! We are weak , but you are strong ! You are honored , but we are dishonored !
46004011	To this very hour we are both hungry and thirsty , dressed in rags and mistreated and homeless .
46004012	We toil , working with our own hands . When we are cursed , we bless . When we are persecuted , we endure .
46004013	When we are slandered , we speak kindly . We have become the scum of the earth , the dregs of all things — even to this moment .
46004014	I do not write these things to make you ashamed , but to warn you as my dearly loved children .
46004015	For though you may have ten thousand guardians in Messiah , yet you do not have many fathers . For in Messiah Yeshua , I became your father through the Good News .
46004016	I urge you therefore — be imitators of me .
46004017	For this reason I have sent you Timothy , my dearly loved and faithful child in the Lord . He will remind you of my ways in Messiah , just as I teach everywhere in every community .
46004018	Now some are puffed up , as though I were not coming to you .
46004019	But I will come to you soon , if the Lord is willing ; and I will find out not the talk of those who are puffed up , but their power .
46004020	For the kingdom of God does not consist of talk but of power .
46004021	What do you want ? Shall I come to you with a rod , or in love and a spirit of gentleness ?
46005001	It is actually reported that among you there is sexual immorality , and such immorality as is not even among the pagans — that someone has his father’s wife .
46005002	And you are puffed up ! Shouldn’t you have mourned instead , so that the one who did this deed might be removed from among you ?
46005003	For even though I am absent in body , I am present in spirit — I have already passed judgment on the one who has done this thing , as though I were present .
46005004	When you are gathered together in the name of our Lord Yeshua , I am with you in spirit . With the power of our Lord Yeshua ,
46005005	you are to turn such a fellow over to satan for the destruction of his fleshly nature , so that his spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord Yeshua .
46005006	Your boasting is no good . Don’t you know that a little hametz leavens the whole batch of dough ?
46005007	Get rid of the old hametz , so you may be a new batch , just as you are unleavened — for Messiah , our Passover Lamb , has been sacrificed .
46005008	Therefore let us celebrate the feast not with old hametz , the hametz of malice and wickedness , but with unleavened bread — the matzah of sincerity and truth .
46005009	I wrote to you in my letter not to mix together with sexually immoral people —
46005010	not at all meaning the sexually immoral people of this world or the greedy or swindlers or idolaters , for then you would have to exit the world .
46005011	But now I am writing to you not to mix together with anyone who is being called a brother if he is sexually immoral or greedy or an idolater or a slanderer or a drunkard or a swindler — not even to eat with such a fellow .
46005012	For what business do I have judging outsiders ? Don’t you judge those who are inside ?
46005013	But those who are outside , God judges . Put away the wicked fellow from among yourselves .
46006001	Does any one of you , when he has a matter against his neighbor , dare to go to court before the unrighteous and not before the kedoshim ?
46006002	Don’t you know that the kedoshim will judge the world ? And if the world is to be judged by you , are you incompetent to judge trivial matters ?
46006003	Don’t you know that we will judge angels ? How much more the matters of this life !
46006004	So if you have courts for matters of this life , why do you appoint as judges those who have no standing in the community ?
46006005	I say this to put you to shame ! Isn’t there even one wise man among you who will be able to settle disputes between his brethren ?
46006006	Instead , a brother goes to court against a brother — and before unbelievers at that !
46006007	Therefore , it is already an utter failure for you that you have lawsuits among yourselves . Why not rather be wronged ? Why not rather be cheated ?
46006008	But you yourselves do wrong and cheat — and against your brethren at that !
46006009	Or don’t you know that the unrighteous will not inherit the kingdom of God ? Don’t be deceived ! The sexually immoral , idolaters , adulterers , those who practice homosexuality ,
46006010	thieves , the greedy , drunkards , slanderers , swindlers — none of these will inherit the kingdom of God .
46006011	That is what some of you were — but you were washed , you were made holy , you were set right in the name of the Lord Yeshua the Messiah and by the Ruach of our God .
46006012	“ Everything is permitted for me ” — but not everything is helpful . “ Everything is permitted for me ” — but I will not be controlled by anything .
46006013	“ Food is for the stomach , and the stomach is for food ” — but God will do away with both of them . Yet the body is not for sexual immorality but for the Lord , and the Lord is for the body .
46006014	Now God raised up the Lord and will also raise us up by His power .
46006015	Don’t you know that your bodies are members of Messiah ? Shall I then take the members of Messiah and make them members of a prostitute ? May it never be !
46006016	Or don’t you know that the one who joins himself to a prostitute is one body with her ? For it is said , “ The two shall become one flesh . ”
46006017	But the one who joins himself to the Lord is one spirit with Him .
46006018	Flee from sexual immorality ! Every other sin that a man commits is outside the body — but the one committing sexual immorality sins against his own body .
46006019	Or don’t you know that your body is a temple of the Ruach ha-Kodesh who is in you , whom you have from God , and that you are not your own ?
46006020	For you were bought with a price . Therefore glorify God in your body .
46007001	Now concerning the things about which you wrote to me , it is good for a man not to touch a woman .
46007002	But because of much immorality , let each man have his own wife , and let each woman have her own husband .
46007003	Let the husband fulfill his obligation to his wife , and likewise also the wife to her husband .
46007004	The wife does not have the rights to her own body , but the husband . Likewise also the husband does not have the rights to his own body , but the wife .
46007005	Do not deprive one another — except by mutual consent for a time , so that you may devote yourselves to prayer . Then come together again , so that satan doesn’t tempt you because of your lack of self-control .
46007006	But this I say as a concession , not as a command .
46007007	Yet I wish that all men were like me . However , each man has his own gift from God , one in this way and another that .
46007008	But I say to the unmarried and to widows that it is good for them to remain as I am .
46007009	But if they do not have self-control , let them marry . For it is better to marry than to burn with desire .
46007010	But to the married I command — not I , but the Lord — a wife is not to be separated from her husband
46007011	( but if she gets separated , let her remain unmarried or else be reconciled to her husband ) , and the husband is not to divorce his wife .
46007012	But to the rest I say — I , not the Lord — if any brother has a wife who is not a believer , and she agrees to live with him , he must not divorce her .
46007013	And if any woman has a husband who is not a believer , and he agrees to live with her , she must not divorce him .
46007014	For the unbelieving husband is made holy through the wife , and the unbelieving wife is made holy through her husband . Otherwise your children would be unclean , but now they are holy .
46007015	But if the unbeliever separates , let him be separated . The brother or the sister is not bound in such cases , but God has called you to shalom .
46007016	For how do you know , wife , whether you will save your husband ? Or how do you know , husband , whether you will save your wife ? Remain As You Were Called
46007017	Only , as the Lord has assigned to each one , as God has called each , let him walk in this way . I give this rule in all of Messiah’s communities .
46007018	Was anyone called when he already had been circumcised ? Let him not make himself uncircumcised . Has anyone been called while uncircumcised ? Let him not allow himself to be circumcised .
46007019	Circumcision is nothing and uncircumcision is nothing — but keeping God’s commandments matters .
46007020	Let each one remain in the calling in which he was called .
46007021	Were you called as a slave ? Don’t let that bother you — but if indeed you can become free , make the most of the opportunity .
46007022	For the one who was called in the Lord as a slave is the Lord’s freedman . Likewise the one who was called while free is Messiah’s slave .
46007023	You were bought with a price ; do not become slaves of men .
46007024	Brethren , let each one — in whatever way he was called — remain that way with God .
46007025	Now concerning virgins I have no command from the Lord , but I give an opinion as one who by the Lord’s mercy is trustworthy .
46007026	I think then , because of the present distress , that it is good for a man to remain as he is .
46007027	Are you bound to a wife ? Don’t seek a divorce . Are you free from a wife ? Don’t seek a wife .
46007028	But if you marry , you have not sinned ; and if a virgin marries , she has not sinned . Yet such people will have trouble in this fleshly life , and I am trying to spare you .
46007029	But this I say , brethren — the time is short . From now on those who have wives should be as though they had none ;
46007030	and those who weep , as though not weeping ; and those who rejoice , as though not rejoicing ; and those who buy , as though not possessing ;
46007031	and those who use the world , as though not using it to the fullest . For the present form of this world is passing away .
46007032	But I want you to be free from cares . An unmarried man cares about the things of the Lord — how he may please the Lord ;
46007033	but the married man cares about the things of the world — how he may please his wife —
46007034	and he is divided . The unmarried woman , as well as the virgin , cares about the things of the Lord , so that she may be holy both in body and in spirit . But the married woman cares about the things of the world — how she may please her husband .
46007035	Now I say this for your own benefit — not to put a restraint on you , but to promote proper and constant service to the Lord without distraction .
46007036	But if any man thinks that he is behaving inappropriately toward his virgin , if the time is ripe and it is meant to be , let him do what he decides . He does not sin . Let them marry .
46007037	But he who stands firm in his heart — who has no pressure , but has power over his own will and has so determined in his own heart to keep her a virgin — he will do well .
46007038	So then both he who marries the virgin does well , and he who doesn’t marry her does better .
46007039	A wife is bound to her husband as long as he lives ; but if her husband dies , she is free to be married to anyone she wishes — only in the Lord .
46007040	But in my judgment she is happier if she stays as she is — and I also think that I have the Ruach Elohim .
46008001	Now concerning idol sacrifices , we know that we all have knowledge . Knowledge puffs up , but love builds up .
46008002	If anyone thinks he knows anything , he doesn’t yet know as he ought to know .
46008003	But if anyone loves God , he is known by Him .
46008004	Therefore concerning the eating of idol sacrifices , we know that an idol is nothing in the world , and that there is no God but one .
46008005	For even if there are so-called “ gods , ” whether in heaven or on earth ( as indeed there are many “ gods ” and many “ lords ” ) ,
46008006	yet for us there is one God , the Father , from whom are all things , and we exist for Him ; and one Lord , Yeshua the Messiah , through whom are all things , and we exist through Him .
46008007	But that knowledge is not in everyone — some , so accustomed to idols up until now , eat food as an idol sacrifice ; and their conscience , being weak , is defiled .
46008008	But food will not bring us before God . We are no worse off if we do not eat and no better off if we do eat .
46008009	But watch out that this freedom of yours does not somehow become a stumbling block to the weak .
46008010	For suppose someone sees you — who have this knowledge — dining in an idol’s temple . If his conscience is weak , won’t he be emboldened to eat idol sacrifices ?
46008011	For the one who is weak is destroyed by your knowledge — the brother for whom Messiah died .
46008012	In this way , when you sin against the brethren and wound their conscience when it is weak , you sin against Messiah .
46008013	For this reason , if food causes my brother to stumble , I will never eat meat again , so that I do not cause my brother to stumble .
46009001	Am I not free ? Am I not a shaliach ? Have I not seen Yeshua our Lord ? Are you not my work in the Lord ?
46009002	If to others I am not a shaliach , at least I am to you — for you are the seal of my office of shaliach in the Lord .
46009003	My defense to those who examine me is this .
46009004	Don’t we have the right to food and drink ?
46009005	Don’t we have the right to take along a believing wife , as do the other shlichim and the Lord’s brothers and Kefa ?
46009006	Or is it only Barnabas and I who have no right to not work ?
46009007	What soldier ever serves at his own expense ? Who plants a vineyard and does not eat its fruit ? Or who tends a flock and does not drink its milk ?
46009008	I don’t say these things merely as a man , do I ? Doesn’t Torah also say these things ?
46009009	For it is written in the Torah of Moses , “ You shall not muzzle an ox while it is threshing . ” Is it the oxen that concern God ,
46009010	or is He speaking entirely for our sake ? Yes , it was written for our sake , because the one plowing ought to plow in hope and the one threshing in hope of a share in the crop .
46009011	If we sowed spiritual things into you , is it too much if we reap material things from you ?
46009012	If others have a share in this claim over you , shouldn’t we even more ? Nevertheless we did not use this right , but we put up with all things so that we cause no hindrance to the Good News of Messiah .
46009013	Don’t you know that those who perform the holy services eat from the Temple , and those who wait on the altar receive a share at the altar ?
46009014	So also the Lord ordered those who proclaim the Good News to get their living from the Good News .
46009015	But I have used none of these things , and I am not writing these things so it will happen this way in my case — for I would rather die than let anyone deprive me of my reason to boast .
46009016	For if I proclaim the Good News , I have no reason to boast — for pressure is put on me and woe to me if I don’t proclaim the Good News !
46009017	For if I do this of my own will , I have a reward . But if not of my own will , I have been entrusted with a commission .
46009018	What then is my reward ? That when I preach , I may present the Good News free of charge , not making use of my right in the Good News .
46009019	For though I am free from all men , I have made myself a slave to all , so that I might win over more of them .
46009020	To the Jewish people I identified as a Jew , so that I might win over the Jewish people . To those under Torah I became like one under Torah ( though not myself being under Torah ) , so that I might win over those under Torah ;
46009021	to those outside Torah , like one outside Torah ( though not being outside God’s Torah but in Messiah’s Torah ) , so that I might win over those outside Torah .
46009022	To the weak I became weak , so that I might win over the weak . I have become all things to all men , so that by all means possible I might save some .
46009023	I do it all for the sake of the Good News , so that I might be a fellow partaker of it .
46009024	Don’t you know that in a stadium the runners all run , but one receives the prize ? Run in such a way that you may win !
46009025	Every competitor exercises self-control in all respects . They do it to receive a perishable crown , but we do it to receive an imperishable one .
46009026	So I run in this way — not aimlessly . So I box in this way — not beating the air .
46009027	Rather , I punish my body and bring it into submission , so that after I have preached to others , I myself will not be disqualified .
46010001	For I do not want you to be ignorant , brethren , that our fathers were all under the cloud and all passed through the sea .
46010002	They all were immersed into Moses in the cloud and in the sea .
46010003	And all ate the same spiritual food ,
46010004	and all drank the same spiritual drink — for they were drinking from a spiritual rock that followed them , and the Rock was Messiah .
46010005	Nevertheless , God was not pleased with most of them , for they were struck down in the desert .
46010006	Now these things happened as examples for us , so we wouldn’t crave evil things , just as they did .
46010007	Do not be idolaters , as some of them were . As it is written , “ The people sat down to eat and drink , and rose up to play . ”
46010008	And let’s not commit sexual immorality , as some of them did — and in one day 23,000 fell .
46010009	And let’s not test the Lord , as some of them did — and were destroyed by serpents .
46010010	And let’s not grumble , as some of them did — and were destroyed by the destroying angel .
46010011	Now these things happened to them as an example , and it was written down as a warning to us — on whom the ends of the ages have come .
46010012	Therefore let the one who thinks that he stands watch out that he doesn’t fall .
46010013	No temptation has taken hold of you except what is common to mankind . But God is faithful — He will not allow you to be tempted beyond what you can handle . But with the temptation He will also provide a way of escape , so you will be able to endure it .
46010014	Therefore , my dearly loved ones , flee from idolatry .
46010015	I speak as to sensible people — judge for yourselves what I say .
46010016	The cup of blessing that we bless — isn’t it a sharing of Messiah’s blood ? The bread which we break — isn’t it a sharing of Messiah’s body ?
46010017	Since there is one bread , we who are many are one body — for we all partake of the one bread .
46010018	Consider physical Israel . Those who eat the sacrifices — aren’t they partners in the altar ?
46010019	What am I saying then — that an idol sacrifice is anything , or that an idol is anything ?
46010020	No , I’m saying that what the pagans sacrifice is to demons and not to God , and I don’t want you to become partners with demons .
46010021	You cannot drink the cup of the Lord and the cup of demons . You cannot partake of the table of the Lord and the table of demons .
46010022	Or do we provoke the Lord to jealousy ? We are not stronger than He , are we ?
46010023	“ Everything is permitted ” — but not everything is helpful . “ Everything is permitted ” — but not everything builds up .
46010024	Let no one seek his own good , but the good of his neighbor .
46010025	Eat whatever is sold in the meat market , without raising questions of conscience .
46010026	For “ the earth is the Lord’s , and its fullness . ”
46010027	If an unbeliever invites you over and you want to go , eat whatever is set before you , without raising questions of conscience .
46010028	But if anyone says to you , “ This is from an idol sacrifice , ” do not eat it , for the sake of the one who informed you , and for the sake of conscience —
46010029	not your own conscience , I mean , but the other person’s . For why is my freedom judged by another’s conscience ?
46010030	If I partake with thankfulness , why am I denounced because of something I give thanks for ?
46010031	Therefore , whether you eat or drink or whatever you do , do all to the glory of God .
46010032	Give no offense either to Jewish or Greek people or to God’s community —
46010033	just as I also try to please everyone in everything , not seeking my own benefit but the benefit of many , so that they may be saved .
46011001	Be imitators of me , just as I also am of Messiah .
46011002	Now I praise you because you remember me in everything and hold firm the traditions just as I passed them on to you .
46011003	But I want you to know that the head of every man is Messiah , and the head of the woman is the man , and the head of Messiah is God .
46011004	Every man praying or prophesying with his head covered dishonors his head .
46011005	But every woman praying or prophesying with her head uncovered dishonors her head . For it is one and the same as having been shaved .
46011006	For if a woman does not cover her head , let her cut off her hair . But if it is shameful for a woman to have her hair cut off or to be shaved , let her cover her head .
46011007	For surely a man ought not to cover his head , since he is the image and glory of God . But the woman is the glory of man .
46011008	For man is not from woman , but woman from man .
46011009	Neither was man created for the woman’s sake , but woman for the man’s sake .
46011010	For this reason the woman ought to have a symbol of authority on her head , because of the angels .
46011011	In any case — in the Lord — woman is not independent of man and man is not independent of woman .
46011012	For just as the woman came from the man , so also the man comes through the woman — but all things are from God .
46011013	Judge for yourselves — is it proper for a woman to pray to God with her head uncovered ?
46011014	Doesn’t the natural order of things teach you — if a man has long hair , it is a disgrace for him ;
46011015	but if a woman has long hair , it is her glory , for her hair was given to her as a covering .
46011016	But if anyone intends to be contentious , we have no such custom — nor do God’s communities . Unity at the Lord’s Table
46011017	But in giving you this instruction I do not praise you , for when you meet together it does more harm than good .
46011018	For first of all , when you come together as Messiah’s community , I hear that there are divisions among you ; and to some extent I believe it —
46011019	for there must be factions among you , so that those among you who are tried and true may be evident .
46011020	Therefore , when you meet together in the same place , it is not to eat the Lord’s Supper —
46011021	for each one takes his own supper beforehand , and one goes hungry while another gets drunk .
46011022	What ! It is certainly not that you do not have houses , is it ? Don’t you have houses to eat and drink in ? Or do you despise God’s community and try to humiliate those who have nothing ? What shall I say to you ? Shall I praise you ? I don’t praise you for this !
46011023	For I received from the Lord what I also passed on to you — that the Lord Yeshua , on the night He was betrayed , took matzah ;
46011024	and when He had given thanks , He broke it and said , “ This is My body , which is for you . Do this in memory of Me . ”
46011025	In the same way , He also took the cup , after supper , saying , “ This cup is the new covenant in My blood . Do this , as often as you drink it , in memory of Me . ”
46011026	For as often as you eat this bread and drink this cup , you proclaim the Lord’s death until He comes .
46011027	Therefore whoever eats the bread or drinks the Lord’s cup in an unworthy manner will be guilty of the body and the blood of the Lord .
46011028	But a man must examine himself , and then let him eat of the bread and drink from the cup .
46011029	For the one who eats and drinks without recognizing the body , eats and drinks judgment on himself .
46011030	For this reason many among you are weak and sick , and quite a few have died .
46011031	For if we were judging ourselves thoroughly , we wouldn’t be coming under judgment .
46011032	But when we are judged , we are being disciplined by the Lord so that we might not be condemned along with the world .
46011033	So then , my brethren , when you come together to eat , wait for one another .
46011034	If anyone is hungry let him eat at home , so that when you meet it doesn’t lead to judgment . And the rest I will put in order when I come .
46012001	Now concerning spiritual gifts , brethren , I do not want you to be ignorant .
46012002	You know that when you were pagans , you were enticed by idols that cannot speak , and you got led astray .
46012003	Therefore I make known to you that no one speaking by the Ruach Elohim says , “ Yeshua be cursed , ” and no one can say , “ Yeshua is Lord , ” except by the Ruach ha-Kodesh .
46012004	Now there are various kinds of gifts , but the same Ruach .
46012005	There are various kinds of service , but the same Lord .
46012006	There are various kinds of working , but the same God who works all things in all people .
46012007	But to each person is given the manifestation of the Ruach for the benefit of all .
46012008	For to one is given through the Ruach a word of wisdom , to another a word of knowledge according to the same Ruach ,
46012009	to another faith by the same Ruach , to another gifts of healings by the one Ruach ,
46012010	to another workings of miracles , to another prophecy , to another discerning of spirits , to another different kinds of tongues , to another the interpretation of tongues .
46012011	But one and the same Ruach activates all these things , distributing to each person individually as He wills .
46012012	For just as the body is one and has many parts , and all the parts of the body — though many — are one body , so also is Messiah .
46012013	For in one Ruach we were all immersed into one body — whether Jewish or Greek , slave or free — and all were made to drink of one Ruach .
46012014	For the body is not one part , but many .
46012015	If the foot says , “ Since I’m not a hand , I’m not part of the body , ” is it therefore not part of the body ?
46012016	And if the ear says , “ Since I’m not an eye , I’m not part of the body , ” is it for this reason any less part of the body ?
46012017	If the whole body were an eye , where would the hearing be ? If the whole were hearing , where would the sense of smell be ?
46012018	But now God has placed the parts — each one of them — in the body just as He desired .
46012019	If they were all one part , where would the body be ?
46012020	But now there are many parts , yet one body .
46012021	The eye cannot tell the hand , “ I don’t need you ! ” or in turn the head to the feet , “ I don’t need you ! ”
46012022	On the contrary , those parts of the body that seem to be less important are indispensable .
46012023	Those parts of the body that we think to be less honorable , we clothe with greater honor ; and our unpresentable parts are treated with greater modesty ;
46012024	but our presentable parts have no such need . Rather God assembled the body , giving more honor to those who are lacking ,
46012025	so that there may be no division in the body , but so that the parts may have the same care for one another .
46012026	If one part suffers , all the parts suffer together . If one part is honored , all the parts rejoice together .
46012027	Now you are the body of Messiah , and members individually .
46012028	God has put into His community first shlichim , second prophets , third teachers , then miracles , then healings , helps , leadership , various kinds of tongues .
46012029	All are not shlichim , are they ? All are not prophets , are they ? All are not teachers , are they ? All do not work miracles , do they ?
46012030	All do not have gifts of healing , do they ? All do not speak in tongues , do they ? All do not interpret , do they ?
46012031	But earnestly desire the greater gifts . And still I show you a far better way :
46013001	If I speak with the tongues of men and of angels but have not love , I have become a noisy gong or a clanging cymbal .
46013002	If I have the gift of prophecy and know all mysteries and all knowledge , and if I have all faith so as to remove mountains but have not love , I am nothing .
46013003	If I give away all that I own and if I hand over my body so I might boast but have not love , I gain nothing .
46013004	Love is patient , love is kind , it does not envy , it does not brag , it is not puffed up ,
46013005	it does not behave inappropriately , it does not seek its own way , it is not provoked , it keeps no account of wrong ,
46013006	it does not rejoice over injustice but rejoices in the truth ;
46013007	it bears all things , it believes all things , it hopes all things , it endures all things .
46013008	Love never fails — but where there are prophecies , they will pass away ; where there are tongues , they will cease ; where there is knowledge , it will pass away .
46013009	For we know in part and we prophesy in part ;
46013010	but when that which is perfect has come , then that which is partial will pass away .
46013011	When I was a child , I spoke like a child , I thought like a child , I reasoned like a child . When I became a man , I put away childish things .
46013012	For now we see in a mirror dimly , but then face to face . Now I know in part , but then I will know fully , even as I have been fully known .
46013013	But now these three remain — faith , hope , and love . And the greatest of these is love .
46014001	Pursue love and eagerly desire spiritual gifts , but especially that you may prophesy .
46014002	For one who speaks in a tongue speaks not to people but to God — for no one understands , but in the Ruach he speaks mysteries .
46014003	But one who prophesies speaks to people for building up , urging on , and uplifting .
46014004	One who speaks in a tongue builds up himself , but one who prophesies builds up the community .
46014005	Now I want you all to speak in tongues , but even more that you would prophesy . One who prophesies is greater than one who speaks in tongues — unless he interprets , so that the community may be built up .
46014006	But now , brethren , if I come to you speaking in tongues , how will I benefit you — unless I speak to you by way of revelation or knowledge or prophecy or teaching ?
46014007	It is the same for lifeless things that make a sound — like a flute or a harp . If they make no distinction in the tones , how will what is played be recognized ?
46014008	For if the trumpet makes an unclear sound , who will prepare himself for battle ?
46014009	So also with you with your tongue — unless you utter speech that is intelligible , how will what is spoken be understood ? For you will be talking to the wind !
46014010	It may be that there are many kinds of languages in the world — and none without meaning .
46014011	If then I do not understand the meaning of the language , I will be a foreigner to the speaker , and the speaker will be a foreigner to me .
46014012	Likewise with you — since you are zealous for spiritual gifts , keep trying to excel for the building up of the community .
46014013	Therefore let one who speaks in a tongue pray that he may interpret .
46014014	For if I pray in a tongue , my spirit prays , but my mind is unfruitful .
46014015	What is it then ? I will pray in my spirit , but I will also pray with my mind . I will sing praises with my spirit , and I will also sing praises with my mind .
46014016	Otherwise if you give thanks and praise in the spirit , how will one filling the place of the ungifted say the “ Amen ” to your thanksgiving , since he has no idea what you’re saying ?
46014017	For you certainly give thanks well , but the other person is not built up .
46014018	I thank God that I speak in tongues more than all of you .
46014019	However , in Messiah’s community I would rather speak five words with my mind , so I may also instruct others , than ten thousand words in a tongue .
46014020	Brethren , stop being children in your thinking — rather , be infants in evil , but in your thinking be mature .
46014021	In the Prophets it is written , “ By those with strange tongues and by the lips of strangers I will speak to this people . And not even then will they listen to me , ” says Adonai .
46014022	Therefore tongues are a sign not for believers but for unbelievers — but prophecy is a sign not for unbelievers but for believers .
46014023	So if Messiah’s whole community comes together and everyone speaks in tongues , and uninstructed or unbelieving people come in , won’t they say that you are crazy ?
46014024	But if all are prophesying and some unbelieving or ungifted person comes in , he is convicted by all , he is called to account by all .
46014025	The secrets of his heart become known , and so he will fall down on his face and worship God , declaring , “ God really is among you ! ”
46014026	What is it then , brethren ? Whenever you come together , each one has a psalm , a teaching , a revelation , a tongue , an interpretation . Let all things be done for edification .
46014027	If someone speaks in a tongue , let it be by two or at most three , and each in turn ; and let one interpret .
46014028	But if there is no interpreter , let him keep silent in the community but speak to himself and to God .
46014029	Let two or three prophets speak , and let the others evaluate .
46014030	But if something is revealed to another sitting nearby , let the first one become silent .
46014031	For you can all prophesy one by one , so all may learn and be encouraged .
46014032	The spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets ,
46014033	for God is not a God of confusion , but shalom . As in all the communities of the kedoshim ,
46014034	let women keep silent in the communities , for it is not permitted for them to speak out . Rather let them be in order , as the Torah also says .
46014035	If they want to learn something , let them ask their own husbands at home — for it is disgraceful for a woman to speak out in the community .
46014036	Did the word of God originate with you ? Or did it reach you alone ?
46014037	If anyone thinks he is a prophet or spiritual , let him recognize that what I write to you is the Lord’s command .
46014038	But if someone does not recognize it , he is not recognized .
46014039	Therefore , brethren , be eager to prophesy , and do not forbid speaking in tongues .
46014040	But let everything be done decently and in order .
46015001	Now I make known to you , brethren , the Good News which I proclaimed to you . You also received it , and you took your stand on it ,
46015002	and by it you are being saved if you hold firm to the word I proclaimed to you — unless you believed without proper consideration .
46015003	For I also passed on to you first of all what I also received — that Messiah died for our sins according to the Scriptures ,
46015004	that He was buried , that He was raised on the third day according to the Scriptures ,
46015005	and that He appeared to Kefa , then to the Twelve .
46015006	Then He appeared to over five hundred brethren at one time — most of them are still alive , though some have died .
46015007	Then He appeared to Jacob , then to all the shlichim ,
46015008	and last of all , as to one untimely born , He also appeared to me .
46015009	For I am the least of the shlichim , unworthy to be called a shaliach because I persecuted God’s community .
46015010	But by the grace of God I am what I am . His grace toward me was not in vain . No , I worked harder than them all — yet not I , but the grace of God that was with me .
46015011	Whether then it is I or they , so we proclaim , and so you believed .
46015012	Now if Messiah is proclaimed — that He has been raised from the dead — how can some among you say that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
46015013	But if there is no resurrection of the dead , not even Messiah has been raised !
46015014	And if Messiah has not been raised , then our proclaiming is meaningless and your faith also is meaningless .
46015015	Moreover , we are found to be false witnesses of God , because we testified about God that He raised up Messiah — whom He did not raise up , if in fact the dead are not raised .
46015016	For if the dead are not raised , not even Messiah has been raised .
46015017	And if Messiah has not been raised , your faith is futile — you are still in your sins .
46015018	Then those also who have fallen asleep in Messiah have perished .
46015019	If we have hoped in Messiah in this life alone , we are to be pitied more than all people .
46015020	But now Messiah has been raised from the dead , the firstfruits of those who have fallen asleep .
46015021	For since death came through a man , the resurrection of the dead also has come through a Man .
46015022	For as in Adam all die , so also in Messiah will all be made alive .
46015023	But each in its own order : Messiah the firstfruits ; then , at His coming , those who belong to Messiah ;
46015024	then the end , when He hands over the kingdom to God the Father after He has destroyed all rule and all authority and power .
46015025	For He must reign until He has put all His enemies under His feet .
46015026	The last enemy to be destroyed is death .
46015027	For God has “ put all things in subjection underneath His feet . ” But when the psalmist says that “ all ” has been put in subjection , it is clear that this does not include God Himself , who put all things under Messiah .
46015028	Now when all things become subject to Him , then the Son Himself will also become subject to the One who put all things under Him , so that God may be all in all .
46015029	Otherwise , what will they do who are immersed for the dead ? If the dead are not raised at all , then why are they immersed for them ?
46015030	And why are we in danger every hour ?
46015031	I die every day — yes , as surely as the boast in you , brethren , which I have in Messiah Yeshua our Lord .
46015032	If , for human reasons , I fought with “ wild animals ” at Ephesus , what good is that to me ? If the dead are not raised , “ let us eat and drink , for tomorrow we die ! ”
46015033	Do not be deceived ! “ Bad company corrupts good morals . ”
46015034	Come to your senses as you ought , and stop sinning ! For some have no knowledge of God — I say this to your shame .
46015035	But someone will say , “ How are the dead raised ? ” and , “ With what kind of body do they come ? ”
46015036	Fool ! What you sow does not come to life unless it dies .
46015037	As for what you sow — you are not sowing the body that will be , but a bare seed , maybe of wheat or something else .
46015038	But God gives it a body just as He planned , and to each of the seeds a body of its own .
46015039	All flesh is not the same flesh , but there is one flesh of humans , another flesh of animals , another of birds , and another of fish .
46015040	There are also heavenly bodies and earthly bodies , but the glory of the heavenly is one thing while the earthly is another .
46015041	There is one glory of the sun , another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars ; for one star differs from another star in glory .
46015042	So also is the resurrection of the dead : Sown in corruption , raised in incorruption !
46015043	Sown in dishonor , raised in glory ! Sown in weakness , raised in power !
46015044	Sown a natural body , raised a spiritual body ! If there is a natural body , there is also a spiritual body .
46015045	So also it is written , “ The first man , Adam , became a living soul . ” The last Adam became a life-giving spirit .
46015046	However , the spiritual is not first , but the natural ; then the spiritual .
46015047	The first man is of the earth , made of dust ; the second man is from heaven .
46015048	Like the one made of dust , so also are those made of dust ; and like the heavenly , so also are those who are heavenly .
46015049	And just as we have borne the image of the one made from dust , so also shall we bear the image of the One from heaven .
46015050	Now I say this , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God , and what decays cannot inherit what does not decay .
46015051	Behold , I tell you a mystery : We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed —
46015052	in a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last shofar . For the shofar will sound , and the dead will be raised incorruptible , and we will be changed .
46015053	For this corruptible must put on incorruptibility , and this mortal must put on immortality .
46015054	But when this corruptible will have put on incorruptibility and this mortal will have put on immortality , then shall come to pass the saying that is written : “ Death is swallowed up in victory . ”
46015055	“ Where , O Death , is your victory ? Where , O Death , is your sting ? ”
46015056	Now the sting of death is sin , and the power of sin is the Torah .
46015057	But thanks be to God , who keeps giving us the victory through our Lord Yeshua the Messiah !
46015058	Therefore , my dearly loved brethren , be steadfast , immovable , always excelling in the work of the Lord — because you know that your labor in the Lord is not in vain .
46016001	Now concerning the collection for the kedoshim , as I directed Messiah’s communities in Galatia , you do likewise .
46016002	On the first day of the week , let each of you set something aside , saving up whatever is gained , so no collections take place when I come .
46016003	Then whenever I arrive , I will send whomever you approve with letters of introduction to carry your gift to Jerusalem .
46016004	If it is advisable for me to go also , they will go with me .
46016005	But I will come to you after I have passed through Macedonia — for I am passing through Macedonia .
46016006	Perhaps I will stay with you , or even spend the winter , so that you can help me on my journey — wherever I go .
46016007	For I do not wish to see you now just in passing — for I hope to stay on with you for a while , if the Lord permits .
46016008	But I will stay on at Ephesus until Shavuot ,
46016009	for a great door has opened wide for me , though many are in opposition .
46016010	Now if Timothy comes , see that he has nothing to fear among you — for he is doing the Lord’s work , just as I am .
46016011	No one , then , should treat him with disrespect . But set him on his way in shalom , so that he might come to me ; for I am expecting him , along with the brethren .
46016012	Now about our brother Apollos , I strongly urged him to come to you with the brethren , and he was quite unwilling to come now — but he will come when he has an opportunity .
46016013	Be on the alert ! Stand firm in the faith ! Be men of courage ! Be strong !
46016014	Let all that you do be done in love .
46016015	Now I urge you , brethren ( you know the household of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have devoted themselves in service to the kedoshim ) ,
46016016	also to submit to people such as these , and to everyone working together and laboring .
46016017	I rejoice at the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus , for they made up for your absence .
46016018	For they refreshed my spirit and yours . Therefore acknowledge such men .
46016019	Messiah’s communities in Asia greet you . Aquila and Prisca greet you warmly in the Lord , with the community that meets in their house .
46016020	All the brethren greet you . Greet one another with a holy kiss .
46016021	This greeting is in my own hand — Paul’s .
46016022	If anyone does not love the Lord , let him be cursed . Marana , tha ! Our Lord , come !
