47001001	Paul , a shaliach of Messiah Yeshua through the will of God , and Timothy our brother , To God’s community at Corinth , with all the kedoshim who are throughout Achaia :
47001002	Grace to you and shalom from God our Father and the Lord Yeshua the Messiah .
47001003	Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Yeshua the Messiah , the Father of compassion and God of all encouragement .
47001004	He encourages us in every trouble , so that we may be able to encourage those who are in any trouble , through the very encouragement with which we ourselves are encouraged by God .
47001005	For just as the sufferings of Messiah overflow into us , so also through Messiah our encouragement overflows .
47001006	If we are suffering hardship , it is for your encouragement and salvation . Or if we are encouraged , it is for your encouragement , which produces in you the patient endurance of the same sufferings that we also suffer .
47001007	Our hope for you is firm , since we know that as you are partners in our sufferings , so also in our encouragement .
47001008	For we do not want you to be unaware , brethren , of our trouble that happened in Asia . We were under great pressure — so far beyond our strength that we despaired even of living .
47001009	In fact , we had within ourselves the death sentence — so that we might not rely on ourselves , but on God who raises the dead .
47001010	He who rescued us from so great a danger of death will continue to rescue us — we have set our hope on Him that He will rescue us again .
47001011	You also are helping by your prayer for us , so that from many people thanks may be given on our behalf for the gracious gift given us through the help of many .
47001012	For our reason for boasting is this : the testimony of our conscience , that we behaved in the world , and most especially toward you , with simplicity and godly sincerity — not by human wisdom but by the grace of God .
47001013	For we write nothing to you other than what you can read and understand — and I hope you will understand in full
47001014	just as you understood us in part , so that we are your reason for boasting just as you also are ours in the Day of our Lord Yeshua .
47001015	Because of this confidence , I was planning to come to you first , so that you might have a second benefit —
47001016	to pass by you on my way to Macedonia and again from Macedonia to come back to you , and to be helped by you on my journey to Judea .
47001017	So when I was planning to do this , I didn’t do so lightly , did I ? Or the things I plan , do I plan according to the flesh — so it might be with me “ Yes , yes ” and “ No , no ” at the same time ?
47001018	But as God is faithful , our message to you is not both “ Yes ” and “ No . ”
47001019	For Ben-Elohim — Yeshua the Messiah , who was proclaimed among you by us , by myself and Silvanus and Timothy — was not “ Yes ” and “ No . ” Rather , in Him it has always been “ Yes . ”
47001020	For in Him all the promises of God are “ Yes . ” Therefore also through Him is the “ Amen ” by us , to the glory of God .
47001021	Now it is God who establishes us with you in Messiah . He anointed us ,
47001022	set His seal on us , and gave us the Ruach in our hearts as a pledge .
47001023	But I call God as my witness — to spare you , I didn’t come to Corinth again .
47001024	Not that we lord it over you in matters of faith , but we are fellow workers for your joy — for in the faith you are standing firm .
47002001	So I made up my mind that I would not come to you again causing sorrow .
47002002	For if I cause you sorrow , then who is there cheering me on but the one I have made sorrowful ?
47002003	And I wrote this very thing to you , so that when I came I wouldn’t have sorrow from those who ought to make me rejoice — having confidence in you all that my joy is yours .
47002004	For out of much distress and anguish of heart I wrote to you with many tears — not to make you sorrowful , but to let you know the love that I have especially for you .
47002005	But if anyone has caused sorrow , he has caused sorrow not to me , but to some extent — not to exaggerate — to all of you .
47002006	For such a person , this punishment by the majority is enough .
47002007	So instead you should forgive him and encourage him . Otherwise such a person might be swallowed up by excessive sorrow .
47002008	Therefore I urge you to reaffirm your love for him .
47002009	For to this end I also wrote , that I might know your character , whether you are obedient in all things .
47002010	Now anyone you forgive , I also forgive . For indeed , what I have forgiven ( if I have forgiven anything ) , I did it for you in the presence of Messiah ,
47002011	so that we might not be outwitted by satan — for we are not ignorant of his schemes .
47002012	Now when I arrived in Troas for the Good News of Messiah , and a door was opened to me by the Lord ,
47002013	I had no rest in my spirit , because I didn’t find Titus my brother . So I said farewell to them , and I set out for Macedonia .
47002014	But thanks be to God , who in Messiah always leads us in triumphal procession , and through us reveals everywhere the aroma of the knowledge of Himself .
47002015	For we are the aroma of Messiah to God , among those who are being saved and those who are perishing —
47002016	to the one an aroma from death to death , to the other an aroma from life to life . Who is competent for these things ?
47002017	For we are not like many , peddling the word of God . Rather , in Messiah we speak in the sight of God with sincerity , as persons sent from God .
47003001	Are we beginning to commend ourselves again ? Or do we need , as some do , letters of recommendation to you or from you ?
47003002	You are our letter , written on our hearts , known and read by everyone .
47003003	It is clear that you are a letter from Messiah delivered by us — written not with ink but with the Ruach of the living God , not on tablets of stone but on tablets of human hearts .
47003004	Such is the confidence we have through Messiah toward God —
47003005	not that we are competent in ourselves to consider anything as coming from ourselves , but our competence is from God .
47003006	He also made us competent as servants of a new covenant — not of the letter , but of the Ruach . For the letter kills , but the Ruach gives life .
47003007	Now if the ministry of death , carved in letters on stone , came with such glory that B’nei-Israel could not look intently upon Moses’ face because of its glory — although it was passing away —
47003008	how will the ministry of the Ruach not be even more glorious ?
47003009	For if there is glory in the ministry of condemnation , the ministry of righteousness overflows even more in glory .
47003010	For even what was glorious is not glorious in comparison to the glory that surpasses it .
47003011	For if what is passing away is glorious , much more what remains is glorious .
47003012	Therefore , having such a hope , we act with great boldness .
47003013	We are not like Moses , who used to put a veil over his face in order for B’nei-Israel not to look intently upon the end of what was passing away .
47003014	But their minds were hardened . For up to this very day the same veil remains unlifted at the reading of the ancient covenant , since in Messiah it is passing away .
47003015	But to this day , whenever Moses is read , a veil lies over their heart .
47003016	But whenever someone turns to the Lord , the veil is taken away .
47003017	Now the Lord is the Ruach and where the Ruach Adonai is , there is freedom .
47003018	But we all , with unveiled face beholding as in a mirror the glory of the Lord , are being transformed into the same image from glory to glory — just as from the Lord , who is the Ruach .
47004001	For this reason , since we have this ministry , just as we received mercy , we do not lose heart .
47004002	Instead , we renounced the hidden shameful ways — not walking in deception or distorting the word of God , but commending ourselves before God to everyone’s conscience by the open proclamation of the truth .
47004003	And even if our Good News is veiled , it is veiled to those who are perishing .
47004004	In their case , the god of this world has blinded the minds of the unbelieving , so they might not see the light of the Good News of the glory of Messiah , who is the image of God .
47004005	For we do not proclaim ourselves , but Messiah Yeshua as Lord — and ourselves as your slaves for Yeshua’s sake .
47004006	For God , who said , “ Let light shine out of darkness , ” is the One who has shone in our hearts , to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Messiah .
47004007	But we have this treasure in jars of clay , so that the surpassing greatness of the power may be from God and not from ourselves .
47004008	We are hard pressed in every way , yet not crushed ; perplexed , yet not in despair ;
47004009	persecuted , yet not forsaken ; struck down , yet not destroyed ;
47004010	always carrying in the body the death of Yeshua , so that the life of Yeshua may also be revealed in our mortal body .
47004011	For we who live are always being handed over to death for Yeshua’s sake , so that the life of Yeshua may be revealed in our mortal body .
47004012	So death is at work in us , but life is at work in you .
47004013	But we have the same spirit of faith , according to what is written , “ I believed , and therefore I spoke . ” So we also believe , and therefore we also speak ,
47004014	knowing that the One who raised the Lord Yeshua will raise us also with Yeshua , and will bring us with you into His presence .
47004015	For all things are for your sakes , so that the grace that is spreading through more and more people may cause thanksgiving to overflow — to the glory of God .
47004016	Therefore we do not lose heart . Though our outward man is decaying , yet our inward man is renewed day by day .
47004017	For our trouble , light and momentary , is producing for us an eternal weight of glory far beyond all comparison ,
47004018	as we look not at what can be seen but at what cannot be seen . For what can be seen is temporary , but what cannot be seen is eternal .
47005001	For we know that if the tent , our earthly home , is torn down , we have a building from God — a home not made with human hands , eternal in the heavens .
47005002	For in this we groan , longing to be clothed with our heavenly dwelling —
47005003	if indeed , after we have put it on , we will not be found naked .
47005004	For we groan while we are in this tent — burdened because we don’t want to be unclothed but to be clothed , so that what is mortal may be swallowed up by life .
47005005	Now the One who prepared us for this very purpose is God , who gave us the Ruach as a pledge .
47005006	Therefore we are always confident and know that while we are at home in the body , we are absent from the Lord .
47005007	For we walk by faith , not by sight .
47005008	We are confident , I say , and prefer rather to be absent from the body and at home with the Lord .
47005009	So whether at home or absent , we make it our aim to be pleasing to Him .
47005010	For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Messiah , so that each one may receive what is due for the things he did while in the body — whether good or bad .
47005011	Therefore , knowing the fear of the Lord , we are trying to persuade people , but what we are is known to God — and I hope it is known to your consciences as well .
47005012	For we are not commending ourselves to you again , but giving you an opportunity for boasting about us , so that you may have something to answer those who boast in outward appearance and not in the heart .
47005013	For if we are out of our minds , it is for God ; if we are in our right mind , it is for you .
47005014	For the love of Messiah compels us , since we have concluded that One died for all ; as a result all died .
47005015	And He died for all so that those who live might no longer live for themselves , but for the One who died for them and was raised .
47005016	So from now on we recognize no one according to the flesh . Even though we have known Messiah according to the flesh , yet now we no longer know Him this way .
47005017	Therefore if anyone is in Messiah , he is a new creation . The old things have passed away ; behold , all things have become new .
47005018	Now all these things are from God , who reconciled us to Himself through Messiah and gave us the ministry of reconciliation .
47005019	That is , in Messiah God was reconciling the world to Himself , not counting their trespasses against them ; and He has entrusted the message of reconciliation to us .
47005020	We are therefore ambassadors for Messiah , as though God were making His appeal through us . We beg you on behalf of Messiah , be reconciled to God .
47005021	He made the One who knew no sin to become a sin offering on our behalf , so that in Him we might become the righteousness of God .
47006001	Since we are co-laboring , we also urge you not to receive God’s grace in vain .
47006002	For He says , “ At a favorable time I listened to you , in a day of salvation I helped you . ” Behold , now is the favorable time . Behold , now is the day of salvation .
47006003	We give no cause for offense in anything , so that our ministry may not be blamed .
47006004	But as God’s servants , we are commending ourselves in every way — in great endurance , in afflictions , in hardships , in distresses ,
47006005	in beatings , in imprisonments , in riots , in troubles , in sleeplessness , in hunger ;
47006006	in purity , in knowledge , in patience , in kindness , in the Ruach ha-Kodesh , in genuine love ,
47006007	in truthful speech , in the power of God ; with the weapons of righteousness in the right hand and in the left ;
47006008	through honor and dishonor , through evil report and good report . We are regarded as deceivers and yet true ;
47006009	as unknown and yet well-known ; as dying , yet behold , we live ; as disciplined yet not put to death ;
47006010	as grieving yet always rejoicing ; as poor yet enriching many ; as having nothing yet possessing everything .
47006011	We have spoken openly to you , O Corinthians ; our heart is open wide !
47006012	You are not restricted by us , yet you are restricted in your own feelings .
47006013	Now in return — I speak as to my children — open wide to us also .
47006014	Do not be unequally yoked with unbelievers . For what partnership is there between righteousness and lawlessness ? Or what fellowship does light have with darkness ?
47006015	What harmony does Messiah have with Belial ? Or what part does a believer have in common with an unbeliever ?
47006016	What agreement does God’s Temple have with idols ? For we are the temple of the living God — just as God said , “ I will dwell in them and walk among them ; and I will be their God , and they shall be My people .
47006017	Therefore , come out from among them , and be separate , says Adonai . Touch no unclean thing . Then I will take you in .
47006018	I will be a father to you , and you shall be My sons and daughters , says Adonai — Tzva’ot . ”
47007001	Therefore , since we have these promises , loved ones , let us cleanse ourselves from all defilement of body and spirit , perfecting holiness in the fear of God .
47007002	Make room for us in your hearts . We wronged no one , ruined no one , took advantage of no one .
47007003	I do not say this to condemn you , for I have said before that you are in our hearts — to die together and to live together with you .
47007004	Great is my boldness of speech toward you . Great is my boasting on your behalf . I have been filled with encouragement . I overflow with joy in all our troubles .
47007005	For even when we came into Macedonia , our body had no rest . But we were hard pressed on every side — conflicts outside , fears within .
47007006	But God , who encourages the downcast , encouraged us with the arrival of Titus ;
47007007	and not only by his coming , but also by the encouragement with which he was encouraged by you , as he told us of your longing , your mourning , and your deep concern for me — so that I rejoiced still more .
47007008	For even if I grieved you with my letter , I do not regret it — though I did regret it , for I see that my letter grieved you , but just for a while .
47007009	Now I rejoice , not that you were grieved , but that you were grieved to the point of repentance . For you were grieved according to God’s will , so that you might in no way suffer loss from us .
47007010	For the grief that God wills brings a repentance that leads to salvation , leaving no regret . But the world’s grief brings death .
47007011	For see what this very thing — this grieving that God wills — has brought you ! What diligence , what defense , what indignation , what fear , what longing , what zeal , what rendering of justice ! In everything you have proved yourselves to be innocent in this matter .
47007012	So although I wrote to you , I wrote not for the sake of the wrongdoer or for the sake of the one who was wronged , but to make known to you your diligence for us in the sight of God .
47007013	For this reason we have been encouraged . Besides our own encouragement , we rejoiced even more at the joy of Titus , because his spirit has been refreshed by all of you .
47007014	For if I have boasted some to him about you , I was not put to shame . But as we spoke all things truthfully to you , so also our boasting to Titus has proved to be the truth .
47007015	His feelings toward you overflow when he remembers everyone’s obedience — how you received him with fear and trembling .
47007016	I rejoice that in everything I have confidence in you .
47008001	Now we make known to you , brethren , the grace God has given to Messiah’s communities in Macedonia —
47008002	that in much testing by affliction , the abundance of their joy and their extreme poverty overflowed in a wealth of generosity on their part .
47008003	For I testify that according to their ability , and even beyond their ability , they gave of their own free will —
47008004	begging us with much urging for the favor of sharing in the relief of the kedoshim .
47008005	Moreover , it was not just as we had hoped , but they gave of themselves first to the Lord and then to us in keeping with God’s will .
47008006	So we urged Titus that , just as he had made a start before , so he should also complete this gracious service for you .
47008007	But as you excel in everything — in faith and speech and knowledge and all diligence , and in your love for us — also excel in this grace .
47008008	I am saying this not as a command , but I am trying to prove by the diligence of others the genuineness of your love as well .
47008009	For you know the grace of our Lord Yeshua the Messiah — that even though He was rich , yet for your sakes He became poor , so that through His poverty you might become rich .
47008010	Now I give my opinion in this matter , that it is a credit to you that a year ago you were the first to start — not only to do but even to be willing .
47008011	But now finish doing it , so that just as there was eagerness to be willing , so also to finish it , out of what you have .
47008012	For if the eagerness is present , the gift is acceptable according to what a person has , not according to what he doesn’t have .
47008013	For it is not relief for others and hardship for you , but as a matter of equality .
47008014	Your abundance at this present time meets their need , so that their abundance may also meet your need — so that there may be equality .
47008015	As it is written , “ He who gathered much did not have too much , and he who gathered little did not have too little . ”
47008016	But thanks be to God , who put into the heart of Titus the same devotion for you .
47008017	For indeed he not only accepted our appeal , but went to you with eagerness and on his own initiative .
47008018	We are sending along with him the brother whose fame in connection with the Good News has spread throughout all of Messiah’s communities .
47008019	Not only that , but he has also been appointed by the communities as our travel companion with this gracious gift , which is administered by us for the glory of the Lord Himself and to show our eagerness to help .
47008020	We are taking this precaution , so that no one will blame us in regard to the way we administer this generous gift .
47008021	We have regard for what is honorable — not only before the Lord , but also before people .
47008022	Also with them we are sending our brother whom we have tested many times and found to be diligent in many things , but now even more diligent because of his great confidence in you .
47008023	As for Titus , he is my partner and fellow worker among you ; as for our brethren , they are the shlichim of the communities , a glory to Messiah .
47008024	Therefore , before Messiah’s communities show them the proof of your love and of our boasting about you .
47009001	Now about this service to the kedoshim , it is indeed unnecessary for me to write to you —
47009002	for I know your eagerness . I boast about it to the Macedonians , that Achaia has been preparing for a year already ; and your zeal has stirred up most of them .
47009003	But I am sending the brethren in order that our boasting about you may not be in vain in this case , so that you may be prepared , just as I kept saying .
47009004	Otherwise , if any Macedonians were to come and find you unprepared , we — not to mention you — would be put to shame in this undertaking .
47009005	So I thought it necessary to urge the brethren to go on to you and arrange ahead of time your generous gift that had been promised beforehand , so that it would be ready as a gift and not as an extortion .
47009006	The point is this : whoever sows sparingly shall also reap sparingly , and whoever sows bountifully shall also reap bountifully .
47009007	Let each one give as he has decided in his heart , not grudgingly or under compulsion — for God loves a cheerful giver .
47009008	And God is able to make all grace overflow to you , so that by always having enough of everything , you may overflow in every good work .
47009009	As it is written , “ He scattered widely , He gave to the poor ; His righteousness endures forever . ”
47009010	Now the One who supplies seed to the sower and bread for food will supply and multiply your seed and increase the harvest of your righteousness .
47009011	You will be enriched in everything for all generosity , which through us brings about thanksgiving to God .
47009012	For this service of giving is not only supplying the needs of the kedoshim , but is also overflowing with many thanksgivings to God .
47009013	Because of the evidence of this service , they praise God for the obedience of your affirmation of the Good News of Messiah and for the generosity of your contribution to them and to everyone .
47009014	And in their prayer for you , they long for you because of the surpassing grace of God upon you .
47009015	Thanks be to God for His indescribable gift !
47010001	Now I , Paul , appeal myself to you by the meekness and gentleness of Messiah — I who am humble when face to face with you , but bold toward you when far away .
47010002	I beg of you that when I am present I won’t need to be bold with the courage I consider showing against some who judge us as walking in the flesh .
47010003	For though we walk in the flesh , we do not wage war according to the flesh .
47010004	For the weapons of our warfare are not fleshly but powerful through God for the tearing down of strongholds . We are tearing down false arguments
47010005	and every high-minded thing that exalts itself against the knowledge of God . We are taking every thought captive to the obedience of Messiah —
47010006	ready to punish all disobedience , whenever your obedience is complete .
47010007	Look at what is before your eyes . If anyone is confident in himself that he belongs to Messiah , let him reconsider that just as he belongs to Messiah , so also do we .
47010008	For even if I boast a little more about our authority — which the Lord gave for building you up and not for tearing you down — I will not be put to shame .
47010009	Not that I would try to terrify you by my letters —
47010010	for they say , “ His letters are weighty and strong , but his presence in person is weak and his speech of no account . ”
47010011	Let such a person consider this , that what we are in word through letters when we are absent , we also are in action when we are present .
47010012	For we do not dare to classify or compare ourselves with some of those who commend themselves . But when they measure themselves by themselves and compare themselves with themselves , they have no understanding .
47010013	But we will not boast beyond limits , but within the limits of the area that God has assigned to us — to reach even as far as you .
47010014	We are not extending ourselves too far , as if we did not reach you — for we did come even as far as to you with the Good News of Messiah .
47010015	Neither are we boasting beyond limits based on the labors of others , but we have hope while your faith is growing for our area among you to be greatly enlarged —
47010016	so that we may proclaim the Good News even to regions beyond you , not boasting about what has been accomplished in another’s area .
47010017	But “ let him who boasts boast in the Lord . ”
47010018	For it Is not the one who commends himself who is approved , but the one whom the Lord commends .
47011001	I wish that you would put up with a little foolishness from me , but indeed you are putting up with me .
47011002	For I am jealous over you with a godly jealousy . For I betrothed you to one husband , to present you to Messiah as a pure virgin .
47011003	But I am afraid that somehow , as the serpent deceived Eve by his cunning , your minds might be led astray from a sincere and pure devotion and purity to the Messiah .
47011004	For if someone comes and proclaims another Yeshua whom we did not proclaim , or if you receive a different spirit that you did not receive , or a different “ good news ” that you did not accept , you put up with that well enough !
47011005	For I consider myself in no way inferior to the “ super special ” shlichim .
47011006	Even if I am unskilled in speech , yet I am not so in knowledge . No , in every way we have made this clear to you in all things .
47011007	Or did I commit a sin in humbling myself so that you might be exalted , because I proclaimed to you God’s Good News free of charge ?
47011008	I robbed other communities by taking wages from them for service to you .
47011009	When I was present with you and I was in need , I did not burden anyone ; for the brethren who came from Macedonia supplied my need . In everything I kept myself from being a burden to you , and I will continue to do so .
47011010	As the truth of Messiah is in me , this boasting of mine will not be silenced in the regions of Achaia .
47011011	Why ? Because I do not love you ? God knows I do !
47011012	But what I am doing I will continue to do , so that I may cut off the opportunity from those who want an opportunity in what they boast about to also be regarded just as we are .
47011013	For such men are false shlichim , deceitful workers masquerading as Messiah’s shlichim .
47011014	And no wonder , for even satan masquerades as an angel of light .
47011015	It is no great thing therefore if his servants also masquerade as servants of righteousness , Their end will be according to their deeds .
47011016	I say again , let no one consider me to be a fool . But if you do , accept me as a fool , so that I also may boast a little .
47011017	What I am saying , I am saying not according to the Lord , but as in foolishness , in this self-confident boasting .
47011018	Since many boast according to the flesh , I too will boast .
47011019	For you , being so wise , put up with fools gladly .
47011020	For you put up with it if someone enslaves you , if someone devours you , if someone takes advantage of you , if someone puts on airs , if someone slaps you on the face .
47011021	To my shame I must say that we have been weak . Yet whatever anyone else dares to boast about — I speak in foolishness — I dare , too .
47011022	Are they Hebrews ? So am I . Are they Israelites ? So am I . Are they the descendants of Abraham ? So am I .
47011023	Are they servants of Messiah ? I am more so — I speak like I’m out of my mind — in labors much more , in prisons much more , in beatings more brutal , near death often .
47011024	Five times from the Jewish leaders I received forty lashes minus one .
47011025	Three times I was beaten with rods . Once I was stoned . Three times I suffered shipwreck . A night and a day I spent in the open sea .
47011026	In my many journeys I have been in dangers from rivers , dangers from robbers , dangers from my countrymen , dangers from the Gentiles , dangers in the city , dangers in the desert , dangers in the sea , dangers among false brethren ,
47011027	in labor and hardship , through many sleepless nights , in hunger and thirst , often without food , in cold and exposure .
47011028	Besides these other things , there is daily pressure on me of concern for all of Messiah’s communities .
47011029	Who is weak , and I am not weak ? Who is led into sin , and I do not burn with indignation ?
47011030	If I must boast , I will boast of my weakness .
47011031	The God and Father of the Lord Yeshua , who is blessed forever , knows that I am not lying .
47011032	In Damascus the governor under King Aretas was guarding the city of the Damascenes in order to seize me ,
47011033	and I was lowered in a basket through a window in the wall and escaped his hands .
47012001	I must go on boasting — though it does no good , I will go on to visions and revelations of the Lord .
47012002	I know a man in Messiah ( whether in the body I don’t know , or whether out of the body I don’t know — God knows ) — fourteen years ago , he was caught up to the third heaven .
47012003	I know such a man ( whether in the body or outside of the body I don’t know — God knows ) —
47012004	he was caught up into Paradise and heard words too sacred to tell , which a human is not permitted to utter .
47012005	On behalf of such a man I will boast — but about myself I will not boast , except in regard to my weaknesses .
47012006	For if I should want to boast , I would not be foolish — for I will speak the truth . But I refrain , so that no one may think more of me than what he sees in me or hears from me —
47012007	even in the extraordinary quality of the revelations . So that I would not exalt myself , a thorn in the flesh was given to me — a a messenger of satan to torment me , so I would not exalt myself .
47012008	I pleaded with the Lord three times about this , that it might leave me .
47012009	But He said to me , “ My grace is sufficient for you , for power is made perfect in weakness . ” Therefore I will boast all the more gladly in my weaknesses , so that the power of Messiah may dwell in me .
47012010	For Messiah’s sake , then , I delight in weaknesses , in insults , in distresses , in persecutions , in calamities . For when I am weak , then I am strong .
47012011	I have become a fool — you drove me to it , for I ought to have been commended by you . For I am in no way inferior to the super-special shlichim — though I am nothing .
47012012	Truly the signs of a shaliach were worked out among you , with patient endurance , by signs and wonders and mighty miracles .
47012013	For in what respect were you treated worse than the rest of Messiah’s communities — except that I myself did not burden you ? Pardon me this injustice !
47012014	Look , I am ready to come to you this third time , and I will not burden you — for I seek not your possessions , but you ! For the children are not obliged to save up for the parents , but the parents for the children .
47012015	I will most gladly spend and be spent for your souls . If I love you more , am I to be loved less ?
47012016	But be that as it may , I did not burden you myself . Nevertheless , crafty fellow that I am , I caught you with trickery !
47012017	I haven’t taken advantage of you through any of those I sent to you , have I ?
47012018	I did urge Titus to visit you , and I sent the brother with him . Titus didn’t take any advantage of you , did he ? Didn’t we walk in the same spirit , in the same footsteps ?
47012019	All along you’ve been thinking that we are defending ourselves to you . It is before God that we’ve been speaking in Messiah — and all for building you up , loved ones .
47012020	For I am afraid that perhaps when I come , I may find you not as I wish , or I may be found by you not as you wish — that there may be strife , envy , outbursts of anger , self-seeking disputes , lashon ha-ra , gossip , arrogance , unruly commotions .
47012021	I am afraid that when I come again my God may humiliate me before you , and I will mourn for many of those who have sinned before and not repented of the impurity and sexual immorality and indecency which they committed .
47013001	This is the third time I am coming to you . “ By the testimony of two or three witnesses shall every word be established . ”
47013002	I spoke a warning , when I was with you the second time . Though now I am away , I am again speaking a warning to those who have sinned before , as well as to all the rest , that if I come again , I will not spare anyone —
47013003	since you are demanding proof that Messiah is speaking through me . He is not weak toward you , but powerful among you .
47013004	For He was crucified in weakness , yet He lives through the power of God . For we also are weak in Him , yet we shall live with Him by God’s power toward you .
47013005	Test yourselves , to see whether you are in the faith . Examine yourselves ! Or don’t you know yourselves — that Messiah Yeshua is in you ? Unless of course you failed the test .
47013006	But I hope that you will realize that we haven’t failed the test .
47013007	Now we pray to God that you do no wrong — not so that we may appear to have passed the test , but in order that you may do what is right even if we may seem to have failed .
47013008	For we can do nothing against the truth , but only for the truth .
47013009	For we rejoice when we are weak and you are strong . We also pray for this — your perfecting .
47013010	For this reason I write these things while I am absent , so that when I am present I need not proceed harshly , according to the authority which the Lord gave me — for building up and not for tearing down .
47013011	Finally , brethren , rejoice ! Aim for restoration , encourage one another , be of the same mind , live in shalom — and the God of love and shalom will be with you .
47013012	Greet one another with a holy kiss . All the kedoshim greet you .

47013014	The grace of the Lord Yeshua the Messiah and the love of God and the fellowship of the Ruach ha-Kodesh be with you all . Amen .
48001001	Paul , a shaliach ( sent not from men or by man , but by Yeshua the Messiah and God the Father , who raised Him from the dead ) ,
48001002	and all the brethren with me . To Messiah’s communities of Galatia :
48001003	Grace to you and shalom from God our Father and our Lord Yeshua the Messiah —
48001004	who gave Himself for our sins to rescue us from this present evil age , according to the will of our God and Father —
48001005	to Him be the glory forever and ever ! Amen .
48001006	I am amazed that you are so quickly turning away from the One who called you by the grace of Messiah , to a different “ good news ” —
48001007	not that there is another , but only some who are confusing you and want to distort the Good News of Messiah .
48001008	But even if we ( or an angel from heaven ) should announce any “ good news ” to you other than what we have proclaimed to you , let that person be cursed !
48001009	As we have said before , so I now repeat : if anyone proclaims to you “ good news ” other than what you received , let that person be under a curse !
48001010	Am I now trying to win people’s approval , or God’s ? Or am I trying to please people ? If I were still trying to please people , I would not be a servant of Messiah .
48001011	Now I want you to know , brethren , that the Good News proclaimed by me is not man-made .
48001012	I did not receive it from any human , nor was I taught it , but it came through a revelation of Yeshua the Messiah .
48001013	For you have heard of my earlier behavior in Judaism — how I persecuted God’s community beyond measure and tried to destroy it .
48001014	I was even advancing within Judaism beyond many my own age among my people , being a more extreme observer of my fathers’ traditions .
48001015	But when God — who set me apart from birth and called me through His grace — was pleased
48001016	to reveal His Son to me so I would proclaim Him among the Gentiles , I did not immediately consult with any human .
48001017	I did not go up to Jerusalem to those who were shlichim before me , either . Instead I went away to Arabia and returned again to Damascus .
48001018	Then three years later I went to Jerusalem to visit with Peter , and I stayed with him fifteen days .
48001019	But I saw no other shlichim except Jacob , the Lord’s brother .
48001020	( In what I’m writing you , before God , I do not lie . )
48001021	Then I went to the regions of Syria and Cilicia .
48001022	But I was personally unknown to Messiah’s communities of Judea ;
48001023	they only kept hearing , “ The one who once persecuted us now proclaims the Good News he once tried to destroy ! ”
48001024	So they were praising God because of me .
48002001	Then after fourteen years I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , taking Titus with me .
48002002	Because of a revelation , I went up and presented to them the Good News that I proclaim among the Gentiles . But I did so privately to those who seemed to be influential , to make sure I would not run — or had not run — in vain .
48002003	Yet not even Titus who was with me , a Greek , was forced to be circumcised .
48002004	Now this issue came up because of false brethren secretly brought in ( who slipped in to spy out our freedom in Messiah , in order to bring us into bondage ) .
48002005	But we did not give in to them even for a moment , so that the truth of the Good News might be preserved for you .
48002006	But from those who seemed to be influential ( whatever they were makes no difference to me ; God shows no partiality ) — well , those influential ones added nothing to my message .
48002007	On the contrary , they saw that I had been entrusted with the Good News for the uncircumcised just as Peter was for the circumcised .
48002008	( For the same God who was at work in Peter as a shaliach to the Jews , also was at work in me as a shaliach to the Gentiles . )
48002009	Realizing the favor that had been given to me , Jacob and Peter and John — who are the recognized pillars — shook hands in partnership with Barnabas and me , so that we would go to the Gentiles and they to the Jews .
48002010	They asked only that we remember the poor — something I also was eager to do .
48002011	But when Peter came to Antioch , I opposed him to his face , because he was clearly in the wrong —
48002012	for before certain people came from Jacob , he regularly ate with the Gentiles ; but when they came , he began to withdraw and separate himself , fearing those from the circumcision .
48002013	And the rest of the Jews joined him in hypocrisy , so that even Barnabas was carried away with their hypocrisy .
48002014	But when I saw that they were not walking in line with the truth of the Good News , I said to Peter in front of everyone , “ If you — being a Jew — live like the Gentiles and not like the Jews , how can you force the Gentiles to live like Jews ? ”
48002015	We are Jews by birth and not sinners from among the Gentiles .
48002016	Yet we know that a person is set right not by deeds based on Torah , but rather through putting trust in Messiah Yeshua . So even we have put our trust in Messiah Yeshua , in order that we might be set right based on trust in Messiah and not by deeds based on Torah — because no human will be justified by deeds based on Torah .
48002017	But if , while seeking to be justified in Messiah , we ourselves also were found to be sinners , is Messiah then an agent of sin ? May it never be !
48002018	For if I rebuild the very things I tore down , I prove myself to be a law-breaker .
48002019	For through law I died to law , so that I might live for God . I have been crucified with Messiah ;
48002020	and it is no longer I who live , but Messiah lives in me . And the life I now live in the body , I live by trusting in Ben-Elohim — who loved me and gave Himself up for me .
48002021	I do not nullify the grace of God — for if righteousness comes through Torah , then Messiah died for no reason !
48003001	O foolish Galatians , who cast a spell on you ? Before your eyes Yeshua the Messiah was clearly portrayed as crucified .
48003002	I want to find out just one thing from you : did you receive the Ruach by deeds based on Torah , or by hearing based on trust ?
48003003	Are you so foolish ? After beginning with the Ruach , will you now reach the goal in the flesh ?
48003004	Did you endure so much for nothing — if it really was for nothing ?
48003005	So then , the One who gives you the Ruach and works miracles among you — does He do it because of your deeds based on Torah or your hearing based on trust and faithfulness ?
48003006	Just as Abraham “ believed God , and it was credited to him as righteousness , ”
48003007	know then that those who have faith are children of Abraham .
48003008	The Scriptures , foreseeing that God would justify the Gentiles by faith , proclaimed the Good News to Abraham in advance , saying , “ All the nations shall be blessed through you . ”
48003009	So then , the faithful are blessed along with Abraham , the faithful one .
48003010	For all who rely on the deeds of Torah are under a curse — for the Scriptures say , “ Cursed is everyone who does not keep doing everything written in the scroll of the Torah . ”
48003011	It is clear that no one is set right before God by Torah , for “ the righteous shall live by emunah . ”
48003012	However , Torah is not based on trust and faithfulness ; on the contrary , “ the one who does these things shall live by them . ”
48003013	Messiah liberated us from Torah’s curse , having become a curse for us ( for it is written , “ Cursed is everyone who hangs on a tree ” ) —
48003014	in order that through Messiah Yeshua the blessing of Abraham might come to the Gentiles , so we might receive the promise of the Ruach through trusting faith .
48003015	Brethren , I speak in human terms : even with a man’s covenant , once it has been confirmed , no one cancels it or adds to it .
48003016	Now the promises were spoken to Abraham and to his seed . It doesn’t say , “ and to seeds , ” as of many , but as of one , “ and to your seed , ” who is the Messiah .
48003017	What I am saying is this : Torah , which came 430 years later , does not cancel the covenant previously confirmed by God , so as to make the promise ineffective .
48003018	For if the inheritance is based on law , it is no longer based on a promise . But God has graciously given it to Abraham by means of a promise .
48003019	Then why the Torah ? It was added because of wrongdoings until the Seed would come — to whom the promise had been made . It was arranged through angels by the hand of an intermediary .
48003020	Now an intermediary is not for one party alone — but God is one .
48003021	Then is the Torah against the promises of God ? May it never be ! For if a law had been given that could impart life , certainly righteousness would have been based on law .
48003022	But the Scripture has locked up the whole world under sin , so that the promise based on trust in Messiah Yeshua might be given to those who trust .
48003023	Now before faith came , we were being guarded under Torah — bound together until the coming faith would be revealed .
48003024	Therefore the Torah became our guardian to lead us to Messiah , so that we might be made right based on trusting .
48003025	But now that faith has come , we are no longer under a guardian .
48003026	For you are all sons of God through trusting in Messiah Yeshua .
48003027	For all of you who were immersed in Messiah have clothed yourselves with Messiah .
48003028	There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither slave nor free , there is neither male nor female — for you are all one in Messiah Yeshua .
48003029	And if you belong to Messiah , then you are Abraham’s seed — heirs according to the promise .
48004001	Now I am saying , so long as the heir is underage , he is no different from a slave , even though he is the owner of everything .
48004002	Instead , he is under guardians and managers until the date set by the father .
48004003	So also , when we were underage , we were subservient to the basic principles of the world .
48004004	But when the fullness of time came , God sent out His Son , born of a woman and born under law —
48004005	to free those under law , so we might receive adoption as sons .
48004006	Now because you are sons , God sent the Ruach of His Son into our hearts , who cries out , “ Abba ! Father ! ”
48004007	So you are no longer a slave but a son — and if a son , also an heir through God .
48004008	But at that time , when you did not know God , you served those who by nature are not gods at all .
48004009	But now you have come to know God — or rather you have come to be known by God . So how can you turn back again to those weak and worthless principles ? Do you want to be enslaved to them all over again ?
48004010	You observe days and months and seasons and years .
48004011	I fear for you , that perhaps I have labored over you in vain !
48004012	I plead with you , brethren , become like me , for I became like you . You have done me no wrong —
48004013	you know it was because of a physical ailment that I proclaimed the Good News to you the first time ;
48004014	and though my physical condition was a trial to you , you did not hate or reject me . No , you welcomed me as a messenger of God — or even as Messiah Yeshua .
48004015	So where is your sense of joy ? For I testify that you would have torn out your eyes and given them to me , if possible .
48004016	So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth ? !
48004017	Others zealously court you — not in a good way , but they wish to shut you out so that you will court them .
48004018	To be courted is good , but let it always be in a good way — and not just when I am there with you .
48004019	My dear children ! Again I suffer labor pains until Messiah is formed in you .
48004020	I wish I could be with you now and change my tone , for I don’t know what to make of you . Two Sons
48004021	Tell me , you who want to be under Torah , don’t you understand the Torah ?
48004022	For it is written that Abraham had two sons , one by the slave woman and one by the free woman .
48004023	But one — the son by the slave woman — was born naturally ; while the other — the son by the free woman — was through the promise .
48004024	Now these things are being treated allegorically , for these are two covenants . One is from Mount Sinai , giving birth to slavery — this is Hagar .
48004025	But this Hagar is Mount Sinai in Arabia and corresponds to the present Jerusalem , for she is in slavery along with her children .
48004026	But the Jerusalem above is free — she is our mother .
48004027	For it is written : “ Rejoice , O barren woman who bears no children . Break forth and shout , you who suffer no labor pains . For more are the children of the desolate than of the one who has a husband . ”
48004028	Now you , brethren — like Isaac , you are children of promise .
48004029	But just as at that time the one born according to the flesh persecuted the one born according to the Ruach , so it is now .
48004030	But what does the Scripture say ? “ Drive out the slave woman and her son , for the son of the slave woman shall not inherit with the son ” of the free woman .
48004031	So then , brethren , we are not children of the slave woman but of the free woman .
48005001	For freedom , Messiah set us free — so stand firm , and do not be burdened by a yoke of slavery again .
48005002	Listen — I , Paul , tell you that if you let yourselves be circumcised , Messiah will be of no benefit to you .
48005003	Again I testify to every man who lets himself be circumcised , that he is obligated to keep the whole Torah .
48005004	You who are trying to be justified by Torah have been cut off from Messiah ; you have fallen away from grace .
48005005	For through the Ruach , by faith , we eagerly wait for the hope of righteousness .
48005006	For in Messiah Yeshua , neither circumcision nor uncircumcision has any meaning — but only trust and faithfulness expressing itself through love .
48005007	You were running a great race ! Who blocked you from following the truth ?
48005008	This detour doesn’t come from the One who calls you .
48005009	A little hametz works its way through the whole batch of dough !
48005010	I am confident in the Lord that you will not think otherwise . But the one who is confusing you will pay the penalty , whoever he is .
48005011	As for me , brethren , if I still proclaim circumcision , why am I still being persecuted ? In that case , the stumbling block of the cross has been eliminated .
48005012	I only wish those who are agitating you would castrate themselves !
48005013	Brethren , you were called to freedom — only do not let your freedom become an opportunity for the flesh , but through love serve one another .
48005014	For the whole Torah can be summed up in a single saying : “ Love your neighbor as yourself . ”
48005015	But if you bite and devour one another , watch out that you are not destroyed by one another .
48005016	But I say , walk by the Ruach , and you will not carry out the desires of the flesh .
48005017	For the flesh sets its desire against the Ruach , but the Ruach sets its desire against the flesh — for these are in opposition to one another , so that you cannot do what you want .
48005018	But if you are led by the Ruach , you are not under law .
48005019	Now the deeds of the flesh are clear : sexual immorality , impurity , indecency ,
48005020	idolatry , witchcraft , hostility , strife , jealousy , rage , selfish ambition , dissension , factions ,
48005021	envy , drunkenness , carousing , and things like these . I am warning you , just as I warned you before , that those who do such things will not inherit God’s kingdom .
48005022	But the fruit of the Ruach is love , joy , peace , patience , kindness , goodness , faithfulness ,
48005023	gentleness , and self-control — against such things there is no law .
48005024	Now those who belong to Messiah have crucified the flesh with its passions and desires .
48005025	If we live by the Ruach , let us also walk by the Ruach .
48005026	Let us not become conceited — provoking one another , envying one another .
48006001	Brethren , if someone is caught doing something wrong , you who are directed by the Ruach , restore such a person in a spirit of gentleness — looking closely at yourself so you are not tempted also .
48006002	Bear one another’s burdens , and in this way you fulfill the Torah of Messiah .
48006003	For if anyone thinks he is something when he is nothing , he is fooling himself .
48006004	Rather let each one examine his own work . Then he will have pride in himself alone and not in comparison to anyone else .
48006005	For each one will carry his own load .
48006006	Now let the one who is taught the word share all good things with his teacher .
48006007	Do not be deceived — God is not mocked . For whatever a man sows , that he also shall reap .
48006008	For the one who sows in the flesh will reap corruption from the flesh . But the one who sows in the Ruach will reap from the Ruach eternal life .
48006009	So let us not lose heart in doing good , for in due time we will reap if we don’t give up .
48006010	Therefore , whenever we have an opportunity , let us do good toward all — especially those who belong to the household of faith .
48006011	Notice the large letters — I am writing to you with my own hand .
48006012	Those wanting to look good outwardly are trying to force you to be circumcised — only so they will not be persecuted for the cross of Messiah .
48006013	For not even the circumcised keep Torah themselves . Yet they want to have you circumcised so that they may boast about your flesh .
48006014	But may I never boast — except in the cross of our Lord Yeshua the Messiah . Through Him the world has been crucified to me , and I to the world .
48006015	For neither circumcision nor uncircumcision means anything — but only a new creation .
48006016	Now as many as live by this rule — shalom and mercy on them and on the Israel of God .
48006017	From now on let no one make trouble for me , for I bear on my body the scars of Yeshua .
48006018	The grace of our Lord Yeshua the Messiah be with your spirit , brethren . Amen . Paul’s Letter to the Ephesians
49001001	Paul , a shaliach of Messiah Yeshua by God’s will , To the kedoshim in Ephesus — those trusting in Messiah Yeshua :
49001002	Grace and shalom to you , from God our Father and the Lord Yeshua the Messiah !
49001003	Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Yeshua the Messiah , who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Messiah .
49001004	He chose us in the Messiah before the foundation of the world , to be holy and blameless before Him in love .
49001005	He predestined us for adoption as sons through Messiah Yeshua , in keeping with the good pleasure of His will —
49001006	to the glorious praise of His grace , with which He favored us through the One He loves !
49001007	In Him we have redemption through His blood — the removal of trespasses — in keeping with the richness of His grace
49001008	that He lavished on us . In all wisdom and insight ,
49001009	He made known to us the mystery of His will , in keeping with His good pleasure that He planned in Messiah .
49001010	The plan of the fullness of times is to bring all things together in the Messiah — both things in heaven and things on earth , all in Him .
49001011	In Him we also were chosen , predestined according to His plan . He keeps working out all things according to the purpose of His will —
49001012	so that we , who were first to put our hope in Messiah , might be for His glorious praise .
49001013	After you heard the message of truth — the Good News of your salvation — and when you put your trust in Him , you were sealed with the promised Ruach ha-Kodesh .
49001014	He is the guarantee of our inheritance , until the redemption of His possession — to His glorious praise !
49001015	Therefore , ever since I heard of your trust in the Lord Yeshua and of your love for all the kedoshim ,
49001016	I never stop giving thanks for you as I mention you in my prayers —
49001017	that the God of our Lord Yeshua the Messiah , our glorious Father , may give you spiritual wisdom and revelation in knowing Him .
49001018	I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened , so that you may know what is the hope of His calling , what is the richness of His glorious inheritance in the kedoshim ,
49001019	and what is His exceedingly great power toward us who keep trusting Him — in keeping with the working of His mighty strength .
49001020	This power He exercised in Messiah when He raised Him from the dead and seated Him at His right hand in heaven .
49001021	He is far above any ruler , authority , power , leader , and every name that is named — not only in the olam ha-zeh but also in the olam ha-ba .
49001022	God placed all things under Messiah’s feet and appointed Him as head over all things for His community —
49001023	which is His body , the fullness of Him who fills all in all .
49002001	You were dead in your trespasses and sins .
49002002	At that time , you walked in the way of this world , in conformity to the ruler of the domain of the air — the ruler of the spirit who is now operating in the sons of disobedience .
49002003	We too all lived among them in the cravings of our flesh , indulging the desires of the flesh and the mind . By nature we were children of wrath , just like the others .
49002004	But God was rich in mercy , because of His great love with which He loved us .
49002005	Even when we were dead in our trespasses , He made us alive together with Messiah . ( By grace you have been saved ! )
49002006	And He raised us up with Him and seated us with Him in the heavenly places in Messiah Yeshua —
49002007	to show in the olam ha-ba the measureless richness of His grace in kindness toward us in Messiah Yeshua .
49002008	For by grace you have been saved through faith . And this is not from yourselves — it is the gift of God .
49002009	It is not based on deeds , so that no one may boast .
49002010	For we are His workmanship — created in Messiah Yeshua for good deeds , which God prepared beforehand so we might walk in them . Jew and Gentile , One in Messiah
49002011	Therefore , keep in mind that once you — Gentiles in the flesh — were called “ uncircumcision ” by those called “ circumcision ” ( which is performed on flesh by hand ) .
49002012	At that time you were separate from Messiah , excluded from the commonwealth of Israel and strangers to the covenants of promise , having no hope and without God in the world .
49002013	But now in Messiah Yeshua , you who once were far off have been brought near by the blood of the Messiah .
49002014	For He is our shalom , the One who made the two into one and broke down the middle wall of separation . In His body
49002015	He made the principle of mitzvot by decrees of no effect . He did this in order to create within Himself one new man from the two groups , making shalom ,
49002016	and to reconcile both to God in one body through the cross — by which He put the hostility to death .
49002017	And He came and proclaimed shalom to you who were far away and shalom to those who were near —
49002018	for through Him we both have access to the Father by the same Ruach .
49002019	So then you are no longer strangers and foreigners , but you are fellow citizens with God’s people and members of God’s household .
49002020	You have been built on the foundation made up of the shlichim and prophets , with Messiah Yeshua Himself being the cornerstone .
49002021	In Him the whole building , being fitted together , is growing into a holy temple for the Lord .
49002022	In Him , you also are being built together into God’s dwelling place in the Ruach .
49003001	For this reason I , Paul , am a prisoner of Messiah Yeshua for the sake of you Gentiles .
49003002	Surely you have heard about the plan of God’s grace given to me for you —
49003003	that the mystery was made known to me by revelation , as I wrote before briefly .
49003004	When you read this , you can understand my insight into the mystery of Messiah —
49003005	which was not made known to the sons of men in other generations , as it has now been revealed by the Ruach to His holy shlichim and prophets .
49003006	This mystery is that the Gentiles are joint heirs and fellow members of the same body and co-sharers of the promise in Messiah Yeshua through the Good News .
49003007	I became a servant of this Good News by the gift of God’s favor given to me through the exercise of His power .
49003008	This favor was given to me , the very least of His kedoshim , to proclaim to the Gentiles the endless riches of the Messiah
49003009	and to bring to light the plan of the mystery — which for ages was hidden in God , who created all things .
49003010	The purpose is that through Messiah’s community the multi-faceted wisdom of God might be made known to the rulers and authorities in the heavenly places ,
49003011	which is in keeping with the eternal purpose that He carried out in Messiah Yeshua our Lord .
49003012	In Him we have boldness and access with confidence through trusting in Him .
49003013	So I ask you not to be discouraged by my troubles on your behalf — they are your glory .
49003014	For this reason I bow my knees before the Father —
49003015	from Him every family in heaven and on earth receives its name .
49003016	I pray that from His glorious riches He would grant you to be strengthened in your inner being with power through His Ruach ,
49003017	so that Messiah may dwell in your hearts through faith . I pray that you , being rooted and grounded in love ,
49003018	may have strength to grasp with all the kedoshim what is the width and length and height and depth ,
49003019	and to know the love of Messiah which surpasses knowledge , so you may be filled up with all the fullness of God .
49003020	Now to Him who is able to do far beyond all that we ask or imagine , by means of His power that works in us ,
49003021	to Him be the glory in the community of believers and in Messiah Yeshua throughout all generations forever and ever ! Amen .
49004001	Therefore I , a prisoner for the Lord , urge you to walk in a manner worthy of the calling to which you were called —
49004002	with complete humility and gentleness , with patience , putting up with one another in love ,
49004003	making every effort to keep the unity of the Ruach in the bond of shalom .
49004004	There is one body and one Ruach , just as you also were called in one hope of your calling ;
49004005	one Lord , one faith , one immersion ;
49004006	one God and Father of all , who is over all and through all and in all .
49004007	But to each one of us grace was given in keeping with the measure of Messiah’s gift .
49004008	Therefore it says , “ When He went up on high , He led captive a troop of captives and gave gifts to his people . ”
49004009	Now what does “ He went up ” mean , except that He first went down to the lower regions of the earth ?
49004010	The One who came down is the same One who went up far above all the heavens , in order to fill all things .
49004011	He Himself gave some to be shlichim , some as prophets , some as proclaimers of the Good News , and some as shepherds and teachers —
49004012	to equip the kedoshim for the work of service , for building up the body of Messiah .
49004013	This will continue until we all come to the unity of the faith and of the knowledge of Ben-Elohim — to mature adulthood , to the measure of the stature of Messiah’s fullness .
49004014	As a result , we are no longer to be like children , tossed around by the waves and blown all over by every wind of teaching , by the trickery of men with cunning in deceitful scheming .
49004015	Instead , speaking the truth in love , we are to grow up in all ways into Messiah , who is the Head .
49004016	From Him the whole body is fitted and held together by every supporting ligament . The proper working of each individual part produces the body’s growth , for building itself up in love .
49004017	So I tell you this , indeed I insist on it in the Lord — walk no longer as the pagans do , stumbling around in the futility of their thinking .
49004018	They are darkened in their understanding , alienated from the life of God because of the ignorance in them due to the hardness of their heart .
49004019	Since they are past feeling , they have turned themselves over to indecency for the practice of every kind of immorality , with greed for more .
49004020	However , you did not learn Messiah in this way —
49004021	if indeed you have heard Him and were taught in Him , as the truth is in Yeshua .
49004022	With respect to your former lifestyle , you are to lay aside the old self corrupted by its deceitful desires ,
49004023	be renewed in the spirit of your mind ,
49004024	and put on the new self — created to be like God in true righteousness and holiness .
49004025	So lay aside lying and “ each one of you speak truth with his neighbor , ” for we are members of one another .
49004026	“ Be angry , yet do not sin . ” Do not let the sun go down on your anger ,
49004027	nor give the devil a foothold .
49004028	The one who steals must steal no longer — instead he must work , doing something useful with his own hands , so he may have something to share with the one who has need .
49004029	Let no harmful word come out of your mouth , but only what is beneficial for building others up according to the need , so that it gives grace to those who hear it .
49004030	Do not grieve the Ruach ha-Kodesh of God , by whom you were sealed for the day of redemption .
49004031	Get rid of all bitterness and rage and anger and quarreling and slander , along with all malice .
49004032	Instead , be kind to one another , compassionate , forgiving each other just as God in Messiah also forgave you .
49005001	Therefore be imitators of God , as dearly loved children ;
49005002	and walk in love , just as Messiah also loved us and gave Himself up for us as an offering and sacrifice to God for a fragrant aroma .
49005003	But sexual immorality and any impurity or greed — don’t even let these be mentioned among you , as is proper for kedoshim .
49005004	Obscene , coarse , and stupid talk are also out of place , but instead let there be thanksgiving .
49005005	Know for certain that no immoral , indecent , or greedy person — who is really an idol worshipper at heart — has any inheritance in the kingdom of Messiah and God .
49005006	Let no one deceive you with empty words , for because of such things God’s judgment comes on the children of disobedience .
49005007	Therefore do not be partners with them .
49005008	For once you were darkness , but now in union with the Lord you are light . Walk as children of light
49005009	( for the fruit of light is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ) ,
49005010	trying to learn what is pleasing to the Lord .
49005011	Take no part in the fruitless deeds of darkness , but rather expose them —
49005012	for it is disgraceful even to mention the things that are done by them in secret .
49005013	Yet everything exposed by the light is being made visible ,
49005014	for everything made visible is light . This is why it says , “ Wake up , O sleeper ! Rise from the dead , and Messiah will shine on you . ”
49005015	So pay close attention to how you walk — not as unwise people but as wise .
49005016	Make the most of your time because the days are evil .
49005017	For this reason do not be foolish , but understand what the Lord’s will is .
49005018	And do not get drunk on wine , for that is recklessness . Instead , be filled with the Ruach ,
49005019	speaking to one another in psalms , hymns , and spiritual songs , singing and making music in your heart to the Lord —
49005020	always giving thanks for everything to God the Father , in the name of the Lord Yeshua the Messiah .
49005021	Also submit yourselves to one another out of reverence for Messiah —
49005022	wives to your own husbands as to the Lord .
49005023	For the husband is head of the wife , as Messiah also is head of His community — Himself the Savior of the body .
49005024	But as Messiah’s community is submitted to Messiah , so also the wives to their husbands in everything .
49005025	Husbands , love your wives just as Messiah also loved His community and gave Himself up for her
49005026	to make her holy , having cleansed her by immersion in the word .
49005027	Messiah did this so that He might present to Himself His glorious community — not having stain or wrinkle or any such thing , but in order that she might be holy and blameless .
49005028	In the same way , husbands ought to love their own wives as their own bodies . He who loves his wife loves himself .
49005029	For no one ever hated his own flesh , but nourishes and cherishes it — just as Messiah also does His community ,
49005030	because we are members of His body .
49005031	“ For this reason a man shall leave his father and mother and be joined to his wife , and the two shall become one flesh . ”
49005032	This mystery is great — but I am talking about Messiah and His community .
49005033	In any case , let each of you love his own wife as himself , and let the wife respect her husband .
49006001	Children , obey your parents in the Lord , for this is right .
49006002	“ Honor your father and mother ” ( which is the first commandment with a promise ) ,
49006003	“ so that it may be well with you , and you may live long on the earth . ”
49006004	Fathers , do not provoke your children to anger , but bring them up in the discipline and instruction of the Lord . Orderly Relationships : Workplace
49006005	Slaves , obey your human masters , with respect and reverence , with sincerity of heart , as you would the Messiah —
49006006	not just under your master’s eye as people-pleasers , but as slaves of Messiah doing God’s will from the soul .
49006007	Serve with a positive attitude , as to the Lord and not to men —
49006008	knowing that whatever good each one does , this he will receive back from the Lord , whether slave or free .
49006009	And masters , treat your slaves in the same way . Stop using threats , knowing that the Master — of them and of you , too — is in heaven , and there is no favoritism with Him .
49006010	Finally , be strong in the Lord and in His mighty power .
49006011	Put on the full armor of God , so that you are able to stand against the schemes of the devil .
49006012	For our struggle is not against flesh and blood , but against the rulers , against the powers , against the worldly forces of this darkness , and against the spiritual forces of wickedness in the heavenly places .
49006013	Therefore , take up the full armor of God , so that you may be able to resist when the times are evil , and after you have done everything , to stand firm .
49006014	Stand firm then ! Buckle the belt of truth around your waist , and put on the breastplate of righteousness .
49006015	Strap up your feet in readiness with the Good News of shalom .
49006016	Above all , take up the shield of faith with which you will be able to extinguish all the flaming arrows of the evil one .

50001001	Paul and Timothy , slaves of Messiah Yeshua , To all the kedoshim in Messiah Yeshua who are in Philippi with the overseers and shammashim :

50001013	And so my imprisonment in the cause of Messiah has become well known throughout the whole Praetorian Guard and to everyone else .

50001017	The former proclaim Messiah not sincerely , but out of selfishness — expecting to stir up trouble for me in my imprisonment .

50001019	for I know that this will turn out for my deliverance , through your intercession and the help of the Ruach of Messiah Yeshua .
50001020	My eager expectation and hope is that in no way will I be put to shame , but that with complete boldness Messiah will even now , as always , be exalted in my body — whether through life or through death .
50001021	For to me , to live is Messiah and to die is gain .
50001022	But if to live on in the body means fruit from my work , what shall I choose ? I do not know .
50001023	I am torn between the two — having a desire to leave and be with Messiah , which is far better ;
50001024	yet for your sake , to remain in the body is more necessary .
50001025	Convinced of this , I know that I will remain and continue with you all , for the sake of your progress and joy in the faith —
50001026	so that your confidence in Messiah Yeshua might overflow because of me through my coming to you again .
50001027	Only live your lives in a manner worthy of the Good News of the Messiah . Then , whether I come and see you or I am absent , I may hear of you that you are standing firm in one spirit — striving side by side with one mind for the faith of the Good News
50001028	and not being frightened in any way by your opponents . For them this is a sign of destruction , but for you salvation — and that from God .
50001029	For to you was granted for Messiah’s sake not only to trust in Him , but also to suffer for His sake —
50001030	experiencing the same struggle you saw in me and now you are hearing in me .

52003008	For now we live , since you are standing firm in the Lord .
52003009	For what thanks would be enough to offer to God , in return for all the joy we feel before our God because of you ?
52003010	Night time and day time we keep praying more than ever to see you face to face , and mend any shortcomings in your faith . Thanks , Joy , and Love Before God
52003011	Now may our God and Father Himself and Yeshua our Lord direct our way to you .
52003012	May the Lord also cause you to increase and overflow in love for one another and for all people , just as we also do for you ,
52003013	in order to strengthen your hearts as blameless in holiness before our God and Father at the coming of our Lord Yeshua with all His kedoshim . Amen .
52004001	Finally then , brethren , we ask you and appeal in the Lord Yeshua — just as you received from us the way you ought to walk and please God ( as in fact you are walking ) — that you keep progressing more and more .
52004002	For you know what instructions we gave you through the Lord Yeshua .
52004003	For this is the will of God — your sanctification : to abstain from sexual immorality ;

52004007	For God did not call us to impurity , but in holiness .
52004008	Consequently , the one who rejects this is not rejecting man , but God , who gives His Ruach ha-Kodesh to you .

52004010	In fact , you even practice it toward all your brethren throughout Macedonia . But we urge you , brethren , to keep progressing more and more
52004011	and aspire to lead a quiet life , to mind your own affairs , and to work with your hands , just as we directed you —
52004012	so you may behave properly toward outsiders and not have need of anything . The Shofar Call of Messiah’s Return
52004013	Now we do not want you to be uninformed , brethren , about those who are asleep , so that you may not grieve like the rest who have no hope .
52004014	For if we believe that Yeshua died and rose again , so with Him God will also bring those who have fallen asleep in Yeshua .
52004015	For this we tell you , by the word of the Lord , that we who are alive and remain until the coming of the Lord shall in no way precede those who are asleep .

52004017	Then we who are alive , who are left behind , will be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air — and so we shall always be with the Lord .
52004018	Therefore encourage one another with these words .
52005001	Now concerning the times and seasons , brethren , you have no need for anything to be written to you .
52005002	For you yourselves know very well that the Day of the Lord comes like a thief in the night .
52005003	When they are saying , “ Shalom and safety , ” sudden destruction comes upon them like a woman having birth pains in the womb — there is no way they will escape .
52005004	But you , brethren , are not in the dark , so that the Day might overtake you like a thief .
52005005	For you all are sons of light and sons of day . We are not of night or of darkness —
52005006	so then , let us not sleep as the others do , but let us remain on the alert and sober-minded .
52005007	For those who sleep , sleep at night ; and those who get drunk , get drunk at night .
52005008	But since we are of the day , let us be sober-minded — putting on the breastplate of faithfulness and love , and the hope of salvation as a helmet .
52005009	For God did not destine us for wrath but for obtaining salvation through our Lord Yeshua the Messiah .
52005010	He died for us so that , whether we may be awake or asleep , we may live together with Him .
52005011	Therefore encourage one another and build each other up — just as you in fact are doing .
52005012	Now we ask you , brethren , to recognize those who work hard among you and are over you in the Lord and correct you ,
52005013	and to esteem them beyond all measure in love because of their work . Keep shalom among yourselves .
52005014	We urge you , brethren , correct the unruly , comfort the fainthearted , help the weak , be patient with everyone .
52005015	See that no one repays evil for evil to anyone , but always pursue what is good for one another and for all .
52005016	Rejoice always ,
52005017	pray constantly ,
52005018	in everything give thanks ; for this is God’s will for you in Messiah Yeshua .
52005019	Do not quench the Ruach ,
52005020	do not despise prophetic messages ,
52005021	but test all things , hold fast to what is good ,
52005022	keep away from every kind of evil .
52005023	Now may the God of shalom Himself make you completely holy ; and may your whole spirit and soul and body be kept complete , blameless at the coming of our Lord Yeshua the Messiah .
52005024	Faithful is the One who calls you — and He will make it happen ! Closing Greetings

53002012	so that they may be judged — all those who did not believe the truth but delighted in wickedness . Firstfruits of Salvation

53003005	May the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God and into the patience of Messiah . No Time to Be Lazy

55002026	Then they may regain their senses and escape the devil’s snare , in which they had been held captive by him to do his will .
55003001	But understand this , that in the last days hard times will come —
55003002	for people will be lovers of self , lovers of money , boastful , arrogant , blasphemers , disobedient to parents , ungrateful , unholy ,
55003003	hardhearted , unforgiving , backbiting , without self-control , brutal , hating what is good ,
55003004	treacherous , reckless , conceited , lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God ,
55003005	holding to an outward form of godliness but denying its power . Avoid these people !
55003006	For among these are those who slip into households and deceive weak women weighed down with sins , led away by various desires ,
55003007	always learning yet never able to come to the knowledge of truth .
55003008	Just as Jannes and Jambres opposed Moses , so do these people oppose the truth , men corrupted in mind and worthless concerning the faith .
55003009	But these people will not make any more progress — for their folly , like that of Jannes and Jambres , will be obvious to everyone .
55003010	You , however , closely followed my teaching , manner of life , purpose , faithfulness , patience , love , perseverance —
55003011	as well as persecutions and sufferings that happened to me in Antioch , Iconium , and Lystra . What persecutions I endured ! And the Lord rescued me from them all !
55003012	Indeed , all who desire to live a godly life in Messiah Yeshua will be persecuted .
55003013	But evil men and imposters will go from bad to worse , deceiving and being deceived .
55003014	You , however , continue in what you have learned and what you have become convinced of . For you know from whom you have learned ,
55003015	and that from childhood you have known the sacred writings that are able to make you wise , leading to salvation through trusting in Messiah Yeshua .
55003016	All Scripture is inspired by God and useful for teaching , for reproof , for restoration , and for training in righteousness ,
55003017	so that the person belonging to God may be capable , fully equipped for every good deed .
55004001	I solemnly charge you — in the presence of God and Messiah Yeshua , who is about to judge the living and the dead at His appearing and His Kingdom —
55004002	proclaim the Word ! Be ready when it is convenient or inconvenient . Confront , rebuke , encourage — with complete patience and instruction .
