55004003	For the time will come when they will not put up with sound instruction , but they will pile up for themselves teachers in keeping with their own desires , to have their ears tickled .
55004004	And they will turn away from hearing the truth and wander off to myths .
55004005	You , however , keep a clear mind in all things , withstand hardship , do the work of proclaiming the Good News , and fulfill your service .
55004006	For I am already being poured out like a drink offering , and the time of my departure has come .
55004007	I have fought the good fight , I have finished the course , I have kept the faith .
55004008	In the future there is reserved for me a crown of righteousness , which the Lord , the righteous Judge , will award to me on that day — and not to me only , but also to everyone who has longed for His appearing .
55004009	Do all you can to come to me quickly —
55004010	for Demas , having loved this world , has deserted me and gone to Thessolonica ; Crescens has gone to Galatia , and Titus to Dalmatia .
55004011	Luke is the only one with me . Get Mark and bring him with you , for he is useful to me for service .
55004012	I have sent Tychius to Ephesus .
55004013	When you come , bring the cloak which I left with Carpus in Troas , along with the scrolls , and especially the parchments .
55004014	Alexander the coppersmith did me much harm — the Lord will repay him according to his deeds .
55004015	Be on guard against him too , for he vehemently opposed our message .
55004016	At my first defense , no one stood by me ; instead , they all deserted me — may it not be counted against them !
55004017	But the Lord stood by me and strengthened me , so that through me the message might be proclaimed in full measure , and all the nations might hear — and I was rescued from the lion’s mouth !
55004018	The Lord will rescue me from every evil deed and will deliver me safely into His heavenly Kingdom . To Him be the glory forever and ever . Amen .
55004019	Greet Prisca and Aquila , and the household of Onesiphorus .
55004020	Erastus stayed in Corinth , and I left Trophimus sick in Miletus .
55004021	Do all you can to come before winter . Eubulus sends you greetings , as do Pudens , Linus , Claudia , and all the brethren .
55004022	The Lord be with your spirit . Grace be with you .
56001001	Paul , a slave of God and a shaliach of Messiah Yeshua , for the faith of God’s chosen and the knowledge of truth that is in keeping with godliness ,
56001002	based on the hope of eternal life . God — who cannot lie — promised this before the beginning of time .
56001003	But in His own time He made His message known , through a proclamation with which I was entrusted , by the command of God our Savior .
56001004	To Titus , a true child of our common faith : Grace and shalom from God the Father and Messiah Yeshua , our Savior !
56001005	The reason I left you in Crete was so that you would set in order the things that remain and appoint elders in every city as I directed you —
56001006	if anyone is blameless , the husband of one wife , having children of faith with no charge of wild living or rebellion .
56001007	For the overseer must be blameless as God’s administrator — not arrogant , not quick-tempered , not addicted to wine , not violent , not greedy for dishonest gain .
56001008	Rather he must be hospitable , loving what is good , self-controlled , upright , devout , disciplined .
56001009	He must hold firmly to the trustworthy message in keeping with the teaching , so he can both encourage by instruction that is sound and convict those who speak against it .
56001010	For there are many who are rebellious , vain talkers and deceivers , especially those from the circumcision .
56001011	They must be silenced — those who upset entire households by teaching what they should not , for the sake of dishonest gain .
56001012	One of them , one of their own prophets , said , “ Cretans are always liars , evil beasts , lazy gluttons . ”
56001013	This testimony is true . For this reason rebuke them sharply , so they might be sound in the faith ,
56001014	not paying attention to Judaic myths and commands of men who turn away from the truth .
56001015	To the pure all things are pure ; but to those who are defiled and unbelieving , nothing is pure . Both their mind and conscience are defiled .
56001016	They claim to know God but their deeds deny Him . They are despicable and disobedient and worthless for any good deed .
56002001	But as for you , speak things that are fitting for sound instruction .
56002002	Older men are to be clear-minded , dignified , self-controlled , sound in faith , in love , in patience .
56002003	Likewise , older women are to be sanctified in demeanor — not backbiting or enslaved to much wine . Let them be teachers of what is good ,
56002004	so that they may train the young women to love their husbands , to love their children ,
56002005	to be self-controlled , pure , managing their household , kind , submitted to their own husbands , so that God’s word may not be dishonored .
56002006	Likewise urge the younger men to be self-controlled ,
56002007	in all things showing yourself to be an example of good deeds — integrity in instruction , dignity ,
56002008	sound speech beyond criticism — so that an opponent may be put to shame , having nothing bad to say about us .
56002009	Urge slaves to submit themselves to their own masters in all things , well-pleasing and not back-talking ,
56002010	not stealing but showing all good faithfulness , so that they may do credit to the teaching about God our Savior in everything .
56002011	For the grace of God has appeared , bringing salvation to all men ,
56002012	training us to deny ungodliness and worldly desires and to live in a manner that is self-controlled and righteous and godly in the present age .
56002013	We wait for the blessed hope and appearance of the glory of our great God and Savior , Messiah Yeshua .
56002014	He gave Himself for us so that He might redeem us from every lawless deed and so that He might purify for Himself a chosen people , zealous for good deeds .
56002015	So communicate these things , and encourage and correct with complete authority . Let no one look down on you .
56003001	Remind the people to be submitted to rulers and authorities , to be obedient , to be ready for every good deed ,
56003002	to slander no one , without fighting , gentle , showing every courtesy to all people .
56003003	For we also once were foolish , disobedient , deluded , enslaved to various desires and pleasures , spending our lives in malice and envy , hateful and hating one another .
56003004	But when the kindness of God our Savior and His love for mankind appeared —
56003005	not by deeds of righteousness which we had done ourselves , but because of His mercy — He saved us through the mikveh of rebirth and renewing of the Ruach ha-Kodesh ,
56003006	whom He abundantly poured out on us through Messiah Yeshua our Savior ,
56003007	so that being set right by His grace , we might become heirs with the confident hope of eternal life !
56003008	Trustworthy is the saying , and I want you to insist on these things , so that those who have put their trust in God may be careful to devote themselves to good deeds . These things are good and beneficial for people .
56003009	But avoid foolish controversies and genealogies and strife and disputes about Torah , for they are unprofitable and useless .
56003010	Dismiss a quarrelsome person after a first and second warning ,
56003011	knowing that such a person is twisted and is sinning — he is self- condemned .
56003012	When I send Artemas or Tychicus to you , hurry to come to me in Nicopolis , for I have decided to winter there .
56003013	Send Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey with great care , so that nothing is lacking for them .
56003014	And let our people learn to devote themselves to doing mitzvot to meet urgent needs , so they will not be unfruitful .
56003015	All who are with me greet you . Greet those who love us in the faith . Grace be with you all .
57001001	Paul , a prisoner of Messiah Yeshua , and Timothy our brother , to Philemon our beloved and fellow worker .
57001002	To Apphia our sister , to Archippus our fellow soldier , and to the community that meets in your house :
57001003	Grace to you and shalom from God our Father and the Lord Messiah Yeshua !
57001004	I thank my God always when mentioning you in my prayers ,
57001005	hearing of your love and the trust you have toward the Lord Yeshua and all the kedoshim .
57001006	May the fellowship of your faith become effective , with the recognition of all the good that is ours in Messiah .
57001007	For I’ve received much joy and comfort in your love , brother , because the hearts of the kedoshim have been refreshed through you .
57001008	Therefore , though I have plenty of boldness in Messiah to order you to do what’s right ,
57001009	yet for love’s sake I appeal to you instead . I , Paul , am an old man and now also a prisoner belonging to Messiah Yeshua .
57001010	I beg you for my child Onesimus — for whom I became a spiritual father while in chains .
57001011	He once was useless to you , but now is useful both to you and me .
57001012	I sent him back to you — he is my very heart .
57001013	I really wanted to keep him with me , so that on your behalf he might serve me while I am in chains for the Good News .
57001014	But I didn’t want to do anything without your consent , so that your goodness wouldn’t be by force but by free will .
57001015	For perhaps he was separated from you for a while in order that you might have him back forever ,
57001016	no longer as a slave but more than a slave — as a beloved brother , especially to me but even more so to you , both in the flesh and in the Lord .
57001017	So if you consider me a partner , welcome him as you would welcome me .
57001018	But if he has done you any wrong or owes you anything , charge that to my account .
57001019	I , Paul , am writing this with my own hand : I will repay . ( Not to mention that you owe me your very self . )
57001020	Yes , brother , let me have some benefit from you in the Lord . Refresh my heart in Messiah .
57001021	Having confidence in your obedience , I write to you , knowing that you will do even more than what I say .
57001022	At the same time also , prepare a guest room for me — for I hope that through your prayers I will be given back to you .
57001023	Epaphras , my fellow prisoner in Messiah Yeshua , greets you .
57001024	So do Mark , Aristarchus , Demas , and Luke , my fellow workers .
57001025	May the grace of our Lord Messiah Yeshua be with your spirit . Amen .
58001001	At many times and in many ways , God spoke long ago to the fathers through the prophets .
58001002	In these last days He has spoken to us through a Son , whom He appointed heir of all things and through whom He created the universe .
58001003	This Son is the radiance of His glory and the imprint of His being , upholding all things by His powerful word . When He had made purification for our sins , He sat down at the right hand of the Majesty on high .
58001004	Thus He became as far above the angels as the name He has inherited is more excellent than theirs .
58001005	For to which of the angels did God ever say , “ You are My Son . Today I have become Your Father ” ? And again , “ I will be to Him a Father , and He will be to Me a Son ” ?
58001006	And again , when He brings the firstborn into the world , He says , “ Let all the angels of God worship Him . ”
58001007	And regarding the angels He says , “ He makes His angels winds , and His servants a flame of fire . ”
58001008	But regarding the Son He says , “ Your throne , O God , is forever and ever , and a scepter of uprightness is the scepter of Your Kingdom .
58001009	You have loved righteousness and hated lawlessness ; therefore God , Your God , has anointed You with the oil of gladness above Your companions . ”
58001010	And , “ In the beginning , Adonai , You laid the foundation of the earth , and the heavens are the works of Your hands .
58001011	They shall pass away , but You remain . And they will all wear out like clothing .
58001012	And like a robe You will roll them up , and like clothing they will be changed ; but You are the same , and Your years shall never end . ”
58001013	But to which of the angels has He ever said , “ Sit at My right hand , until I make Your enemies a footstool for Your feet ” ?
58001014	Are they not all ministering spirits , sent out for service to those about to inherit salvation ?
58002001	For this reason it is necessary for us to pay especially close attention to what we have heard , so that we do not drift away .
58002002	For if the word spoken through angels proved to be firm , and every violation and disobedience received a just payback ,
58002003	how shall we escape if we neglect so great a salvation ? It was first spoken through the Lord and confirmed to us by those who heard .
58002004	At the same time , God was testifying by signs and wonders and various miracles and gifts of the Ruach ha-Kodesh , according to His will . Yeshua Greater than Angels
58002005	For it is not to angels that God has subjected the olam ha-ba — about which we speak .
58002006	But somewhere someone has testified , saying , “ What is man , that You are mindful of him , or the son of man , that You care for him ?
58002007	For a little while , You made him lower than the angels . You crowned him with glory and honor .
58002008	You put all things in subjection underneath his feet . ” For when He put all things in subjection to him , He left nothing outside his control . But for now we do not yet see all things subjected to him .
58002009	But we see One who was made for a little while lower than the angels — namely , Yeshua . He is now crowned with glory and honor , because of the death He suffered so that , by the grace of God , He might taste death for everyone .
58002010	For it was fitting for God — for whom and through whom all things exist — in leading many sons to glory , to perfect through sufferings the initiator of their salvation .
58002011	For both He who sanctifies and those being sanctified are all from one — so He is not ashamed to call them brethren ,
58002012	saying , “ I will proclaim Your name to My brethren . In the midst of the congregation I will sing praise to You . ”
58002013	And again , “ I will put My trust in Him . ” And again , “ Here am I and the children God has given Me . ”
58002014	Therefore , since the children share in flesh and blood , He Himself likewise shared the same humanity — so that through death He might break the power of the one who had the power of death ( that is , the devil )
58002015	and free those who by fear of death were in bondage all their lives .
58002016	For surely He is not concerned about angels , but about the seed of Abraham .
58002017	Therefore He had to be made like His brethren in all things , so He might become a merciful and faithful Kohen Gadol in matters relating to God , to make atonement for the sins of the people .
58002018	Because He Himself suffered when put to the test , He is able to help those being tested .
58003001	Therefore , holy brethren , partners in a heavenly calling , take notice of Yeshua — the Shaliach and Kohen Gadol we affirm .
58003002	He was faithful to the One who appointed Him in His house — as was Moses also .
58003003	For He has been considered worthy of more glory than Moses , even as the builder of the house has more honor than the house .
58003004	For every house is built by someone , but the builder of all things is God .
58003005	Now Moses surely was faithful in all God’s house as a servant , for a witness of things to be spoken later .
58003006	But Messiah , as Son , is over God’s house — and we are His house , if we hold firm to our boldness and what we are proud to hope . Listen and Obey , or Harden and Fall Away
58003007	Therefore , just as the Ruach ha-Kodesh says , “ Today if you hear His voice ,
58003008	do not harden your hearts as in the rebellion , on the day of testing in the wilderness .
58003009	There your fathers put Me to the test , though they saw My works for forty years .
58003010	Therefore I was provoked by this generation , and I said , ‘ They always go astray in their heart , and they have not known My ways . ’
58003011	As I swore in my wrath , ‘ They shall not enter My rest . ’ ”
58003012	Take care , brethren , that none of you has an evil heart of unbelief that falls away from the living God .
58003013	But encourage one another day by day — as long as it is called “ Today ” — so that none of you may be hardened by the deceitfulness of sin .
58003014	For we have become partners of Messiah , if we hold our original conviction firm until the end .
58003015	As it is said , “ Today if you hear His voice , do not harden your hearts as in the rebellion . ”
58003016	Now which ones heard and rebelled ? Indeed , was it not all who came out of Egypt with Moses ?
58003017	And with whom was He provoked for forty years ? Was it not with those who sinned , whose bodies fell in the wilderness ?
58003018	And to whom did He swear that they would not enter His rest ? Was it not to those who were disobedient ?
58003019	So we see that they were not able to enter in because of lack of trust .
58004001	Let us fear then ! Though a promise of entering His rest is left open , some of you would seem to have fallen short .
58004002	For we also have had Good News proclaimed to us , just as they did . But the word they heard did not help them , because they were not unified with those who listened in faith .
58004003	For we who have trusted are entering into that rest . It is just as God has said , “ So in My wrath I swore , ‘ They shall never enter My rest , ’ ” even though His works were finished since the foundation of the world .
58004004	For somewhere He has spoken about the seventh day in this way : “ And God rested on the seventh day from all His works , ”
58004005	and again in this passage : “ They shall never enter My rest . ”
58004006	So then it remains for some to enter into it ; yet those who formerly had Good News proclaimed to them did not enter because of disobedience .
58004007	Again , God appoints a certain day — “ Today ” — saying through David after so long a time , just as it has been said before , “ Today , if you hear His voice , do not harden your hearts . ”
58004008	For if Joshua had given them rest , God would not have spoken of another day later on .
58004009	So there remains a Shabbat rest for the people of God .
58004010	For the one who has entered God’s rest has also ceased from his own work , just as God did from His .
58004011	Let us , therefore , make every effort to enter that rest , so that no one may fall through the same pattern of disobedience .
58004012	For the word of God is living and active and sharper than any two-edged sword — piercing right through to a separation of soul and spirit , joints and marrow , and able to judge the thoughts and intentions of the heart .
58004013	No creature is hidden from Him , but all are naked and exposed to the eyes of Him to whom we must give account . Yeshua , Our Compassionate Kohen Gadol
58004014	Therefore , since we have a great Kohen Gadol who has passed through the heavens , Yeshua Ben-Elohim , let us hold firmly to our confessed allegiance .
58004015	For we do not have a kohen gadol who is unable to sympathize with our weaknesses , but One who has been tempted in all the same ways — yet without sin .
58004016	Therefore let us draw near to the throne of grace with boldness , so that we may receive mercy and find grace for help in time of need .
58005001	For every kohen gadol taken from among men is appointed to act on behalf of people in matters relating to God , so that he may offer gifts and sacrifices for sins .
58005002	He is able to empathize with the ignorant and deluded , since he himself also is subject to weakness .
58005003	For this reason he has to make offerings for sins — just as for the people , so also for himself .
58005004	And no one takes this honor for himself , but only when he is called by God , as Aaron was .
58005005	So also Messiah did not glorify Himself to be made Kohen Gadol ; rather , it was God who said to Him , “ You are My Son ; today I have become Your Father . ”
58005006	And He says in a different passage , “ You are a kohen forever , according to the order of Melchizedek . ”
58005007	In the days of His life on earth , Yeshua offered up both prayers and pleas , with loud crying and tears , to the One able to save Him from death ; and He was heard because of His reverence .
58005008	Though He was a Son , He learned obedience from what He suffered .
58005009	And once made perfect , He became the source of eternal salvation to all who obey Him —
58005010	called by God Kohen Gadol “ according to the order of Melchizedek . ” Moving on to Maturity
58005011	About this subject there is much for us to say , and it is hard to explain since you have become sluggish in hearing .
58005012	For although you ought to be teachers by this time , again you need someone to teach you the basics of God’s sayings . You have come to need milk , not solid food .
58005013	For anyone living on milk is inexperienced with the teaching about righteousness — he is an infant .
58005014	But solid food is for the mature , who through practice have their senses trained to discern both good and evil .
58006001	Therefore leaving the basic teaching of the Messiah , let us move on toward maturity — not laying again a foundation of repentance from dead works and of trust in God ,
58006002	of teaching about immersions , laying on of hands , resurrection of the dead , and eternal judgment .
58006003	Now this we will do , if God permits .
58006004	For it is impossible for those who once were enlightened — having tasted of the heavenly gift and become partakers of the Ruach ha-Kodesh ,
58006005	and having tasted the good word of God and the powers of the olam ha-ba ,
58006006	and then having fallen away — to renew again to repentance , since they are again crucifying Ben-Elohim for themselves and publicly disgracing Him .
58006007	For the earth — having soaked up the rain frequently falling on it — brings forth vegetation useful to those for whom it is farmed ; and it shares in God’s blessing .
58006008	But if it produces thorns and thistles , it is worthless and near to being cursed — its end is to be burned over .
58006009	But even though we speak like this , loved ones , concerning you we are convinced of better things — things coming with salvation .
58006010	For God is not unjust so as to forget your work and the love that you showed for His name , in having served and continuing to serve the kedoshim .
58006011	But we long for each of you to show the same eagerness for the certainty of hope to the very end —
58006012	so you will not be sluggish , but imitators of those inheriting the promises through trust and perseverance .
58006013	Now when God made His promise to Abraham — since He could swear by no one greater , He swore by Himself ,
58006014	saying , “ Surely I will bless you , and surely I will multiply you . ”
58006015	And so after waiting patiently , Abraham reached the promise .
58006016	For people swear by someone greater ; and the oath , as confirmation , is an end to all their disputing .
58006017	In the same way God , determining to point out more clearly to the heirs of the promise the unchanging nature of His purpose , guaranteed it with an oath .
58006018	So by two unchangeable things , in which it is impossible for God to lie , we who have fled for refuge might have strong encouragement to take hold of the hope set before us .
58006019	We have this hope as an anchor of the soul , both firm and steady — a hope that enters the inner place behind the curtain .
58006020	Yeshua has entered there as a forerunner on our behalf , having become Kohen Gadol “ forever , according to the order of Melchizedek . ”
58007001	For this Melchizedek was king of Salem , kohen of God Most High . He met Abraham returning from the defeat of the kings and blessed him ,
58007002	and to him Abraham apportioned a tenth of everything . First , by the translation of his name , he is “ King of Righteousness ” ; and then also King of Salem , which is “ King of Shalom . ”
58007003	Without father , without mother , without genealogy , having neither beginning of days nor end of life but made like Ben-Elohim , he remains a kohen for all time .
58007004	Now see how great this man is ! Even Abraham the patriarch gave him a tenth out of the plunder .
58007005	Indeed , those sons of Levi who receive the priesthood have , according to Torah , a command to collect a tithe from the people — that is , from their kin , although they have come out of the loins of Abraham .
58007006	But this one — who did not have their genealogy — has collected tithes from Abraham and has blessed him , the one holding the promises .
58007007	Now it is beyond dispute that the lesser is blessed by the greater .
58007008	In one case , dying men receive tithes ; but in the other , one about whom it is testified that he lives on .
58007009	Through Abraham even Levi , the one receiving tithes , has paid the tithe , so to speak —
58007010	for he was still in his father’s loins when Melchizedek met him . Yeshua , Our Kohen Gadol Forever
58007011	Now if perfection was through the Levitical priesthood ( for based on it the people had been given the Torah ) , what further need was there for a different kohen to arise — designated according to the order of Melchizedek , not according to the order of Aaron ?
58007012	For whenever the priesthood is altered , out of necessity an alteration of law also takes place .
58007013	For the one about whom these things are said belongs to another tribe , from which no one has officiated at the altar .
58007014	For it is clear that our Lord has sprung forth from Judah — concerning this tribe , Moses said nothing about kohanim .
58007015	And it is even more evident , if another kohen arises like Melchizedek —
58007016	one made not by virtue of a Torah requirement of physical descent , but by virtue of the power of an indestructible life .
58007017	For it is testified , “ You are a kohen forever , according to the order of Melchizedek . ”
58007018	For on the one hand , a former requirement is set aside because of its weakness and ineffectiveness —
58007019	for Torah made nothing perfect . But on the other hand , a better hope is introduced , through which we draw near to God .
58007020	Moreover , it was not without a sworn oath . ( Others indeed have become kohanim without a sworn oath ,
58007021	but He with a oath — sworn by the One who said to Him , “ Adonai has sworn and will not change His mind , ‘ You are a kohen forever . ’ ” )
58007022	How much more then has Yeshua become the guarantee of a better covenant .
58007023	Now on the one hand , many have become kohanim , who through death are prevented from continuing in office .
58007024	But on the other hand , the One who does remain forever has a permanent priesthood .
58007025	Therefore He is also able to save completely those who draw near to God through Him , always living to make intercession for them .
58007026	For such a Kohen Gadol was fitting for us : holy , guiltless , undefiled , separated from sinners , and exalted above the heavens .
58007027	He has no need to offer up sacrifices day by day like those other kohanim g’dolim — first for their own sins and then for the sins of the people . For when He offered up Himself , He did this once for all .
58007028	For the Torah appoints as kohanim g’dolim men who have weakness ; but the word of the oath , which came after the Torah , appoints a Son — made perfect forever .
58008001	Now here is the main point being said . We do have such a Kohen Gadol , who has taken His seat at the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens .
58008002	He is a priestly attendant of the Holies and the true Tent — which Adonai set up , not man .
58008003	For every kohen gadol is appointed to offer both gifts and sacrifices , so it is necessary for this One also to have something to offer .
58008004	Now if He were on earth , He would not be a kohen at all , since there are those who offer the gifts according to the Torah .
58008005	They offer service in a replica and foreshadower of the heavenlies — one that is just as Moses was instructed by God when he was about to complete the tabernacle . For He says , “ See that you make everything according to the design that was shown to you on the mountain . ”
58008006	But now Yeshua has obtained a more excellent ministry , insofar as He is the mediator of a better covenant which has been enacted on better promises .
58008007	For if that first one had been flawless , there would not have been discourse seeking a second .
58008008	For finding fault with them , He says , “ Behold , days are coming , says Adonai , when I will inaugurate a new covenant with the house of Israel and with the house of Judah .
58008009	It will not be like the covenant I made with their fathers on the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt . For they did not remain in My covenant , and I did not care for them , says Adonai .
58008010	For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days , says Adonai . I will put My Torah into their mind , and upon their hearts I will write it . And I will be their God , and they shall be My people .
58008011	And no more will they teach , each one his fellow citizen and each one his brother , saying , ‘ Know Adonai , ’ because all will know Me , from the least of them to the greatest .
58008012	For I will be merciful toward their iniquities , and their sins I will remember no more . ”
58008013	In saying “ new , ” He has treated the first as old ; but what is being made old and aging is close to vanishing .
58009001	Now even the first one had regulations for worship and the earthly sanctuary .
58009002	For a tent was prepared : in the outer part were the menorah , the table , and the presentation of the bread — this is called the Holy Place .
58009003	Beyond the second curtain was a dwelling called the Holy of Holies .
58009004	It held a golden altar of incense and the ark of the covenant , completely covered with gold . In the ark was a golden jar holding the manna , Aaron’s rod that budded , and the tablets of the covenant —
58009005	and above it , cherubim of glory overshadowing the mercy seat . But it is not now possible to speak in detail about these things .
58009006	Now with these things prepared this way , the kohanim do continually enter into the outer tent while completing the services ;
58009007	but into the inner , once a year , the kohen gadol alone — and not without blood which he offers for himself and for the unintentional sins of the people .
58009008	By this the Ruach ha-Kodesh makes clear that the way into the Holies has not yet been revealed while the first tent is still standing .
58009009	It is a symbol for the present time . Accordingly , gifts and sacrifices are being offered that cannot make the worshiper perfect with respect to conscience .
58009010	These relate only to food and drink and various washings — regulations for the body imposed until a time of setting things straight .
58009011	But when Messiah appeared as Kohen Gadol of the good things that have now come , passing through the greater and more perfect Tent not made with hands ( that is to say not of this creation ) ,
58009012	He entered into the Holies once for all — not by the blood of goats and calves but by His own blood , having obtained eternal redemption .
58009013	For if the blood of goats and bulls and the ashes of a heifer sprinkling those who have been defiled sanctify for the cleansing of the flesh ,
58009014	how much more will the blood of Messiah — who through the eternal Spirit offered Himself without blemish to God — cleanse our conscience from dead works to serve the living God ?
58009015	For this reason He is the mediator of a new covenant , in order that those called may receive the promised eternal inheritance — since a death has taken place that redeems them from violations under the first covenant .
58009016	For where there is a covenant , the death of the one who made it must be established .
58009017	For a covenant is secured upon the basis of dead bodies , since it has no strength as long as the one who made it lives .
58009018	That is why not even the first covenant was inaugurated without blood .
58009019	For when every commandment had been spoken by Moses to all the people according to the Torah , he took the blood of the calves and goats , with water and scarlet wool and hyssop , and he sprinkled both the book itself and all the people .
58009020	He said , “ This is the blood of the covenant which God commanded you . ”
58009021	And in the same way , he sprinkled the tabernacle and all the vessels of the ministry with the blood .
58009022	And nearly everything is purified in blood according to the Torah , and apart from the shedding of blood there is no forgiveness .
58009023	Therefore it was necessary for the replicas of these heavenly things to be purified with these sacrifices — but the heavenly things themselves with better sacrifices than these .
58009024	For Messiah did not enter into Holies made with hands — counterparts of the true things — but into heaven itself , now to appear in God’s presence on our behalf .
58009025	And He did not offer Himself again and again — as the kohen gadol enters into the Holy of Holies year after year with blood that is not his own .
58009026	For then He would have needed to suffer again and again from the foundation of the world . But as it is , He has been revealed once and for all at the close of the ages — to put away sin by the sacrifice of Himself .
58009027	And just as it is appointed for men to die once , and after this judgment ,
58009028	so also Messiah , was offered once to bear the sins of many . He will appear a second time , apart from sin , to those eagerly awaiting Him for salvation .
58010001	The Torah has a shadow of the good things to come — not the form itself of the realities . For this reason it can never , by means of the same sacrifices they offer constantly year after year , make perfect those who draw near .
58010002	Otherwise , would they not have ceased to be offered , since the worshipers — cleansed once and for all — would no longer have consciousness of sins ?
58010003	But in these sacrifices is a reminder of sins year after year —
58010004	for it is impossible for the blood of bulls and goats to take away sins .
58010005	So when Messiah comes into the world , He says , “ Sacrifice and offering You did not desire , but a body You prepared for Me .
58010006	In whole burnt offerings and sin offerings You did not delight .
58010007	Then I said , ‘ Behold , I come to do Your will , O God ( in the scroll of the book it is written of Me ) . ’ ”
58010008	After saying above , “ Sacrifices and offerings and whole burnt offerings and sin offerings You did not desire , nor did You delight in them ” ( those which are offered according to Torah ) ,
58010009	then He said , “ Behold , I come to do Your will . ” He takes away the first to establish the second .
58010010	By His will we have been made holy through the offering of the body of Messiah Yeshua once for all .
58010011	Indeed , every kohen stands day by day serving and offering the same sacrifices again and again , which can never take away sins .
58010012	But on the other hand , when this One offered for all time a single sacrifice for sins , He sat down at the right hand of God —
58010013	waiting from then on , until His enemies are made a footstool for His feet .
58010014	For by one offering He has perfected forever those being made holy .
58010015	The Ruach ha-Kodesh also testifies to us — for after saying ,
58010016	“ This is the covenant that I will cut with them : ‘ After those days , ’ says Adonai , ‘ I will put My Torah upon their hearts , and upon their minds I will write it , ’ ” then He says ,
58010017	“ I will remember their sins and their lawless deeds no more . ”
58010018	Now where there is removal of these , there is no longer an offering for sin . Let Us Pray Boldly in God’s Presence
58010019	Therefore , brethren , we have boldness to enter into the Holies by the blood of Yeshua .
58010020	He inaugurated a new and living way for us through the curtain — that is , His flesh .
58010021	We also have a Kohen Gadol over God’s household .
58010022	So let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith , with hearts sprinkled clean from an evil conscience and body washed with pure water .
58010023	Let us hold fast the unwavering confession of hope , for He who promised is faithful .
58010024	And let us consider how to stir up one another to love and good deeds .
58010025	And do not neglect our own meetings , as is the habit of some , but encourage one another — and all the more so as you see the Day approaching .
58010026	For if we keep on sinning willfully after we have received the knowledge of the truth , there no longer remains a sacrifice for sins ,
58010027	but only a terrifying expectation of judgment and a fury of fire about to devour the enemies of God .
58010028	Anyone who rejected the Torah of Moses dies without compassion on the word of two or three witnesses .
58010029	How much more severe do you think the punishment will be for the one who has trampled Ben-Elohim underfoot , and has regarded as unholy the blood of the covenant by which he was made holy , and has insulted the Ruach of grace ?
58010030	For we know the One who said , “ Vengeance is Mine ; I will repay , ” and again , “ Adonai will judge His people . ”
58010031	It is a terrifying thing to fall into the hands of the living God . Suffering Perfects Yeshua’s Followers
58010032	But remember the former days when , after you were enlightened , you endured a great struggle with sufferings .
58010033	Sometimes you were publicly exposed to abuses and afflictions , and other times you became partners with those who were treated this way .
58010034	For you suffered along with the prisoners and joyfully accepted the plundering of your possessions , knowing that you have for yourselves a better and lasting possession .
58010035	Therefore , do not lose your boldness , which has great reward .
58010036	For you need perseverance so that , after you have done the will of God , you may receive the promise .
58010037	For yet “ in a very little while , the Coming One will come , and He will not delay .
58010038	But My righteous one shall live by emunah ; and if he shrinks back , My soul takes no pleasure in him . ”
58010039	But we are not among the timid ones on the path to destruction , but among the faithful ones on the path to the preservation of the soul .
58011001	Now faith is the substance of things hoped for , the evidence of realities not seen .
58011002	For by it the elders received commendation .
58011003	By faith we understand that the universe was created by the word of God , so that what is seen did not come from anything visible .
58011004	By faith Abel offered God a better sacrifice than Cain . Through faith he was commended as righteous when God approved of his gifts . And through faith he still speaks , although he is dead .
58011005	By faith Enoch was taken so as not to see death , and he was not found because God took him . For before he was taken , he was commended as pleasing to God .
58011006	Now without faith it is impossible to please God . For the one who comes to God must believe that He exists and that He is a rewarder of those who seek Him .
58011007	By faith Noah , when warned about events not yet seen , in holy fear prepared an ark for the safety of his household . Through faith he condemned the world and became an heir of the righteousness that comes by faith .
58011008	By faith Abraham obeyed when he was called to go out to a place he was to receive as an inheritance . He went out , not knowing where he was going .
58011009	By faith he migrated to the land of promise as if it were foreign , dwelling in tents with Isaac and Jacob — fellow heirs of the same promise .
58011010	For he was waiting for the city that has foundations , whose architect and builder is God .
58011011	By faith even Sarah herself received ability to conceive when she was barren and past the age , since she considered the One who had made the promise to be faithful .
58011012	So from one — and him as good as dead — were fathered offspring as numerous as the stars of heaven , and as uncountable as the sand on the seashore .
58011013	These all died in faith without receiving the things promised — but they saw them and welcomed them from afar , and they confessed that they were strangers and sojourners on the earth .
58011014	For those who say such things make it clear that they are seeking a homeland .
58011015	If indeed they had been thinking about where they had come from , they would have had opportunity to return .
58011016	But as it is , they yearn for a better land — that is , a heavenly one . Therefore God is not ashamed to be called their God , for He has prepared a city for them .
58011017	By faith Abraham , when he was tested , offered up Isaac . Yes , he who had received the promises was offering up his one and only son —
58011018	the one about whom it was said , “ Through Isaac offspring shall be named for you . ”
58011019	He reasoned that God was able to raise him up even from the dead — and in a sense , he did receive him back from there .
58011020	By faith Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau , even concerning things to come .
58011021	By faith Jacob , as he was dying , blessed each of the sons of Joseph , and he bowed in worship while leaning on the top of his staff .
58011022	By faith Joseph , when his end was near , made mention of the exodus of B’nei-Israel and gave instructions about his bones .
58011023	By faith Moses , when he was born , was hidden for three months by his parents , because they saw he was an extraordinary child and they were not afraid of the king’s decree .
58011024	By faith Moses , when he had grown up , refused to be called the son of Pharaoh’s daughter .
58011025	Instead he chose to suffer mistreatment along with the people of God , rather than to enjoy the passing pleasures of sin .
58011026	He considered the disgrace of Messiah as greater riches than the treasures of Egypt — because he was looking ahead to the reward .
58011027	By faith he left Egypt , not fearing the king’s anger — for he persevered as if seeing the One who is invisible .
58011028	By faith he kept the Passover and the smearing of the blood , so that the destroyer of the firstborn would not touch them .
58011029	By faith they passed through the Red Sea as if on dry ground . When the Egyptians tried it , they were swallowed up .
58011030	By faith the walls of Jericho fell down after they were circled for seven days .
58011031	By faith Rahab the prostitute did not perish with those who were disobedient , because she welcomed the spies with shalom .
58011032	And what more shall I say ? For time would fail me if I tell of Gideon , Barak , Samson , Jephthah , also of David and Samuel and the prophets .
58011033	By faith they conquered kingdoms , administered justice , obtained promises , shut the mouths of lions ,
58011034	quenched the power of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , were made strong out of weakness , became mighty in war , and made foreign armies flee .
58011035	Women received their dead raised back to life ; and others were tortured , after not accepting release , so they might obtain a better resurrection .
58011036	Others experienced the trial of mocking and scourging — yes , and even chains and prison .
58011037	They were stoned , they were sawed in two , they were murdered with the sword . They went around in sheepskins and goatskins ; they were destitute , afflicted , mistreated .
58011038	The world was not worthy of them ! They wandered around in deserts and mountains , caves and holes in the ground .
58011039	And all these , though commended for their faith , did not receive what was promised —
58011040	because God had provided something better for us , so that only with us would they reach perfection .
58012001	Therefore , since we have such a great cloud of witnesses surrounding us , let us also get rid of every weight and entangling sin . Let us run with endurance the race set before us ,
58012002	focusing on Yeshua , the initiator and perfecter of faith . For the joy set before Him , He endured the cross , disregarding its shame ; and He has taken His seat at the right hand of the throne of God .
58012003	Consider Him who has endured such hostility by sinners against Himself , so that you may not grow weary in your souls and lose heart .
58012004	In struggling against sin , you have not yet resisted to the point of bloodshed .
58012005	Have you forgotten the warning addressed to you as sons ? “ My son , do not take lightly the discipline of Adonai or lose heart when you are corrected by Him ,
58012006	because Adonai disciplines the one He loves and punishes every son He accepts . ”
58012007	It is for discipline that you endure . God is treating you as sons — for what son does a father not discipline ?
58012008	But if you are without discipline — something all have come to share — then you are illegitimate and not sons .
58012009	Besides , we are used to having human fathers as instructors — and we respected them . Shall we not much more be subject to the Father of spirits and live ?
58012010	Indeed , for a short time they disciplined us as seemed best to them ; but He does so for our benefit , so that we may share in His holiness .
58012011	Now all discipline seems painful at the moment — not joyful . But later it yields the peaceful fruit of righteousness to those who have been trained by it .
58012012	Therefore , strengthen the hands that are weak and the knees that are feeble !
58012013	And make straight paths for your feet , so that what is lame will not be pulled out of joint but rather be healed .
58012014	Pursue shalom with everyone , and the holiness without which no one will see the Lord .
58012015	See to it that no one falls short of the grace of God ; and see to it that no bitter root springs up and causes trouble , and by it many be defiled .
58012016	Also see to it that there is no immoral or godless person — like Esau , who sold his birthright for one meal .
58012017	For you know that later , when he wanted to inherit the blessing , he was rejected . He found no chance for repentance , though he begged for it with tears . Entering the Unshakeable Kingdom
58012018	For you have not come to a mountain that can be touched , and to a blazing fire , and to darkness and gloom and storm ,
58012019	and to the blast of a shofar and a voice whose words made those who heard it beg that not another word be spoken to them .
58012020	For they could not bear what was commanded : “ If even an animal touches the mountain , it shall be stoned . ”
58012021	So terrifying was the sight that Moses said , “ I am quaking with fear . ”
58012022	But you have come to Mount Zion — to the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , and to myriads of angels , a joyous gathering ,
58012023	and to the assembly of the firstborn who are written in a scroll in heaven , and to God the Judge of all , and to the spirits of the righteous ones made perfect ,
58012024	and to Yeshua , the Mediator of a new covenant , and to the sprinkled blood that speaks of something better than the blood of Abel .
58012025	See to it that you do not refuse the One who is speaking ! For if they did not escape when they refused the One who was warning them on earth , much less will we escape if we reject the One who warns us from heaven .
58012026	His voice shook the earth then , but now He has promised , saying , “ Yet once more I will shake not only the earth , but also the heavens . ”
58012027	Now this phrase , “ Yet once more , ” shows the removal of those things that are shaken — that is , created things — so that what cannot be shaken may remain .
58012028	Therefore , since we are receiving a kingdom that cannot be shaken , let us show gratitude — through this we may offer worship in a manner pleasing to God , with reverence and awe .
58012029	For our God is a consuming fire .
58013001	Let brotherly love continue .
58013002	Do not neglect to show hospitality to strangers — for in doing so , some have entertained angels without knowing it .
58013003	Remember the prisoners as if you were fellow prisoners , and those who are mistreated as if you also were suffering bodily .
58013004	Let marriage be held in honor among all and the marriage bed kept undefiled , for God will judge the sexually immoral and adulterers .
58013005	Keep your lifestyle free from the love of money , and be content with what you have . For God Himself has said , “ I will never leave you or forsake you , ”
58013006	so that with confidence we say , “ The Lord is my helper ; I will not fear . What will man do to me ? ”
58013007	Remember your leaders , who spoke the word of God to you . Consider the outcome of their way of life , and imitate their faith .
58013008	Yeshua the Messiah is the same yesterday , today , and forever .
58013009	Do not be carried away by all kinds of strange teachings , for it is good for the heart to be strengthened by grace — not by foods that have not benefited those occupied by them .
58013010	We have an altar from which those serving in the tabernacle have no right to eat .
58013011	For the bodies of those animals — whose blood is brought into the Holies by the kohen gadol as an offering for sin — are burned outside the camp .
58013012	Therefore , to make the people holy through His own blood , Yeshua also suffered outside the gate .
58013013	So let us go to Him outside the camp , bearing His disgrace .
58013014	For here we have no lasting city , but we seek the one that is to come .
58013015	Through Yeshua then , let us continually offer up to God a sacrifice of praise — the fruit of lips giving thanks to His name .
58013016	Do not neglect doing good and sharing , for with such sacrifices God is well pleased .
58013017	Obey your leaders and submit to them , for they keep watch over your souls as ones who must give an account . Let them do this with joy and not with groaning , for that would be of no benefit to you .
58013018	Pray for us , for we are convinced that we have a clear conscience , desiring to conduct ourselves honorably in all things .
58013019	I especially urge you to do this , so that I may be restored to you sooner . Closing Blessing
58013020	Now may the God of shalom , who brought up from the dead the great Shepherd of the sheep by the blood of an everlasting covenant , our Lord Yeshua ,
58013021	make you complete in every good thing to do His will , accomplishing in us what is pleasing in His sight , through Messiah Yeshua . To Him be the glory forever and ever . Amen . Final Greetings
58013022	But I urge you , brethren , listen patiently to this word of exhortation , for in fact I have written to you in few words .
58013023	Know that our brother Timothy has been released . If he comes soon , I will visit you with him .
58013024	Greet all your leaders and all the kedoshim — those from Italy greet you .
58013025	Grace be with you all .
59001001	Jacob , a slave of God and of the Lord Yeshua the Messiah , To the twelve tribes in the Diaspora : Shalom !
59001002	Consider it all joy , my brethren , when you encounter various trials ,
59001003	knowing that the testing of your faith produces endurance .
59001004	And let endurance have its perfect work , so that you may be perfect and complete , lacking in nothing .
59001005	But if any of you lacks wisdom , let him ask of God , who gives to all without hesitation and without reproach ; and it will be given to him .
59001006	But let him ask in faith , without any doubting — for the one who doubts is like a wave of the sea , blown and tossed by the wind .
59001007	For that person must not suppose that he will receive anything from the Lord —
59001008	he is a double-minded man , unstable in all his ways .
59001009	But let the brother in humble circumstances boast in his high position —
59001010	and the rich person in his humble position , because like the flower of the grass he will pass away .
59001011	For the sun arises with a scorching heat and withers the grass , and its flower falls off and the beauty of its appearance is destroyed . So also the rich man in the midst of his pursuits will wither away .
59001012	Happy is the one who endures testing , because when he has stood the test , he will receive the crown of life , which the Lord promised to those who love Him .
59001013	Let no one say when he is tempted , “ I am being tempted by God ” — for God cannot be tempted by evil , and He himself tempts no one .
59001014	But each one is tempted when he is dragged away and enticed by his own desire .
59001015	Then when desire has conceived , it gives birth to sin ; and when sin is full grown , it brings forth death .
59001016	Do not be deceived , my dearly loved brethren .
59001017	Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , coming down from the Father of lights , with whom there is no variation or shifting shadow .
59001018	By His will , He brought us forth by the word of truth , so that we might be a kind of firstfruits of all He created .
59001019	Know this , my dearly loved brethren : let every person be quick to listen , slow to speak , and slow to anger —
59001020	for human anger doesn’t produce the righteousness of God .
59001021	So put away all moral filth and excess of evil and receive with humility the implanted word , which is able to save your souls .
59001022	But be doers of the word , and not hearers only , deluding yourselves .
59001023	For if anyone is a hearer of the word and not a doer , he is like a man who looks at his natural face in a mirror —
59001024	for once he looks at himself and goes away , he immediately forgets what sort of person he was .
59001025	But the one who looks intently into the perfect Torah , the Torah that gives freedom , and continues in it , not becoming a hearer who forgets but a doer who acts — he shall be blessed in what he does .
59001026	If anyone thinks he is religious and yet does not bridle his tongue but deceives his heart , this person’s religion is futile .
59001027	Pure and undefiled religion before our God and Father is this : to care for orphans and widows in their distress , and to keep oneself unstained by the world .
59002001	My brethren , do not hold the faith of our glorious Lord Yeshua the Messiah while showing favoritism .
59002002	For if a man with a gold ring and fine clothes comes into your synagogue , and a poor person in filthy clothes also comes in ;
59002003	and you pay special attention to the one wearing the fine clothing and you say , “ Sit here in a good place ” ; and you say to the poor person , “ Stand there , ” or “ Sit by my footstool ” ;
59002004	haven’t you made distinctions between yourselves , and become judges with evil thoughts ?
59002005	Listen , my dearly loved brethren . Didn’t God choose the poor in this world to be rich in faith and heirs of the Kingdom that He promised to those who love Him ?
59002006	But you have dishonored the poor person . Isn’t it the rich who oppress you and drag you into court ?
59002007	Don’t they blaspheme the good name by which you were called ?
59002008	If , however , you fulfill the royal law according to the Scripture , “ You shall love your neighbor as yourself , ” you do well .
59002009	But if you show favoritism , you are committing sin and are convicted by the Torah as transgressors .
59002010	For whoever keeps the whole Torah but stumbles in one point , he has become guilty of all .
59002011	For the one who said , “ Do not commit adultery , ” also said , “ Do not commit murder . ” Now if you do not commit adultery but do commit murder , you have become a transgressor of the Torah .
59002012	So speak and act as those who will be judged according to a Torah that gives freedom .
59002013	For judgment is merciless to the one who does not show mercy . Mercy triumphs over judgment .
59002014	What good is it , my brethren , if someone says he has faith , but does not have works ? Can such faith save him ?
59002015	If a brother or sister is naked and lacks daily food ,
59002016	and one of you says to them , “ Go in shalom , keep warm and well fed , ” but you do not give them what the body needs , what good is that ?
59002017	So also faith , if it does not have works , is dead by itself .
59002018	But someone will say , “ You have faith and I have works . ” Show me your faith without works and I will show you faith by my works .
59002019	You believe that God is one . You do well . The demons also believe — and shudder !
59002020	But do you want to know , you empty person , that faith without works is dead ?
59002021	Wasn’t Abraham our father proved righteous by works when he offered up Isaac his son on the altar ?
59002022	You see that faith worked together with his works , and by the works his faith was made complete .
59002023	The Scripture was fulfilled that says , “ And Abraham believed God , and it was credited to him as righteousness ” — and he was called God’s friend .
59002024	You see that a man is proved righteous by works and not by faith alone .
59002025	And likewise , wasn’t Rahab the prostitute also proved righteous by works when she welcomed the messengers and sent them out another way ?
59002026	For just as the body without the spirit is dead , so also faith without works is dead .
59003001	Not many of you should become teachers , my brethren , since you know that we will receive a stricter judgment .
59003002	For we all stumble in many ways . If someone does not stumble in speech , he is a perfect man , able to bridle the whole body as well .
59003003	And if we put bits into the mouths of horses to make them obey us , we guide their whole body as well .
59003004	See also the ships — though they are so large and are driven by strong winds , they are steered by a very small rudder wherever the will of the pilot directs .
59003005	So also the tongue is a small member — yet it boasts of great things . See how so small a fire sets a blaze so great a forest !
59003006	And the tongue is a fire . The tongue is a world of evil placed among our body parts . It pollutes the whole body and sets on fire the course of life — and is set on fire by Gehenna .
59003007	For every species of beasts and birds , reptiles and sea creatures , is tamed and has been tamed by mankind .
59003008	But no human being can tame the tongue . It is a restless evil , full of deadly poison .
59003009	With it we bless Adonai and Father , and with it we curse people , who are made in the image of God .
59003010	From the same mouth comes blessing and cursing . My brethren , these things should not be .
59003011	A spring doesn’t pour out fresh and bitter water from the same opening , does it ?
59003012	My brethren , can a fig tree produce olives , or a vine produce figs ? Neither can salt water produce fresh water .
59003013	Who among you is wise and understanding ? By his good conduct let him show his deeds in the gentleness of wisdom .
59003014	But if you have bitter jealousy and selfish ambition in your heart , do not boast and lie against the truth .
59003015	This is not the wisdom that comes down from above , but is earthly , unspiritual , demonic .
59003016	For where jealousy and selfish ambition exist , there is disorder and every evil practice .
59003017	But the wisdom that is from above is first pure , then peaceable , gentle , open to reason , full of mercy and good fruits , impartial , not hypocritical .
59003018	And the fruit of righteousness is sown in shalom by those who make shalom .
59004001	Where do quarrels and conflicts among you come from ? Don’t they come from this , namely your passions that battle within your body parts ?
59004002	You crave and have not . You murder and you envy , yet you cannot get it . You fight and you wage war . You do not have because you do not ask .
59004003	You ask and do not receive , because you ask with wrong motives so you may spend it on your passions .
59004004	You adulteresses ! Don’t you know that friendship with the world is enmity with God ? Therefore whoever wishes to be a friend of the world makes himself an enemy of God .
59004005	Or do you think that in vain the Scripture says , “ He yearns jealously over the spirit which He made to dwell in us ” ?
59004006	But He gives greater grace . Therefore it says , “ God opposes the proud , but gives grace to the humble . ”
59004007	Therefore submit to God . But resist the devil and he will flee from you .
59004008	Draw near to God , and He will draw near to you . Cleanse your hands , you sinners , and purify your hearts , you double-minded !
59004009	Lament and mourn and weep ! Let your laughter be turned into mourning , and your joy into gloom .
59004010	Humble yourselves in the sight of Adonai , and He shall lift you up .
59004011	Do not speak evil against one another , brethren . The one who speaks against a brother or judges his brother , speaks evil against the Torah and judges the Torah . But if you judge the Torah , you are not a doer of the Torah , but a judge .
59004012	There is only one lawgiver and judge — the One who is able to save and to destroy . But who are you who judges your neighbor ?
59004013	Come now , you who say , “ Today or tomorrow we will go to such and such a town and spend a year there and engage in business and make a profit . ”
59004014	Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow . What is your life ? For you are a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes .
59004015	Instead you ought to say , “ If the Lord wills , we will live and also do this or that . ”
59004016	But now you boast in your arrogance . All such boasting is evil .
59004017	Therefore whoever knows the right thing to do and does not do it — for him it is sin .
59005001	Come now , you rich , weep and wail over the miseries that are coming upon you .
59005002	Your riches have rotted and your clothes have become moth-eaten .
59005003	Your gold and your silver have rusted and their rust will be evidence against you and will eat your flesh like fire . You have stored up treasure in the last days .
59005004	Behold , the wages of the workers who mowed your fields — which you kept back by fraud — are crying out against you . And the cries of the harvesters have reached the ears of the Lord of Hosts .
59005005	You have lived on earth in luxury and self-indulgence . You have fattened your hearts for a day of slaughter .
59005006	You have condemned , you have murdered the righteous person — he does not resist you .
59005007	So be patient , brethren , until the coming of the Lord . See how the farmer waits for the precious fruit of the earth , being patient for it until it receives the early and late rain .
59005008	You also be patient . Strengthen your hearts because the coming of the Lord is near .
59005009	Do not grumble against one another , brethren , so that you may not be judged . Behold , the judge is standing at the doors .
59005010	As an example of suffering and patience , brethren , take the prophets who spoke in the name of the Lord .
59005011	Behold , we consider blessed those who showed endurance . You have heard of the endurance of Job , and you have seen the outcome of Adonai — that Adonai is full of compassion and mercy .
59005012	But above all , my brethren , do not swear — either by heaven , or by the earth , or by any other oath . But let your “ yes ” be “ yes , ” and your “ no , ” be “ no ” — so that you may not fall under judgment .
59005013	Is anyone among you suffering ? Let him pray . Is anyone cheerful ? Let him sing praises .
59005014	Is anyone among you sick ? Let him call for the elders of Messiah’s community , and let them pray over him , anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord .
59005015	The prayer of faith will save the one who is sick , and the Lord will raise him up . If he has committed sins , he will be forgiven .
59005016	So confess your offenses to one another and pray for one another so that you may be healed . The effective prayer of a righteous person is very powerful .
59005017	Elijah was a man with a nature like ours , and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain . And it did not rain on the earth for three years and six months .
59005018	He prayed again , and the sky gave rain , and the earth produced its fruit .
59005019	My brethren , if any among you strays from the truth and someone turns him back ,
59005020	let him know that the one who turns a sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death and cover a multitude of sins .
60001001	Peter , a shaliach of Messiah Yeshua , To the sojourners of the Diaspora in Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia — chosen
60001002	according to the foreknowledge of God the Father , set apart by the Ruach for obedience and for sprinkling with the blood of Yeshua the Messiah : May grace and shalom be multiplied to you . A Message of Living Hope
60001003	Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Yeshua the Messiah ! In His great mercy He caused us to be born again to a living hope through the resurrection of Messiah Yeshua from the dead .
60001004	An incorruptible , undefiled , and unfading inheritance has been reserved in heaven for you .
60001005	By trusting , you are being protected by God’s power for a salvation ready to be revealed in the last time .
60001006	You rejoice in this greatly , even though now for a little while , if necessary , you have been distressed by various trials .
60001007	These trials are so that the true metal of your faith ( far more valuable than gold , which perishes though refined by fire ) may come to light in praise and glory and honor at the revelation of Messiah Yeshua .
60001008	Though you have not seen Him , you love Him . And even though you don’t see Him now , you trust Him and are filled with a joy that is glorious beyond words ,
60001009	receiving the outcome of your faith — the salvation of your souls .
60001010	The prophets , who spoke about the grace that was to be yours , searched for this salvation and investigated carefully .
60001011	They were trying to find out the time and circumstances the Ruach of Messiah within them was indicating , when predicting the sufferings in store for Messiah and the glories to follow .
60001012	It was revealed to them that they were providing these messages not to themselves but to you . These messages have now been announced to you through those who proclaimed the Good News to you by the Ruach ha-Kodesh , sent from heaven . Even angels long to catch a glimpse of these things . A Call to Be Holy
60001013	So brace your minds for action . Keep your balance . And set your hope completely on the grace that will be brought to you at the revelation of Yeshua the Messiah .
60001014	Like obedient children , do not be shaped by the cravings you had formerly in your ignorance .
60001015	Instead , just like the Holy One who called you , be holy yourselves also in everything you do .
60001016	For it is written , “ Kedoshim you shall be , for I am kadosh . ”
60001017	If you call on Him as Father — the One who judges impartially according to each one’s deeds — then live out the time of sojourning in reverent fear .
60001018	You know that you were redeemed from the futile way of life handed down from your ancestors — not with perishable things such as silver or gold ,
60001019	but with precious blood like that of a lamb without defect or spot , the blood of Messiah .
60001020	He was chosen before the foundation of the world , but was revealed in these last times for your sake .
60001021	Through Him you are believers in God , who raised Him from the dead and gave Him glory , so that your trust and hope are in God .
60001022	Now that you have purified your souls in obedience to the truth , leading to sincere brotherly love , love one another fervently from a pure heart .
60001023	You have been born again — not from perishable seed but imperishable — through the living and enduring word of God .
60001024	For , “ All humanity is like grass , And all its glory like a wildflower . The grass withers , and the flower falls off ,
60001025	But the word of the Lord endures forever . ” And this is the word that was proclaimed as Good News to you .
60002001	So get rid of all malice and all deceit and hypocrisy and envy and all lashon ha-ra .
60002002	As newborn babes , long for pure spiritual milk , so that by it you may grow toward salvation —
60002003	now that you have tasted that the Lord is good .
60002004	As you come to Him , a living stone rejected by men but chosen by God and precious ,
60002005	you also , as living stones , are being built up as a spiritual house — a holy priesthood to offer up spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Messiah Yeshua .
60002006	For it says in Scripture , “ Behold , I lay in Zion a stone , a chosen , precious cornerstone . Whoever trusts in Him will never be put to shame . ”
60002007	Now the value is for you who keep trusting ; but for those who do not trust , “ The stone which the builders rejected — this One has become the chief cornerstone , ”
60002008	and “ a stone of stumbling , and a rock of offense . ” They stumble because they are disobeying the word — to this they were also appointed .
60002009	But you are a chosen people , a royal priesthood , a holy nation , a people for God's own possession , so that you may proclaim the praises of the One who called you out of darkness into His marvelous light .
60002010	Once you were “ not a people , ” but now you are “ God’s people . ” You were shown “ no mercy , ” but now you have been shown “ mercy . ”
60002011	Loved ones , I urge you as strangers and sojourners to keep away from the fleshly cravings that war against the soul .
60002012	Keep your conduct honorable among the Gentiles . Then while they speak against you as evildoers , they may — from noticing your good deeds — glorify God in the day of visitation . Respect and Order
60002013	For the Lord's sake , submit yourselves to every human authority — whether to a king as supreme ,
60002014	or to governors sent by him for the punishment of those who do evil and the praise of those who do good .
60002015	For this is God’s will , that you silence the ignorance of foolish men by doing good .
60002016	Live as free people , but not using your freedom as a cover-up for evil . Rather , live as God’s slaves .
60002017	Honor all people . Love the brotherhood . Fear God . Honor the king .
60002018	Slaves , with all respect submit yourselves to your masters — not only to those who are good and gentle , but also to those who are harsh .
60002019	For this finds favor if , for the sake of conscience toward God , someone endures grief from suffering undeservedly .
60002020	For what credit is there if , when you sin and get a beating , you endure ? But if you endure when you do good and suffer for it , this finds favor with God .
60002021	For you were called to this , because Messiah also suffered for you , leaving you an example so that you might follow in His footsteps :
60002022	“ He committed no sin , nor was any deceit found in His mouth . ” 23 When He was abused , He did not return the abuse . While suffering , He made no threats . Instead , He kept entrusting Himself to the One who judges righteously . 24 He Himself bore our sins in His body on the tree , so that we , removed from sins , might live for righteousness . “ By His wounds you were healed . ” 25 For you like sheep were going astray , but now you have returned to the Shepherd and Guardian of your souls .
60003001	Likewise , wives , be submitted to your own husbands so that — even if some do not obey the message — by the wives’ conduct , without a word they may be won over
60003002	as they observe your pure , reverent conduct .
60003003	Don’t let your beauty be external — braiding the hair and wearing gold jewelry or fine clothes .
60003004	Instead let it be in the hidden person of the heart , with the unfading beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit , which in God’s sight is very precious .
60003005	For this is the way the holy women , who put their hope in God , used to beautify themselves long ago — being submitted to their own husbands
60003006	just as Sarah obeyed Abraham , calling him lord . You have become her daughters by doing what is good and not fearing intimidation .
60003007	In the same way , husbands , live with your wives in an understanding way . Though they are weaker partners , honor them as equal heirs of the grace of life . In this way , your prayers will not be hindered . Suffering for Doing Good
60003008	Finally , all of you be harmonious , sympathetic , brotherly , tenderhearted , humble-minded .
60003009	Do not repay evil for evil or insult for insult , but give a blessing instead — it is for this reason you were called , so that you might inherit a blessing .
60003010	For , “ The one who loves life , wanting to see good days , must keep his tongue from evil and his lips from speaking deceit .
60003011	He must turn away from evil and do good . He must seek shalom and pursue it .
60003012	For the eyes of Adonai are on the righteous and His ears open to their prayer , but the face of Adonai is against those who do evil . ”
60003013	Who is going to harm you if you are eager to do good ?
60003014	But even if you should suffer for what is right , you are blessed . Do not be afraid or worry about their threats .
60003015	Instead sanctify Messiah as Lord in your hearts . Always be ready to give an answer to anyone who asks you a reason for the hope that is in you ,
60003016	yet with humility and reverence — keeping a clear conscience so that , whatever you are accused of , those who abuse you for your good conduct in Messiah may be put to shame .
60003017	For it is better to suffer for doing good ( if it is God’s will ) than for doing evil .
60003018	For Messiah once suffered for sins also — the righteous for the unrighteous — in order to bring you to God . He was put to death in the flesh , but made alive by the Ruach .
60003019	Through the Ruach He also went and preached to the spirits in prison .
60003020	Long ago they disobeyed while God kept waiting patiently , in the days of Noah as the ark was being built . In that ark a few ( that is , eight souls ) were brought safely through water .
60003021	Corresponding to that , immersion now brings you to safety — not the removal of dirt from the flesh , but a pledge to God of a good conscience — through the resurrection of Messiah Yeshua .
60003022	He has gone into heaven and is at the right hand of God , with angels and authorities and powers subjected to Him .
60004001	Therefore , since Messiah suffered in the flesh , arm yourselves also with the same attitude . For the one who has suffered in the flesh is finished with sin .
60004002	As a result , he lives the rest of his time in the flesh no longer for human desires , but for God’s will .
60004003	For the time that has passed was sufficient for you to carry out the desire of the pagans — living in indecency , lusts , drunken binges , orgies , wild parties , and lawless idolatries .
60004004	They are surprised that you do not run with them into the same riot of recklessness , and they vilify you .
60004005	But they will have to give an account to the One who stands ready to judge the living and the dead .
60004006	For this was the reason the Good News was proclaimed even to those now dead , so that though they are judged in the flesh before humans , they might live in the Ruach before God .
60004007	Now the end of all things is near . So be self-controlled and sober-minded for prayer .
60004008	Above all , keep your love for one another constant , for “ love covers a multitude of sins . ”
60004009	Be hospitable one to another without grumbling .
60004010	As each one has received a gift , use it to serve one another , as good stewards of the many-sided grace of God .
60004011	Whoever speaks , let it be as one speaking the utterances of God . Whoever serves , let it be with the strength that God supplies . So in all things may God be glorified through Messiah Yeshua — all glory and power to Him forever and ever ! Amen .
60004012	Loved ones , do not be surprised at the fiery ordeal taking place among you to test you — as though something strange were happening to you .
60004013	Instead , rejoice insofar as you share in the sufferings of Messiah , so that at the revelation of His glory you may also rejoice and be glad .
60004014	If you are insulted for the name of Messiah , you are fortunate , for the Ruach of glory and of God rests on you .
60004015	For let none of you suffer as a murderer or thief or evildoer or as a troublemaker .
60004016	But if anyone suffers for following Messiah , let him not be ashamed , but let him glorify God in this name .
60004017	For the time has come for judgment to begin with the house of God . If judgment begins with us first , what will be the end for those who disobey the Good News of God ?
60004018	Now , “ if it is hard for the righteous to be saved , what shall become of the ungodly and the sinner ? ”
60004019	So then , those who suffer according to God’s will — let them trust their souls to a faithful Creator while continuing to do good .
60005001	Therefore I appeal to the elders among you — as a fellow elder and witness of Messiah’s sufferings , and a partaker also of the glory about to be revealed —
60005002	shepherd God’s flock among you . Watch over it not under compulsion but willingly before God , not for dishonest gain but eagerly .
60005003	Don’t lord it over those apportioned to you , but become examples to the flock .
60005004	When the Chief Shepherd appears , you will receive the unfading crown of glory .
60005005	Likewise , you younger ones , submit yourselves to the elders . And all of you , clothe yourselves with humility toward one another , for “ God opposes the proud , but gives grace to the humble . ”
60005006	Therefore humble yourselves under the mighty hand of God , so that He may lift you up at the appropriate time .
60005007	Cast all your worries on Him , for He cares for you .
60005008	Stay alert ! Watch out ! Your adversary the devil prowls around like a roaring lion , searching for someone to devour .
60005009	Stand up against him , firm in your faith , knowing that the same kinds of suffering are being laid upon your brethren throughout the world .
60005010	After you have suffered a little while , the God of all grace — who has called you into His eternal glory in Messiah — will Himself restore , support , strengthen , and establish you .
60005011	All power to Him forever ! Amen . Final Greetings
60005012	Through Silvanus , whom I consider our faithful brother , I have written to you briefly , encouraging and testifying that this is the true grace of God . Stand firm in it !
60005013	Messiah’s community in Babylon , chosen together with you , sends you greetings . So does my son Mark .
60005014	Greet one another with a kiss of love . Shalom to you all who are in Messiah . Amen .
